English: Prologue
Indonesian: Prologue

English: Questioning
Indonesian: Questioning

English: Hmm... What should I do? Hey, can you help me?
Indonesian: Hmm.. Apa yang harus kulakukan? Hei, bisakah bantu aku?

English: I have been worried for so long, I know I must look a mess. It is good to have a friendly ear to turn to.
Indonesian: Sejak lama aku khawatir, aku tahu kalau aku mungkin terlihat berantakan. Rasanya nyaman sekali ada teman yang mau mendengarkanku.

English: I am studying recent history, but it is really hard. So would you please help me? Please?
Indonesian: Aku kesulitan saat mempelajari sejarah. Maukah kamu membantuku? Kumohon?

English: Really? Wow! Thanks a lot! Please go to the office and deliver my application for a scholarship. Thank you.
Indonesian: Sungguh? Wow, terima kasih banyak! Tolong pergi ke kantor dan serahkan aplikasi beasiswaku. Terima kasih.

English: What? Awww I knew it was too good to be true.
Indonesian: Apa? Awww, sudah kuduga itu hanya mimpi.

English: Oh, it seems like Martinyc is too busy to deliver her own applications.
Indonesian: Oh, sepertinya Martinyc terlalu sibuk untuk menyerahkan aplikasinya sendiri.

English: May I help you? You want to fill out an application? The form is on the right side of the office.
Indonesian: Ada yang bisa kubantu? Oh, Anda ingin mengisi aplikasi? Formulirnya bisa anda dapatkan di sisi kanan kantor.

English: Go to the office and deliver a scholarship application to the Mayor.
Indonesian: Pergilah ke kantor dan serahkan aplikasi beasiswa kepada Mayor.

English: Cracked Continent
Indonesian: Cracked Continent

English: Thank you very much for your help! I received plenty of money to study history thanks to you. Listen, it looks like all of the data about Madrigal is distorted.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak atas bantuanmu! Karenamu, aku sekarang memiliki cukup uang untuk melanjutkan study tentang sejarah. Omong-omong, sepertinya banyak sejarah tentang Madrigal yang terdistorsi.

English: I have been studying Madrigal history apart from the History Society and it seems that they do not want to correct the distorted history in these books.
Indonesian: Aku telah mempelajari sejarah Madrigal selain dari History Society dan tampaknya mereka tidak ingin mengoreksi sejarah yang terdistorsi dalam buku-buku ini.

English: The other day I was almost killed by renegade Blades but I cannot stop now. No matter what the History Society wants.
Indonesian: Pernah suatu hari aku hampir dibunuh oleh pemberontak Blades. Tapi aku tidak bisa berhenti sekarang. Tidak peduli apa yang diinginkan oleh History Society.

English: I will find out the true history of Madrigal, I have to. Would you please help me? The danger for you could be great however.
Indonesian: I will find out the true history of Madrigal, I have to. Would you please help me? The danger for you could be great however.

English: Will you help me regardless of the danger?
Indonesian: Maukah kamu membantuku terlepas dari bahayanya?

English: I knew you would! First, bring me 5 rocks from each of the 3 inhabited continents. Each continent has an Altar, bring me the rocks from each of these.
Indonesian: Aku tahu kamu pasti mau! Pertama, bawakan aku 5 batu dari masing-masing 3 benua. Setiap benua memiliki Altar, bawakan aku batu dari masing-masingnya.

English: Thanks for listening to me anyway. I understand if you are unwilling to risk your life.
Indonesian: Terima kasih telah mendengarkanku. Aku paham jika kamu tidak ingin membahayakan nyawamu.

English: Hmm... This is exactly what I expected. I will study these some more but before you go please...
Indonesian: Hmm.. Aku sudah menduga ini. Akan coba kupelajari ini lagi, tapi sebelum kamu pergi tolong..

English: ...you should be very, very careful. I am almost sure that the assassins that tried to kill me will come after you.
Indonesian: ..kamu harus sangat, sangat berhati-hati. Aku sangat yakin assassin yang mencoba membunuhku akan datang padamu juga.

English: Please bring me 5 rocks from each continent - Flaris, Darkon, and Saint Morning. Good luck!
Indonesian: Tolong bawakan aku 5 batu dari masing-masing Continent - Flaris, Darkon, dan Saint Morning. Semoga beruntung!

English: There are ancient altars on each continent. Please bring me 5 rocks from each contient.
Indonesian: Ada altar kuno di setiap benua. Tolong bawakan Aku 5 batu dari setiap benua.

English: Plot Begins
Indonesian: Plot Begins

English: This is evidence that the continents were once one land mass. I am trusting you with this information because, well...
Indonesian: Ini adalah bukti bahwa benua pernah menjadi satu daratan. Aku mempercayaimu dengan informasi ini karena...

English: ...we are in the same boat now. We are in danger together. Would you go through with me to the end?
Indonesian: ..kita berada di situasi yang sama sekarang. Kita sama-sama dalam bahaya. Maukah kamu melewati ini bersamaku sampai akhir?

English: Okay. Now please deliver this to Gothante. He is the chairman of the History Society in Saint City. Do not forget to be aware of the assasins.
Indonesian: Oke. Sekarang tolong kirimkan ini ke Gothante. Dia adalah Chairman dari History Society di Saint City. Jangan lupa untuk mewaspadai para assassin.

English: I do not want to force you, but never forget that you are in danger.
Indonesian: Aku tidak ingin memaksamu, jangan pernah lupa kalau kamu dalam bahaya.

English: This... This is... Bubble protect us. Martinyc has finally crossed the line. It is about time.
Indonesian: Ini... Ini... Bubble lindungi kami. Martinyc akhirnya melewati batas. Ini sudah waktunya.

English: Thank you very much. Take this letter of recommendation and visit Hachal in Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak. Ambil surat rekomendasi ini dan kunjungi Hachal di Darkon 1.

English: I am sure he can help you. Take care!
Indonesian: Aku yakin dia bisa menolongmu. Hati-hati!

English: Do you want to know about the true history of Madrigal? Then I am the man to talk to.
Indonesian: Apakah Kamu ingin tahu sejarah Madrigal yang sebenarnya? Kamu bertanya dengan orang yang tepat.

English: Deliver this to Gothante, he is the Chairman of the History Society in Saint City.
Indonesian: Serahkan ini ke Gothante, Dia adalah Chairman dari History Society di Saint City.

English: Chapter 1 The Field of Bubble
Indonesian: Bab 1 - Field of Bubble

English: Hmm? Did Gothante tell you to visit me? Why?
Indonesian: Hmm? Apa Gothante menuruhmu untuk menemuiku? Ada apa?

English: Oh, I see. Iblis watch over me, what is this information!? Who could have dug up this much of the past? Only one person?
Indonesian: Oh aku mengerti. Iblis mengawasiku, informasi apa ini!?Siapa yang bisa menggali masa lalu sebanyak ini?Hanya satu orang?

English: Martinyc of course. She has finally done what we all knew she would. She does not fear death like she should. The young are too fearless these days.
Indonesian: Martinyc. Dia akhirnya melakukan apa yang kita semua tahu dia akan melakukannya. Dia tidak takut mati seperti yang seharusnya. Para anak muda terlalu tak kenal takut akhir-akhir ini.

English: Aw well we all knew that the true history of Madrigal would be discovered eventually. And we all knew that Martinyc would be the one to uncover it.
Indonesian: yah... Kita semua tahu kalau Sejarah yang sebenarnya dari Madrigal akan terbongkar juga suatu hari nanti. Dan sekarang kita semua tahu kalau Matinyclah yang akan membongkarnya.

English: By the way... Are you going to continue with this?
Indonesian: Omong-omong... Apakah kamu akan melanjutkan ini?

English: Good. We will go to the Field of Bubble. There is more evidence to be found there. Hurry.
Indonesian: Bagus. Kita akan pergi ke Field of Bubble. Ada banyak bukti yang bisa ditemukan di sana. Cepat.

English: What? No, you cannot stop now. You have come so far.
Indonesian: Apa? Tidak, kamu tidak boleh berhenti sekarang. Kamu telah sampai sejauh ini.

English: Ahhh you are here finally. Give me the data and letter of recommendation.
Indonesian: Ahhh, kamu akhirnya sampai disini. Beri aku data dan Letter of Recommendation.

English: This place is very strange... Hmm... Field of Bubble... What do you think about it?
Indonesian: Tempat ini sangat aneh....hmm... Field Bubble... Bagaimana menurutmu?

English: You know the Field of Bubble, right? I think we can find some evidence there. Lets go! Hurry up!
Indonesian: Kamu tahu Field Bubble kan? Aku rasa kita bisa menemukan beberapa bukti disana. Ayo cepat!

English: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Strange Pattern
Indonesian: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Strange Pattern

English: Before you showed up I took a look around and found something strange to the North. The ground was dug up and...
Indonesian: Sebelum kamu muncul, aku melihat-lihat sekitar dan menemukan sesuatu yang aneh di utara. Ada bekas galian ditanah dan...

English: ...it looked like some kind of pattern. I could get a close look at it because it was surrounded .
Indonesian: ..itu tampak seperti semacam pola. Aku bisa melihatnya dari dekat karena dikelilingi

English: Strange fellows were hanging around there. I think they were defending something. There was no way I could have fought them off.
Indonesian: Orang-orang aneh berkeliaran di sana. Aku pikir mereka menjaga sesuatu. Tidak mungkin aku bisa melawan mereka.

English: Would you check? I am sure they are no match for you.
Indonesian: Maukah kamu memeriksanya? Aku yakin mereka bukanlah tandinganmu.

English: Great! I am sure that there is something to that pattern. Check it closely and bring me what you find.
Indonesian: Bagus! Aku yakin ada sesuatu dengan pola itu. Periksa dengan cermat dan bawakan apa yang kamu temukan.

English: Are you really ready to give up? I cannot force you but think about the future.
Indonesian: Apa kamu yakin akan menyerah? Aku tidak bisa memaksamu, tapi cobalah pikirkan kedepannya.

English: Oh! This! The legend is... Martinyc was right! Oh... What should we do now... Iblis watch over me!
Indonesian: Oh! Ini! Legenda itu..! Martinyc benar!.. Oh.. Apa yang harus kita lakukan sekarang.. Iblis mengawasiku!

English: Were those fellows too strong for you? Bring more people with you and continue checking. I am not strong enough to help you with them.
Indonesian: Apa mereka terlalu kuat untukmu? Bawa lebih banyak orang bersamamu dan lanjutkna pemeriksaan. Aku tidak cukup kuat untuk membantumu melawan mereka.

English: I am sure we can find out something by checking the pattern. Please check it carefully and bring me whatever you get.
Indonesian: Aku yakin kita bisa menemukan sesuatu jika memeriksa pola itu. Tolong periksa dengan seksama dan beritahu aku apapun yang dapat kamu temukan.

English: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Violet Magician Troupe
Indonesian: Chapter 1: Field of Bubble: The Violet Magician Troupe

English: Hmm... I checked the cloth piece you brought me. It seems like the pattern on the cloth piece is the same as the one I saw on the ground.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Aku memeriksa potongan kain yang kau berikan. Sepertinya pola pada potongan kain itu sama dengan yang kulihat di tanah.

English: However, there is a mystrious power in this cloth piece. I will check it out some more. By the way, have you ever heard of the Magic Troupe in Purple? I found out about them by chance.
Indonesian: Namun, ada kekuatan misterius dalam potongan kain ini. Aku akan coba memeriksanya lagi. Omong-omong, apakah kamu pernah mendengar tentang Magic Troupe in Purple? Aku mengetahui tentang mereka secara kebetulan.

English: I do not know the details, but I know that this group has something to do with the secrets of Madrigal.
Indonesian: Aku tidak tahu detailnya, tapi aku merasa kalau grup ini ada kaitannya dengan dengan rahasia dari Madrigal.

English: I think we need more information about this Troupe. How about helping me once more? Would you do that for me?
Indonesian: Aku rasa kita membutuhkan lebih banyak informasi tentang ini. Bagaimana jika membantuku sekali lagi? Bisakah?

English: Great! Please gather information about the Troupe and its members. You will have to fight them to get any information out of them.
Indonesian: Bagus! Tolong kumpulkan lebih banyak Informasi tentang kelompok itu beserta anggotanya. Kamu mungkin harus bertarung dengan beberapa dari mereka untuk mendapatkan infromasinya.

English: You are afraid of them? I can hardly believe that. Ha ha ha.
Indonesian: Kamu takut dengan mereka? Rasanya susah mempercayai itu. Ha ha ha.

English: Hmm... That was exactly what I thought... Now go back and take a rest. But please visit me again later. Thank you very much.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Tepat seperti yang kupikirkan.. Terima kasih banyak. Kembalilah dan beristirahat, dan temui aku lagi nanti.

English: Was it too much for you? Ah...but we need information about them.
Indonesian: Apa itu terlalu berat untukmu? Ah...tapi kita butuh informasi tentang mereka.

English: Fight them to get information from them. I will meet you in Darken.
Indonesian: Lawan mereka untuk mendapatkan informasi dari mereka. Aku akan menemuimu di Darken.

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade
Indonesian: Bab 2 - Hill of Shade

English: Hey! Great timing! I have just found out about something very interesting.
Indonesian: Hai! Waktu yang tepat! Aku baru saja menemukan sesuatu yang sangat menarik.

English: Do you know what this is? Well, I am sure you do not but I will tell you.
Indonesian: Apa kamu tahu apa ini? Aku yakin tidak, biarkan aku menjelaskannya padamu.

English: This is an entire picture of the pattern we found. I found it in one of my books but it was the only picture I could find.
Indonesian: Ini adalah keseluruhan dari gambar pola yang kita temukan. Aku menemukannya di salah satu bukuku dan merupakan satu-satunya gambar yang aku dapatkan.

English: I need your help once again. Would you do ma a favor?
Indonesian: Aku butuh bantuanmu sekali lagi. Maukah kamu membantuku?

English: Take this picture. Please deliver it to Rovanett in the National Library in Saint City. You can find her at Saint Hall.
Indonesian: Ambil gambar ini dan berikan ke Rovanett yang berada di National Library di Saint City. Kamu dapat menemuinya di Saint Hall.

English: Hey we are in this together. We are all in the same boat. You would do better to help me You know that.
Indonesian: Hei kita bersama-sama dalam hal ini. Kita semua berada di kapal yang sama. Lebih baik kamu bantu aku.

English: Hmm... Is this what Hachal said? Good job. Thank you very much. Let me check.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Apakah ini yang dikatakan Hachal? Kerja bagus. Terima kasih banyak. Biar kuperiksa.

English: History is always more interesting than current events but this is especially mysterious.
Indonesian: Sejarah selalu lebih menarik daripada peristiwa terkini, tetapi ini sangat misterius.

English: Here. Take this picture. Please deliver it to Rovanett who is working in the National Library in Saint City. You can find her in Saint Hall.
Indonesian: Ambil gambar ini dan berikan ke Rovanett yang bekerja di National Library di Saint City. Kamu dapat menemuinya di Saint Hall.

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: The Great Troupe Leader.
Indonesian: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: The Great Troupe Leader.

English: Oh your story about the pattern reminds me of something I read in one of the ancient texts.
Indonesian: Oh, ceritamu tentang pola itu mengingatkanku akan sesuatu yang pernah kubaca di salah satu teks kuno.

English: Do you know the Hill of Shade? I found it in one of my books but have only dared to venture there once.
Indonesian: Apa kamu tahu Hill of Shade? Aku menemukannya di salah satu bukuku tetapi hanya berani menjelajah ke sana sekali.

English: There is a pattern similar to the one that you saw in the Field of Bubble. Or maybe it was exactly the same. If those two patterns are the same...
Indonesian: Ada pola yang mirip dengan yang kau lihat di field of Bubble. Bahkan mungkin persis sama. Jika kedua pola itu sama..

English: ...maybe you can also find a cloth piece over there. Would you please go and check?
Indonesian: ..mungkin kamu juga dapat menemukan sepotong kain di sana. Maukah kamu pergi dan memeriksanya?

English: Thank you. Please check around for the pattern in the Hill of Shade. Oh! Please be careful because there is something very fierce over there!
Indonesian: Terima kasih, Tolong periksa dengan seksama pola yang ada di Hill of Shade. Oh! Harap berhati-hati karena ada sesuatu yang sangat ganas di sana!

English: I understand but if you ever get the chance would you please check?
Indonesian: Aku mengerti, tapi jika kamu sempat, maukah kamu memeriksanya?

English: Iblis above, you look terrible. I appreciate your hard work. You did exceptional work. Let me compare the two cloth pieces.
Indonesian: Iblis di atas, kau terlihat mengerikan. Aku menghargai kerja kerasmu. Kamu melakukan pekerjaan yang luar biasa. Biar kucoba membandingkan dua kain itu.

English: Maybe the monster I mentioned earlier was too much for you to handle? You can try again if you wish or not up to you.
Indonesian: Mungkin monster yang aku sebutkan sebelumnya terlalu berat untuk kamu tangani? Kau dapat mencobanya lagi jika mau.

English: Please check around for the pattern in the Hill of Shade. Oh! Please be careful because there is something very fierce over there!
Indonesian: Tolong cari disekitar di Hill of Shade. Oh! Harap berhati-hati karena ada sesuatu yang sangat ganas di sana!

English: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: History of Hardship
Indonesian: Chapter 2 Hill of Shade: History of Hardship

English: I finished checking the data that Hachal provided. Please deliver this to Hachal.
Indonesian: Aku selesai memeriksa data yang diberikan Hachal. Tolong kirimkan ini ke Dia.

English: I hope you will continue to be as lucky as you have been.
Indonesian: Aku harap Kamu akan terus beruntung seperti ini seterusnya.

English: If not you then who? No one can take this job!
Indonesian: Kalau bukan kamu lalu siapa? Tak ada lagi yang dapat menyelesaikan pekerjaan ini!

English: Hmm... History of Hardship. So did he give this to you? Excellent. If he says this will be useful then I am sure it will.
Indonesian: Hmm.. History of Hardship. Jadi dia memberikan ini padamu? Bagus sekali. Jika dia mengatakan ini akan berguna maka aku yakin itu akan berguna.

English: See you later. Take care.
Indonesian: Sampai ketemu lagi. Jaga dirimu.

English: Did Rovanett say anything? That makes no sense. Please visit her again. She must have something to say to you.
Indonesian: Apakah Rovanett mengatakan sesuatu? Itu tidak masuk akal. Tolong temui dia lagi. Dia pasti memiliki sesuatu untuk dikatakan padamu.

English: I finished checking the data which Hachal requested. Please deliver this to Hachal.
Indonesian: Aku selesai memeriksa data yang diminta Hachal. Tolong kirimkan ini ke Dia.

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician
Indonesian: Bab 3 - Purple Magician

English: Hey. It seems like the altar and Magic Troupe have something to do with...
Indonesian: Hei, sepertinya Altar and Magic Troupe ada kaitannya dengan..

English: ...the Purple Magician in this book. History of Hardship. Only it says that the Black Magician and the Magician in Purple are the same person. The same person that fought alongside the heroes in the Hero Wars. That does not make sense.
Indonesian: ..The Purple Magician dalam buku ini. History of Hardship. Disana dikatakan jika The Black Magician dan The purple Magician adalah orang yang sama. Orang yang sama yang bertarung bersama para Hero dalam Hero Wars. Tidak masuk akal.

English: It is something really unbelievable, but it is also something we should believe.
Indonesian: Itu adalah sesuatu yang benar-benar tidak dapat dipercaya, tetapi juga sesuatu yang harus kita percayai.

English: I think this is the best I can do for now but I will never stop looking for the truth.
Indonesian: Aku rasa ini adalah yang terbaik yang bisa kulakukan untuk saat ini, tapi aku tidak akan pernah berhenti mencari kebenaran.

English: You! I want you to show this to someone. Can you do that right now?
Indonesian: Kamu! Aku ingin Kamu menunjukkan ini kepada seseorang. Bisakah Kamu melakukannya sekarang?

English: Yes! Please deliver this to Gothante in Saint City. He is he head of the History Society.
Indonesian: Ya! Tolong kirimkan ini ke Gothante di Saint City. Dia adalah kepala di History Society.

English: I understand that you have other things to do. But this is very important. Come back soon.
Indonesian: Aku paham kamu memiliki hal lain untuk dilakukan. Tapi ini sangatlah penting. Kembalilah segera.

English: Hey! Long time no see! Did you meet Hachal? What is this?
Indonesian: Hai! Lama tidak bertemu! Apa Kau bertemu Hachal? Apa ini?

English: Oh... Bubble protect us! Is this true? Oh... Oh... This is too big to deal with alone.
Indonesian: Oh.. Bubble, lindungi kami! Apa ini benar? Oh.. Oh.. Ini terlalu besar untuk dihadapi sendirian.

English: I am really glad to see you again, but did Hachal tell you to meet me? For what?
Indonesian: Aku sangat senang bertemu denganmu lagi, tapi apakah Hachal menyuruhmu bertemu denganku? Untuk apa?

English: Please deliver this to Gothante in Saint City.
Indonesian: Tolong kirimkan ini ke Gothante di Saint City.

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Secret of the Altar
Indonesian: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Secret of the Altar

English: Hmm... I have some good theories but we are going to need more information about the altar and the Magic Troupe.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Aku punya beberapa teori bagus tapi kita akan membutuhkan lebih banyak informasi tentang Altar dan The Magic Troupe.

English: I think there is something in the altar. I have a strong feeling that we could find something there if we look closely enough.
Indonesian: Aku pikir ada sesuatu di altar. Aku memiliki firasat kuat kalau kita dapat menemukan sesuatu di sana jika kita memeriksa lebih dekat.

English: Listen. This is very important. Just stick with this until the end. Would you?
Indonesian: Dengarkan. Ini sangat penting. Kamu akan melakukannya sampai akhirkan?

English: Please check the altar until you can find some evidence.
Indonesian: Tolong periksa Altar sampai kamu bisa menemukan beberapa bukti.

English: What could be more important than this? Oh fine, just go.
Indonesian: Memangnya ada yang lebih penting dari ini? Baiklah, pergi saja.

English: Hmm... Everything is written in an ancient language. But we can translate it. Thanks.
Indonesian: Hmm.. Semuanya tertulis dalam bahasa Kuno. Untungnya kita dapat menerjemahkannya. Terima kasih.

English: Please come back to me after the translation is over. Let me bring this book to the translator.
Indonesian: Biarkan aku yang membawa buku ini ke penerjemah. Kembalilah lagi nanti saat selesai.

English: You can check all of the 3 altars, bring any evidence you find at any of them.
Indonesian: Kamu bisa memeriksa ketiga Altar itu dan bawa bukti apapun yang kamu temukan disana.

English: Please check the altar until you find out something of importance.
Indonesian: Tolong periksa altar sampai Kamu menemukan sesuatu yang penting.

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: A Mysterious Bead.
Indonesian: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: A Mysterious Bead.

English: I have finished translating the book. The Purple Magician and the Black Magician are the same person! Just as Hachal said!
Indonesian: Aku telah selesai menerjemahkan bukunya. The Purple Magician dan The Black Magician ternyata orang yang sama! Tepat seperti perkataan Hachal!

English: It looks like the purple altar was made by the Magician in Purple for some kind of religious service.
Indonesian: Sepertinya Altar ungu dibuat oleh The Purple Magician untuk semacam kegiatan keagamaan.

English: It seems that they were attempting to transcend to a better existence but how?
Indonesian: Sepertinya mereka berusaha berubah menjadi lebih kuat, namun bagaimana caranya?

English: As always, I have a few good theories but I need more data. Always more data! I want answers now!
Indonesian: Seperti biasa, aku punya beberapa teori, tapi aku butuh lebih banyak data. Selalu kekuraangan data! Aku ingin jawabannya sekarang!

English: Would you help me again? I can see the curiosity in your eyes, same as mine. Am I right?
Indonesian: Maukah Kamu membantuku lagi? Aku bisa melihat rasa ingin tahu di matamu, sama sepertiku. Benarkan?

English: Very well! Then please check the Field of Bubble and the Hill of Shade more carefully. I am really sure there is something over there!
Indonesian: Baiklah! Kalau begitu tolong cek Field of Bubble dan Hill of Shade lebih teliti. Aku sangat yakin ada sesuatu tertinggal disana!

English: Fine, return to me when you get the time.
Indonesian: Baik, Temui aku saat kau sedang senggang.

English: Oh... What a strong magical power this bead has... Oh... What a surprise!
Indonesian: Hmm.. Semuanya tertulis dalam bahasa Kuno. Untungnya kita dapat menerjemahkannya. Terima kasih.

English: Good job...But something like this is completely out of my range. Let me think for a moment. Yes, I have it!
Indonesian: Kerja bagus. Tapi sesuatu seperti ini benar-benar diluar bidangku. Biarkan aku berpikir sejenak. Ya, aku memilikinya!

English: Please deliver this to the Great Magician Laola in Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Mohon serahkan ini ke Great Magician Laola di Darkon 3.

English: I have a bad feeling about this. I have never been wrong about anything. I hope I am this time.
Indonesian: Aku punya firasat buruk tentang hal ini. Firasatku tidak pernah salah sebelumnya. Aku harap kali ini salah.

English: Please, once more, check the Field of Bubble and the Hill of Shade. I am sure that there is more to be found!
Indonesian: Tolong cek Field of Bubble dan Hill of Shade sekali lagi. Aku yakin masih ada sesuatu yang bisa ditemukan!

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Great Magician Laola
Indonesian: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: The Great Magician Laola

English: Oh, you are here finally. I cannot say that your arrival is entirely a surprise. I am Laola the Great Magician *cough* *cough*.
Indonesian: Oh, akhirnya kamu di sini. Aku sama sekali tidak terkejut dengan kedatanganmu. Aku Laola The Great Magician *batuk* *batuk*.

English: I can see in your face that you do not believe me. I guess, looking at myself, I do not look like such a Great Magician.
Indonesian: Sepertinya kamu tidak mempercayaiku. Aku rasa penampilanku memang tidak seperti seorang Great Magician.

English: Magic always has a high cost and I used some terrible magic back then.
Indonesian: Magic selalu meembutuhkan pengorbanan yang besar. Dulu aku pernah menggunakan Magic yang cukup mengerikan.

English: But never mind that, show me the bead you brought, I can feel its power from here.
Indonesian: Tapi sudahlah, tunjukkan padaku manik yang kau bawa, aku bisa merasakan kekuatannya dari sini.

English: Yes, this is it. I have to check this first, so please come back to me in a minute.
Indonesian: Ya, ini dia. Aku harus memeriksa ini dulu, jadi tolong kembali padaku nanti.

English: *cough* *cough* Hey, do not be too greedy. Something that powerful could corrupt you to your core. *cough* *cough*
Indonesian: *uhuk* *uhuk* Hei, jangan terlalu serakah. Sesuatu yang sekuat itu dapat merusakmu sampai ke inti. *uhuk* *uhuk*

English: Hmmm I did not know he could make something like this, but I cannot say that I am surprised.
Indonesian: Hmmm Aku tidak tahu dia bisa membuat sesuatu seperti ini, tapi ini sama sekali tidak membuatku terkejut.

English: It is no secret why I am called the Great Magician. Though, I have learned that being a great magician, does not make you a great person. *cough*
Indonesian: Bukanlah rahasia mengapa aku disebut Great Magician. Tetapi, menjadi Great Magician tidak akan membuatmu menjadi orang yang hebat. *uhuk*

English: This is it. I have to check this first, so please come back to me in a minute.
Indonesian: Ini dia. Aku harus memeriksa ini dulu, jadi tolong kembali padaku nanti.

English: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: Identity of the Purple Magician
Indonesian: Chapter 3 Purple Magician: Identity of the Purple Magician

English: *cough* *cough* This bead, with all of its power, was crafted by the only pupil I ever had, Lapranche. *cough*
Indonesian: *uhuk* *uhuk* Manik ini, dengan seluruh kekuatannya, dibuat oleh satu-satunya murid yang pernah kumiliki, Lapranche. *uhuk*

English: She is the Black Magician. I was also the Black Magician at one point. We have often been confused for each other throughout history. *Sigh* It seems that Lapranche found out about them.
Indonesian: Dia adalah Penyihir Hitam. Saya juga Penyihir Hitam pada satu titik. Kami sering bingung satu sama lain sepanjang sejarah. *Huh* Sepertinya Lapranche mengetahui tentang mereka.

English: You believe in them now right? If you are looking to me for answers about what they were, you are wasting your time. All I know is that they created all of Madrigal and that they were once agents of Rhisis.
Indonesian: Kamu percaya pada mereka sekarang kan? Jika Kamu mencariku untuk jawaban tentang apa itu, Kamu membuang-buang waktumu. Yang Aku tahu hanyalah mereka menciptakan Madrigal dan mereka pernah menjadi bagian dari agen Rhisis.

English: Yes Lapranche found out about them and attempted to bring them back to this world with the Purple Magic, the same magic that drained me of so much.
Indonesian: Ya, Lapranche mengetahui tentang mereka dan berusaha membawa mereka kembali ke dunia ini dengan Purple Magic, Magic yang sama yang membuatku kelelahan.

English: Do me a favor would you?
Indonesian: Maukah kau melakukan sesuatu untukku?

English: You are afraid. I am not surprised. The world hangs in the balance. Who would not be scared? Go on. Get out of here.
Indonesian: Aku tidak terkejut mau merasa takut. Dunia tergantung pada keseimbangan. Siapa yang tidak takut? Lanjutkan. Keluar dari sini.

English: What a terrible... Where did they come from? Did you see them? Renegade Blades seemingly hired to kill me. It would appear that I know too much. What is that you have there?
Indonesian: Mengerikan .. Dari mana mereka berasal? Apakah kamu melihat mereka? Renegade Blades tampaknya disewa untuk membunuhku. Sepertinya aku tahu terlalu banyak. Apa yang Kamu bawa itu?

English: Oh, this! Is this the book that Laola wrote? Amazing
Indonesian: Oh! Apa ini buku yang ditulis oleh Laola? Luarbiasa

English: Fine. Now we can begin the real reconstruction of the history of our world. Thank you. Oh, I may need you later on. See you then.
Indonesian: Baik. Sekarang kita dapat memulai rekonstruksi sejarah dunia kita yang sebenarnya. Terima kasih. Oh, aku mungkin membutuhkanmu nanti. Sampai jumpa.

English: You could not find Loala? It is not like he is hiding or anything. Please try again.
Indonesian: Kamu tidak bisa menemukan Loala? Tidak mungkin dia bersembunyi. Coba cari lagi.

English: Please deliver this book to Gothante. This may not be enough to save the world but it should be useful. Thank you and good luck.
Indonesian: Tolong antarkan buku ini ke Gothante. Ini mungkin tidak cukup untuk menyelamatkan dunia, tapi paling tidak, akan berguna. Terima kasih dan semoga berhasil.

English: Chapter 4 Their Shadow
Indonesian: Bab 4 - Their Shadow

English: Oh, nice to see you again. I have found something based on the data you gave me. You know more than most about the Clowns at this point.
Indonesian: Ah, senang bertemu denganmu lagi. Aku telah menemukan sesuatu berdasarkan data yang kau berikan padaku. Kamu tahu lebih banyak tentang Clown pada titik ini.

English: People have been talking about them for some time now. They are known as three devils that created our continents on accident and are bent on destroying them. During the Hero War, they were said to stand against the heroes of our land.
Indonesian: Orang-orang telah membicarakan mereka akhir-akhir ini. Mereka dikenal sebagai tiga iblis yang menciptakan benua kita secara tidak sengaja dan bertekad untuk menghancurkannya. Menurut rumor, selama Hero War, mereka menjadi lawan dari pahlawan kita.

English: Lapranche was there, at the end of the Hero War, she was made the slave of One of the three Clown Gods. Shade, Goddess of Evil. Shade, marrying her Godly presence to the great power of Laola, attempted to destroy Bubble, God of Good, while Iblis, God of Neutrality, watched unmoved. Bubble rallied the heroes of Madrigal and stood against Shade with the strongest army our world has ever know at her back.
Indonesian: Lapranche ada di sana, di akhir Hero War, dia dijadikan budak salah satu dari tiga Clown Gods, Shade. Goddess of Evil Shade, menyatukan kekuatan Dewanya dengan kekuatan besar Laola, untuk menghancurkan God of Good Bubble. Sementara God of Neutrality, Iblis, hanya diam menyaksikan. Bubble mengumpulkan para pahlawan Madrigal dibelakangnya dan melawan Shade dengan pasukan terkuat yang pernah ada di dunia kita.

English: Poor Lapranche, the things she must have gone through And all this history has been distorted by the History Society. Curse them!
Indonesian: Lapranche yang malang, hal yang dulu pernah dia lalui dan semua sejarah telah di distorsi oleh History Society. Terkutuklah mereka!

English: *sigh* Would you help me return this to Martinyc. She deserves to know what she helped uncover.
Indonesian: *haah* Maukah Kamu membantuku mengembalikan ini ke Martinyc. Dia berhak tahu apa yang sedang dia bantu.

English: I see, you have something important to do. Would you come back to me after finishing that?
Indonesian: Aku mengerti kamu memiliki urusan yang penting untuk dilakukan. Maukah kamu kembali menemuiku setelah urusanmu itu?

English: Long time no see! Are you coming back to let me know that I was right?
Indonesian: Lama tidak bertemu! Apakah Kamu kembali untuk memberi tahuku bahwa aku benar?

English: Yeah! I knew it! By the way, what is that?
Indonesian: Ya! Aku tahu itu! Ngomong-ngomong, apa itu?

English: Oh, now I wish I had been wrong! Thank you for bringing this to me. We will see each other again. Goodbye.
Indonesian: Oh, sekarang aku harap aku salah! Terima kasih telah membawakan ini untukku. Kita akan bertemu lagi. Selamat tinggal.

English: Have you brought something from the History Society? No? Then are you coming back just to talk to me? I am too shy for that.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu membawa sesuatu dari History Society? Tidak ada? Apa kamu kembali hanya untuk berbicara denganku? Aku terlalu malu untuk itu.

English: Here is all the data I have. Please deliver this to Martinyc.
Indonesian: Ini semua data yang kumiliki. Tolong kirimkan ini ke Martinyc.

English: Journal of an Adventurer
Indonesian: Journal of an Adventurer

English: Journal of an Adventurer (1)
Indonesian: Journal of an Adventurer (1)

English: Hello Adventurer. Although you don't know me, I must ask a favor of you. I have found something… incredible. Bring it to the Mayor of Darkon right away.
Indonesian: Halo Adventurer. Meskipun Kamu tidak mengenaliku, Aku harus meminta bantuanmu. Aku telah menemukan sesuatu… luar biasa. Bawa ke Mayor Darkon segera.

English: Thank you, I am in your debt.
Indonesian: Terima Kasih. Aku berhutang padamu.

English: You can not understand the implications of this quest… He needs this book!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak dapat memahami implikasi dari quest ini… Dia membutuhkan buku ini!

English: You seem to have something important to say, what is it?
Indonesian: Kamu sepertinya punya hal penting untuk diutarakan, ada apa?

English: OH MY! I can't believe this! The diary of the adventurer Bartholomew Hunt…
Indonesian: ASTAGA! Aku tidak percaya ini! Buku harian Adventurer Bartholomew Hunt…

English: Deliver the Diary to the Mayor of Darkon.
Indonesian: Kirimkan Diary itu ke Mayor of Darkon.

English: Journal of an Adventurer (2)
Indonesian: Journal of an Adventurer (2)

English: You should hear this. This is the diary of the adventurer Bartholomew Hunt. My grand father knew of him, he was a legend at one time…
Indonesian: Kamu harusnya pernah mendengar ini. Ini adalah Diary dari Adventurer Bartholomew Hunt. Kakekku kenal dengannya, Dia adalah legenda pada saat itu...

English: HA! Look at this… he is claiming that he discovered a new continent. New continent? How absurd!
Indonesian: HA! Liat ini... Dia mengklaim bahwa dia menemukan continent baru. Continent baru? Tidak masuk akal!

English: I can't read the writing here, it appears to be a code of some sort. Maybe the Sage Radion can figure out what this writing is. Please bring him the diary.
Indonesian: Aku tidak bisa membaca tulisan ini, sepertinya ini semacam kode. Mungkin Sage Radion bisa menerjemahkan tulisan apa ini. Tolong bawa Diary ini padanya.

English: Sage Radion is is in the Northern Leren Mountains, near the Fountain of Dead Person.
Indonesian: Sage Radion berada di Northern Leren Mountains, dekat dengan Fountain of Dead Person.

English: You are to busy? If this information is accurate do you know what this could mean?
Indonesian: Apa kamu sibuk? Jika informasi ini akurate, apa kamu tahu apa maksudnya ini?

English: What brings you to see me?
Indonesian: Apa yang membuatmu menemuiku?

English: If the Mayor of Darkon sent you, it must be important. Let me see the Diary.
Indonesian: Jika Mayor Darkon yang mengirimmu, ini pasti hal yang penting. Biar kulihat Diarynya.

English: Find the Sage Radion to decode the writing in the Diary.
Indonesian: Temukan Sage Radion untuk memecahkan tulisan kode didalam Diary.

English: Journal of an Adventurer (3)
Indonesian: Journal of an Adventurer (3)

English: Why, this is not a code… Amazing! The language of the Ancient Tribe. This Bartholomew Hunt must have really known his stuff. Maybe there is more to this…
Indonesian: Tunggu, ini bukan kode… Luar biasa! Bahasa Ancient Tribe. Bartholomew hunt ini pasti sangat tahu banyak hal. Mungkin ada yang lebih dari ini...

English: I have translated the Ancient language. Bring this Translated Document to the Mayor of Darkon. Keep it safe, this is truly a special thing!
Indonesian: Aku telah menerjemahkan bahasa Ancient. Bawa Translated Document ini ke Mayor of Darkon. Simpan dengan aman, ini adalah benda yang spesial!

English: You are playing an important role in historic events.
Indonesian: Anda memainkan peran penting dalam peristiwa bersejarah.

English: I can't believe it! The possibility of a new land and you are not interested?
Indonesian: Aku tidak percaya ini! Kemungkinan adanya tanah baru dan Kau tidak tertarik???

English: You can't imagine how eagerly I've been waiting for you to return. Have you met the Sage Radion? Is there news?
Indonesian: Kamu tidak dapat membayangkan betapa bersemangatnya aku menunggumu kembali. Apa kamu bertemu dengan Sage Radion? Apakah ada kabar?

English: He was able to translate it? Wonderful. Now we can see if this is real or just a wild goose chase… Give me a moment to read through this.
Indonesian: Dia mampu menerjemahkannya? Luar biasa. Sekarang kita bisa melihat apakah ini nyata atau hanya hal yang sia-sia… Beri aku waktu untuk membaca ini.

English: Bring the translated document to the Mayor of Darkon.
Indonesian: Bawa Translated Dokumen ke Mayor of Darkon.

English: Chain
Indonesian: Chain

English: General
Indonesian: General

English: Office
Indonesian: Office

English: Event
Indonesian: Event

English: Don’t worry about the pay. So, please hurry up.
Indonesian: Jangan khawatir tentang bayarannya. Jadi, tolong cepat.

English: It is very important, so you'd better hurry!
Indonesian: Ini sangatlah penting, jadi lebih baik kau bergegas!

English: The Mayor of Darkon is waiting for you. Hurry!
Indonesian: Mayor of Darkon sedang menunggumu. Cepat!

English: Chapter 1 The Emerging Darkness
Indonesian: Bab 1 - The Emerging Darkness

English: Chapter 2 Finding Lost Memory
Indonesian: Bab 2 - Finding Lost Memory

English: Chapter 3 Return of Scattered Heroes
Indonesian: Bab 3 Return of Scattered Heroes

English: Initiation of Champions
Indonesian: Initiation of Champions

English: Hmm, I sense an aura of greatness from you young warrior, yet a mind clouded with uncertainty and doubt.
Indonesian: Hmm, saya merasakan aura yang kuat darimu pejuang muda, namun pikiranmu diselimuti ketidakpastian dan keraguan.

English: I intend to help you realize your true inner potential. Though I am but a stranger to you, I need you to trust in me. My true identity will be revealed soon enough.
Indonesian: Aku bermaksud membantu mengeluarkan potensimu yang terpendam. Meskipun aku hanyalah orang asing bagimu, aku ingin kamu mempercayaiku. Identitasku yang sebenarnya akan segera terungkap.

English: Apparently I was correct in choosing you. Well then! Please eliminate 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs residing in Northern Flaris.
Indonesian: Ternyata aku benar dalam memilihmu. Baiklah! Tolong habisi 10 Lawolf & 5 Grownup Lawolf yang berkeliaran di Northern Flaris.

English: Hmm, apparently I made a mistake. I believed you to be the champion I was searching for.
Indonesian: Hmm, rupanya aku melakukan kesalahan. Aku percaya Kaulah Champion yang aku cari.

English: The citizens grow ever more fearful of this situation! Please get rid of 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs.
Indonesian: Warga semakin takut dengan situasi ini! Tolong singkirkan 10 Lawolf & 5 Grownup Lawolf.

English: Kill 10 Lawolfs & 5 Grownup Lawolfs and go back to Reonan.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 Lawolf & 5 Grownup Lawolf lalu kembali ke Reonan.

English: Ah! I admire your courage. It appears you could very well be the champion I have sought.
Indonesian: Aku kagum dengan keberanianmu. Sepertinya kamulah Champion yang selama ini aku cari.

English: Bridge to Terror-bithia
Indonesian: Bridge to Terror-bithia

English: But, let us not be too hasty as arrogance may lead to an early grave. Though vicious, slaying a few lawolves is just the beginning…
Indonesian: Tapi, janganlah kita terlalu tergesa-gesa karena kesombongan dapat menyebabkan kematian dini. Meskipun kejam, membunuh beberapa Lawolves hanyalah permulaan ...

English: Here is your next task. Rumors have it, numerous villagers have been attacked by a monstrous Lord Demian just outside of Flaris. Please defeat him and return to me
Indonesian: Here is your next task. Rumors have it, numerous villagers have been attacked by a monstrous Lord Demian just outside of Flaris. Please defeat him and return to me

English: The Lord Demian has been seen wandering nearby the Madren Town recently so search for him there.
Indonesian: The Lord Demian has been seen wandering nearby the Madren Town recently so search for him there.

English: What? I know I ask much of you, but I never thought you would turn down a chance to prove your worth.
Indonesian: Apa? Aku mungkin meminta terlalu banyak, tapi aku tidak pernah berpikir kalau kau akan menolak kesempatan untuk membuktikan nilaimu.

English: The Lord Demian can be found nearby Madren Town amongst the other Demians.
Indonesian: The Lord Demian can be found nearby Madren Town amongst the other Demians.

English: Get rid of the Lord Demian and return to Reonan.
Indonesian: Get rid of the Lord Demian and return to Reonan.

English: Finally, the villagers may rest assured that the Lord Demian shall no longer terrorize them. You have much potential.
Indonesian: Finally, the villagers may rest assured that the Lord Demian shall no longer terrorize them. You have much potential.

English: Weed Whacked!
Indonesian: Weed Whacked!

English: I now have another favor to ask of you. A mysterious curse has turned the once docile Fefern into foul beasts which are ravaging the land. Will you defeat them?
Indonesian: Aku sekarang memiliki permintaan lain padamu. Kutukan misterius telah mengubah Fefern yang dulu jinak menjadi binatang buas yang merusak. Apakah Kamu dapat mengalahkan mereka?

English: Fefern can be found in the Northwest region of Flaris. Please kill 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class Fefern and come back.
Indonesian: Fefern dapat ditmeukan di Barat laut dari Flaris. Tolong habisi 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class fefern dan kembali.

English: So that’s it? You eliminate a giant Rogue, yet tremble at the sight of some mere weeds?
Indonesian: Itu saja? Kamu mangalahkan Giant Rogue, namun gemetar saat melihat beberapa gulma belaka?

English: If you cross the bridge located in Northern Flaris, you will find the Fefern.
Indonesian: Kamu akan menemukan Fefern setelah menyeberangi jembatan di Northern Flaris.

English: It's as I've come to expect. The villagers are rejoicing of your heroic deeds. You my friend, have earned yourself quite a reputation around here.
Indonesian: Ini seperti yang kuharapkan. Penduduk desa bersukacita atas tindakan heroikmu. Temanku, kamu telah memiliki reputasi bagus disini.

English: Kill 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class Fefern and go back to Reonan.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 Fefern & 5 2nd Class Fefern dan kembali ke Reonan.

English: The Mayor's Aid
Indonesian: The Mayor's Aid

English: It appears that word of your selfless exploits has reached the Mayor of Flarine. I believe he has something important about which to speak with you. Please speak with him
Indonesian: Sepertinya berita tentang pencapaianmu telah sampai di telinga Mayor of Flarine. Aku percaya dia memiliki sesuatu yang penting untuk dibicarakan denganmu. Tolong bicaralah dengannya.

English: The Mayor of Flarine can be found in Central Flarine. Please see what it is he requires of you.
Indonesian: Mayor of Flarine bisa ditemukan di Central Flarine. Mohon temui dia.

English: Well, not that I can blame you. I have no time to meddle with politicians.
Indonesian: Yah, bukannya aku bisa menyalahkanmu. Aku tidak punya waktu untuk mencampuri urusan politisi.

English: It is with a warm heart that I welcome you to our humble town young adventurer! The citizens of this town speak highly of all you.
Indonesian: Wahai Adventurer muda, dengan hati yang hangat aku menyambutmu di kota kami yang sederhana! Warga kota ini sangat memuji kalian semua.

English: You haven't met Mayor of Flarine yet?
Indonesian: Kamu belum bertemu Mayor of Flarine?

English: Go speak with the Mayor of Flarine.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Mayor of Flarine.

English: The Furry Menace
Indonesian: The Furry Menace

English: I wanted to meet you personally to thank you for all you have done for us. I don't wish to impose, but I hoped you could again call upon your courage.
Indonesian: Aku ingin bertemu denganmu secara langsung untuk berterimakasih akan semua yang telah kamu lakukan untuk kami. Aku tidak bermaksud untuk memaksa, tapi aku berharap kamu bersedia kembali menunjukkan keberanianmu.

English: Our town guard was once sizeable enough to fend off most of Shade's masquerpets. Now, with each passing day their numbers and power increases, while ours dwindles.
Indonesian: Penjaga kota kami dulunya cukup kuat untuk menangkis serangan Shade Masquerpets. Sekarang, jumlah dan kekuatan mereka semakin meningkat, sementara kita semakin melemah.

English: With that said, could you please help us to exterminate a particularly vicious group of Nyangnyang roaming the lands?
Indonesian: Jadi, bisakah kamu membantu kami untuk memusnahkan kelompok Nyangnyang yang kejam yang berkeliaran di sekitar?

English: Nyangnyang can be found in Northern Flaris, right after crossing the bridge. Killing 10 Cute Nyangnyang & 5 Nyangnyang should be sufficient to aid us.
Indonesian: Nyangnyang dapat ditemui di Nothern Flaris tepat setelah menyeberangi jembatan. Kami akan sangat terbantu jika kamu dapat menghabisi 10 Cute Nyangnyang dan 5 Nyangnyang.

English: I understand your apprehension, but I do hope you will reconsider your decision.
Indonesian: Aku mengerti akan kekhawatiranmu, tapi aku berharap agar kamu dapat mempertimbangkannya kembali.

English: Hah! It is as the citizens have said, you ARE truly a great warrior.
Indonesian: Hah! Tepat seperti yang dikatakan warga, Kamu benar-benar pejuang yang hebat.

English: The Nyangnyang roam the lands right across the bridge of Northern Flaris. Please help us to decrease their numbers!
Indonesian: Nyangnyang berkeliaran tepat di seberang jembatan Northern Flaris. Tolong bantu kami untuk mengurangi jumlah mereka!

English: Kill 10 Cute Nyangnyang & 5 Nyangnyang and return to the Mayor of Flarine.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 Cute Nyangnyang & 5 Nyangnyang lalu kembali ke Mayor of Flarine.

English: Stomping Grounds
Indonesian: Stomping Grounds

English: Given your prior victory, I have another favor to ask. An unwieldy group of bangs have really shaken things up in Northern Flaris. Can we count on you to take care of them?
Indonesian: Mengingat keberhasilanmu sebelumnya, aku memiliki permintaan lain yang ingin kubicarakan. Sekelompok Bangs telah membuat kekacauan di Nothern Flaris. Dapatkah kami mengandalkanmu untuk mengurus mereka?

English: Bangs can be found in North side of Flaris, near by Nyangnyang. Go kill 10 Bang & 5 Captain Bang and come back.
Indonesian: Bang dapat ditemukan di sisi utara dari Flaris, didekat Nyangnyang. Pergi dan habisi 10 Bang dan 5 Captain Bang lalu kembali kesini.

English: Your prior deeds for us are enough to earn my gratitude.
Indonesian: Aku sangat berterima kasih atas semua yang kamu lakukan selama ini.

English: You've taken care of the issue already!? Astonishing! Now our mining operations in the mountains of Flaris may resume!
Indonesian: Kamu sudah selesai mengurus masalah ini!? Luar biasa! Sekarang operasi penambangan kami di Mountain of Flaris dapat dilanjutkan!

English: Bangs can be found in Northern Flaris near the Nyangnyangs. Removing at least 10 Bangs and 5 Captain Bangs should resolve any issues.
Indonesian: Bang dapat ditemukan di dekat Nyangnyang pada Northern Flaris. Menghabisi paling tidak 10 Bang dan 5 Captain Bang akan menyelesaikan masalah ini.

English: Kill 10 Bang & 5 Captain Bang and return to the Mayor of Flarine.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 Bang dan 5 Captain Bang lalu kembali ke Mayor of Flarine.

English: A Hero Emerges!
Indonesian: A Hero Emerges!

English: Know that I, as well as the citizens of Flaris, are forever in your debt. If you are ever in need of assistance, do not hesitate to ask!
Indonesian: Ketahuilah kalau aku, serta seluruh warga Flaris, selamanya berhutang budi kepadamu. Jika kamu membutuhkan bantuan, jangan ragu untuk bertanya!

English: Carry on now young adventurer! I can tell you will accomplish great things. Oh, I believe Reonan was looking for you as well. Won't you speak with him?
Indonesian: Lanjutkan petualanganmu pemuda! Saya dapat melihat jika kau akan memiliki pencapaian yang besar suatu hari nanti. Oh, aku yakin Reonan juga mencarimu. Maukah kamu berbicara dengannya?

English: Before you leave, please tell Reonan thanks for bringing you to my attention. He, as well, has my gratitude.
Indonesian: Sebelum pergi, tolong sampaikan pada Reonan akan rasa terima kasihku karena telah mengenalkanmu.

English: Well, I don't mind if you stay here. Who knows, perhaps you might even be the Mayor of Flarine one day! Haha!
Indonesian: Aku akan senang jika kamu mau menetap disini. Siapa tahu suatu hari nanti kamu akan menjadi Mayor of Flarin! hahaha!

English: A safe return I see? You no doubt have completed the mayor's request. Oh and his gratitude? Can't say I've ever trusted the word of a politician, but I will take it! Hah!
Indonesian: Kembali dengan aman? Kamu pastinya telah memenuhi permintaan walikota. Oh, dia mengucapkan terima kasih padaku? Aku memang tidak percaya perkataan politisi, tapi aku akan menerimanya! Haha!

English: Reonan is looking for you.
Indonesian: Reonan sedang mencarimu.

English: Go meet with Reonan.
Indonesian: Pergi temui Reonan.

English: Dispatch to Saint City
Indonesian: Dispatch to Saint City

English: Nonetheless, because of your work, it appears peace has finally been restored to Flarine. Alas, Madrigal is a world ripe with distress.
Indonesian: Karena jasamulah Flarine dapat menemukan kedamaian yang mereka idamkan di Madrigal, dunia yang penuh dengan kekacauan.

English: I have received word from a contact in Saint City that masquerpet attacks are steadily on the rise. It also seems that the concerns of the towns people go unheeded.
Indonesian: Aku mendapatkan laporan dari Saint City jika serangan Masquerpet disana semakin meningkat. Sepertinya kekhawatiran orang-orang kota juga tidak dihiraukan.

English: It looks like this could once again be your chance to prove your true worth. Make haste to Saint City and meet my contact Leann!
Indonesian: Sepertinya ini sekali lagi bisa menjadi kesempatan untuk membuktikan kemampuanmu yang sebenarnya. Bergegaslah ke Saint City dan temui Leann!

English: You can reach Saint City by flying west from this location using an Airship from Central Flarine or your own Flying device. You may also purchase a blinkwing of Saint Morning from Marche, the resident magician.
Indonesian: Kamu dapat mencapai Saint City dari sini dengan terbang kearah barat menggunakan Airship dari Central Flarine atau menggunakan Flying Devicemu sendiri. Kamu juga dapat membeli Blinkwing of Saint Morning dari Marche.

English: Hmm, I guess this worlds call for heroes is currently falling upon deaf ears.
Indonesian: Hmm, aku kira panggilan dunia untuk pahlawan ini saat ini tidak didengarkan.

English: Where is the savior that Reonan was talking about? I don't have time to talk to you. This is not a good time for me to guide you around!! Traveler!!.
Indonesian: Di mana pahlawan yang dibicarakan Reonan? Aku tidak punya waktu untuk berbicara denganmu. Ini bukan saat yang tepat untuk memandumu berkeliling pengelana!!.

English: My contact's name is Leann. You can meet her in the Saint Morning square, in front of the Cathedral.
Indonesian: Kenalanku bernama Leann. Kamu dapat bertemu dengannya di Saint Morning Square yang tepat berada didepan Cathedral.

English: Meet Leann in front of the Cathedral in Saint City.
Indonesian: Temui Leann didepan Cathedral di Saint City.

English: A Warm Reception?
Indonesian: A Warm Reception?

English: Sorry, I'm busy looking for someone so hurry… What did you say? YOU are the hero Reonan spoke of!? I imagined you to look, oh… a tad more heroic?
Indonesian: Maaf, aku sibuk mencari seseorang jadi cepatlah... Apa yang kamu katakan? KAMU adalah pahlawan yang dibicarakan Reonan!? Aku kira penampilanmu akan terlihat... sedikit lebih heroik?

English: Well, where are my manners? Heh. Welcome to Saint City, the biggest town of Madrigal, supplier of airships and… oh sorry, you probably don't care about any of this!
Indonesian: Maafkan atas ketidaksopananku. Omong-omong, selamat datang di Saint City, kota terbesar di Madrigal, pemasok dari Airship dan... oh maaf, kamu mungkin tidak terlalu peduli soal ini!

English: Reonan DID send you here for more than listening to me ramble about our town, but hey! I'm a tour guide, it's what I do! Anyway! The mayor requests your presence. Please speak with him.
Indonesian: Reonan MUNGKIN mengirimmu kesini bukan untuk mendengarkan ocehanku, tapi mau bagaimana lagi! aku adalah pemandu wisata, mengoceh adalah keseharianku! oh iya, Mayor mengundangmu, mohon temui dia.

English: The Mayor of Saint City is standing behind me. He'll inform you more of the situation at hand!
Indonesian: Orang dibelakangku ini adalah Mayor of Saint City. Dialah yang akan menjelaskan padamu lebih detail tentang situasi saat ini!

English: Don't feel like it? Just don't expect me to babysit you all day long! I'm a busy gal ya know!
Indonesian: Tidak suka? Jangan harap aku akan menjagamu sepanjang hari! Aku gadis yang sibuk kau tahu!

English: Ah! So you must be the famed hero of Flaris I've heard so much about? I guess I owe you my thanks already for making the trip to Saint City.
Indonesian: Ah! Jadi kamu Hero of Flaris yang selama ini kudengar? Aku rasa aku harus berterimakasih padamu karena telah menyempatkan waktumu untuk mampir ke Saint City.

English: What? Lost? The Mayor is right behind me. Apparently your vision is as bad as Reonan's choice in heroes.
Indonesian: Apa? Hilang? Pak Mayor tepat di belakangku. Ternyata penglihatanmu sama buruknya dengan kepribadian si Reonan.

English: Meet Mayor of Saint City.
Indonesian: Meet Mayor of Saint City.

English: Corrupted Cabbage Patch
Indonesian: Corrupted Cabbage Patch

English: Leann and Reonan have informed me of your imminent arrival. Word of your deeds has also spread amongst our citizens. You must be quite an outstanding person for someone your age.
Indonesian: Leann dan Reonan telah memberitahuku tentang kedatanganmu. Berita tentang perbuatanmu telah menyebar di antara warga kami. Pencapaianmu sangat luar biasa mengingat usiamu yang masih muda.

English: Oh? You want to know about Reonan? He's even sort of a mystery to me. Some say he can slay a Meteonyker with his bare hands. Tall tales aside, I have a request for you…
Indonesian: Oh? Kamu ingin tahu soal Reonan? Aku sendiri tidak tahu banyak soal dia. Bahkan ada rumor mengatakan kalau dia dapat menghabisi meteonyker hanya dengan tangan kosong. Omong-omong, cukup soal itu, aku ada sesuatu yang harus kukatakan padamu...

English: An army of ravenous plants are emerging and threatening the safety of our citizens. They seem to be the result of some mysterious dark magic.
Indonesian: Sekelompok monster tanaman muncul dan mengancam keselamatan warga kami. Mereka sepertinya tercipta dari eksperimen Dark Magic yang misterius.

English: Known as Wagsaac, these plants eat everything standing in their way. Please head south of Saint City and defeat 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac.
Indonesian: Namanya Wagsaac, monster tanaman akan memakan apapun yang ada didekat mereka. Tolong pergilah kebagian selatan dari Saint City dan kalahkan 10 Small Wagsaac serta 5 Wagsaac.

English: Hmm, it appears that the stories of your selfless heroism were a little exaggerated.
Indonesian: Hmm, sepertinya cerita keheroikanmu yang tanpa pamrih itu sedikit dilebih-lebihkan.

English: It appears that the tales of your deeds are true! With the Wagsaac threat contained, our guards can once again focus on the defense of Saint City!
Indonesian: Tampaknya kisah heroik yang kamu lakukan memang benar! Dengan ancaman Wagsaac berhasil ditanggulangi, penjaga kami dapat sekali lagi fokus pada pertahanan Saint City!

English: Please defeat 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac South of the Town. Our guards are already at working trying to eliminate this menace and could use assistance!
Indonesian: Mohon kalahkan 10 Small Wagsaac dan 5 Wagsaac yang berada di South of the Town. Para penjaga kota telah berada disana mencoba melawan mereka, segeralah bantu!

English: Kill 10 Small Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac and return to the Mayor of Saint City.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 SMall Wagsaac & 5 Wagsaac lalu kembali ke Mayor of Saint City.

English: Pint Sized Hero
Indonesian: Pint Sized Hero

English: It appears as if I must again call upon you for a favor. We have reports of a missing child, but unfortunately our guards are too occupied to help.
Indonesian: Sepertinya aku harus meminta bantuanmu lagi. Kami memiliki laporan tentang seorang anak yang hilang, tetapi sayangnya penjaga kami terlalu sibuk untuk membantu.

English: The boy, named Nerco, apparently left a note to his mother saying he wanted to defeat monsters just like the Hero of Flaris! For his sake, please find and protect him!
Indonesian: Anak laki-laki bernama Nerco itu rupanya meninggalkan pesan kepada ibunya yang mengatakan bahwa dia ingin mengalahkan monster seperti Hero of Flaris! Tolong temukan dan lindungi dia!

English: His mother believes him to be in Southern Saint Morning, attempting to take on the Mia by himself. Please protect him by defeating 10 Small Mia & 5 Mia.
Indonesian: Ibunya percaya dia berada di Southern Saint Morning, mencoba untuk melawan Mia sendiri. Tolong lindungi dia dengan mengalahkan 10 Small Mia & 5 Mia.

English: What? Why am I asking you to find just a KID? Kids are the future of Madrigal. You have a bad mental attitude.
Indonesian: Apa? Mengapa aku memintamu untuk mencari ANAK KECIL? Itu karena mereka adalah masa depan Madrigal. Kamu memiliki sikap mental yang buruk.

English: Tremble ghosts, for I am the mightiest warrior in the… wait, who are you? You are interrupting my ghost slaying!
Indonesian: Gemetarlah kalian para hantu, karena aku prajurit terkuat di... tunggu, siapa kamu?? Hei, kamu mengganggu kegiatan pembasmian hantuku!

English: Hurry and find Nerco before the Mia get to him!
Indonesian: Segera mungkin menemukan Nerco sebelum Mia menangkapnya!

English: Kill 10 Small Mia & 5 Mia and locate Nerco.
Indonesian: Habisi 10 Small Mia dan 5 Mia serta cari lokasi Nerco.

English: A Mother's Fury
Indonesian: A Mother's Fury

English: What? You came here to find me? You must have me confused with someone else. I'm not a lost child, I'm a mighty warrior!!!
Indonesian: Apa? Kamu datang kemari mencariku? Kamu pasti salah orang. Aku bukanlah anak yang hilang, aku adalah pahlawan yang kuat!!!

English: Ok, so maybe I did get just a little lost. WHAT!? My mom already reported me missing!? Oh am I in trouble. Mom is gonna take my upgraded wooden sword!!!
Indonesian: Oke, jadi mungkin aku sedikit tersesat. APA!? Ibuku sudah melaporkan kalau aku hilang!? Oh tidak, Ibu akan menyita pedang kayu yang susah payah kupgrade ini!!!

English: Hey... um... YOU!! I need a favor. Please go and tell my mom I'm at a friend's house and will be home for dinner! If not, I am going to throw such a tantrum.
Indonesian: Hei.. um.. KAMU!! Aku butuh bantuan. Tolong pergi dan beri tahu ibuku kalau aku di rumah teman dan akan pulang untuk makan malam! Jika tidak, Aku akan berulah.

English: Hehe, I knew you would accept my request. Please tell my mom everything is fine. Don't worry about me, I will go back soon enough!
Indonesian: Hehe, aku tahu kamu akan menerimanya. Tolong beritahu ibuku kalau semuanya baik-baik saja. Jangan khawatir, aku akan kembali segera!

English: No! No! I won't go! I won't go! I won't go! You can't make me!
Indonesian: Tidak! Tidak! Aku tidak mau pergi! Aku tidak mau pergi! Aku tidak akan pergi! Kamu tidak bisa membuatku pergi!

English: What? At a friend's house? Oh that Nerco is such a little lying !@#!&@ When he comes back, I will kick his ~!#@$!#&#!@#!...
Indonesian: Apa? Di rumah teman? Si Nerco kecil itu berbohong !@#!&@ Saat dia kembali, aku akan menendangnya ~!#@$!#&#!@#!...

English: Tell Lusina Nerco's words.
Indonesian: Beritahu Lusina pesan Nerco.

English: Like finding a Hair band in a Pumpkin Patch
Indonesian: Seperti mencari Hair Band di Pumpkin Patch.

English: Hey you... It's no use talking to my mommy right now. When she gets angry, she gets ANGRY.*giggle* Give her some time!
Indonesian: Hei kau.. Tidak ada gunanya berbicara dengan ibuku sekarang. Ketika dia marah, dia benar-benar MARAH.*tertawa* Beri dia waktu!

English: Since you aren't busy now, I know you would looooooove to do me a favor! *giggle* A few days ago I lost my favorite Marble Hair band outside of the town. Please please find it?
Indonesian: Karena senggang sekarang, Aku yakin kamu akan senang membantuku! *tertawa* Beberapa hari yang lalu aku kehilangan Marble Hair Band favoritku di luar kota. Tolong tolong temukan ya???

English: Yay! Thank you so much! You are super awesome. If I remember right, I lost it playing hide and seek with Nerco near the Pumpkin Village.
Indonesian: Yay! Terima kasih banyak! Kamu Keren. Seingatku, aku kehilangan bermain petak umpet dengan Nerco di dekat Pumpkin Village.

English: But but but, it was my favoritest… my daddy bought it for me!!!
Indonesian: Tapi tapi tapi, itu favoritku… ayahku membelikannya untukku!!!

English: You found my hair band!? Yay! You are the bestest ever!!! You are a real hero!
Indonesian: Kamu menemukannya!? Yay! Kamu yang terbaik!!! Kamu adalah pahlawan sejati!

English: Be careful! Pumpkin Village has lots of scary Mr.Pumpkins. When I saw one, I ran as fast as I could and lost my scrunchie!
Indonesian: Hati-hati! Ada banyak Mr.Pumpkin menakutkan di Pumpkin Village. Aku masih ingat sewaktu bertemu dengan satu dari mereka, aku langsung lari secepat-cepatnya!

English: Find Marble Hair band from Pumpkin village and go back to Nersha.
Indonesian: Temukan Marble Hair Band dari Pumpkin Village dan kembali ke Nersha.

English: A Mother's Embrace
Indonesian: A Mother's Embrace

English: Oh, also! My mommy is looking for you... Go talk to her. Don't worry, she is cooled down now.
Indonesian: Oh! Ibuku Mencarimu.. Tolong temui dia. Jangan khawatir, dia sudah tenang sekarang.

English: I think she wants to thank you for helping me!
Indonesian: Aku rasa dia ingin berterima kasih padamu karena telah membantuku!

English: Hmm... If you go back to Mayor, this mission will fail...
Indonesian: Hmm.. Kalau kamu kembali ke Mayor, misi ini akan gagal..

English: Good to see you again. Sorry for earlier, it's just that Nerco makes me so angry sometimes. Anyway, I heard you found something for my daughter.
Indonesian: Senang bertemu denganmu lagi. Maaf untuk yang sebelumnya, hanya saja Nerco terkadang membuatku sangat marah. Omong-omong, aku mendengar kalau kamu membantu menemukan sesuatu untuk putriku.

English: Please go talk with my mommy!
Indonesian: Mohon bicaralah dengan ibuku!

English: Speak with Lusina.
Indonesian: Berbiacara dengan Lusina.

English: Nothing Like a Home Cooked Meal
Indonesian: Nothing Like a Home Cooked Meal

English: Thank you! You found my son and also helped my daughter. Now I can momentarily feel relieved. Let me treat you to a home cooked meal! Hold on...
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak! Kamu membantu menemukan anak laki-lakiku dan juga membantu anak perempuanku. Aku bisa sedikit tengan sekarang. Biarkan aku mentraktirmu dengan masakanku! Tunggu sebentar..

English: Ah!!! All of my kitchen knives got rusty. I just wanted to treat you a good meal to show my appreciation... Now, I can't even feed my children!
Indonesian: Ah!!! Semua pisau dapurku karatan. Aku ingin mentraktirmu makanan yang enak untuk menunjukkan rasa terimakasihku... Tapi sekarang, aku bahkan tidak bisa memberi makan anak-anakku!

English: You've helped our family so much already, but can I ask you for a favor also?
Indonesian: Kamu telah banyak membantu keluargaku, tapi bolehkah aku meminta tolong lagi?

English: If I had some Sharp Edge pieces, I could make a knife and once again be a fit mother! Would you please gather some for me?
Indonesian: Jika aku memiliki Sharp Edge, aku dapat membuat pisau dan sekali lagi menjadi ibu yang baik! Maukah kau mengumpulkan beberapa untukku?

English: You are really too kind! You can collect Sharp Edge pieces by killing some Red Mantis… and pulling off their legs. Yes, yes, so it sounds a little vicious. It's ok, you will get over it! Haha!
Indonesian: Kamu sangat baik sekali! Kamu dapat mengumpulkan Sharp Edge dengan mengalahkan Red Mantis... dan memotong kakinya. Mungkin terdengar menyeramkan, tapi tak apa, kamu akan terbiasa! Haha!

English: Oh dear! Now my children shall surely starve! Children's services will take them away and I will be all alone…
Indonesian: Ya ampun! Sekarang anak-anakku pasti akan kelaparan! Children Services akan membawa mereka pergi dan aku akan sendirian…

English: How very kind of you! Hope this task wasn't too much of a burden for you. Rest a little now!
Indonesian: Betapa baik hati dirimu! Semoga tugas ini tidak terlalu membebanimu. Istirahatlah sedikit sekarang!

English: Unfortunately, you won't be able to pull the legs off all the Red Mantis. Some of them are attached too tightly. Just keep killing them and you will eventually succeed!
Indonesian: Sayangnya, Kamu tidak akan bisa melepaskan semua kaki Red Mantis. Beberapa dari mereka melekat terlalu erat. Terus bunuh mereka sampai kamu berhasil!

English: Bring 3 Sharp Edge to Lusina by killing Red Mantis.
Indonesian: Bawa 3 Sharp Edge ke Lusina dengan membunuh Red Mantis.

English: Soups On!
Indonesian: Soups On!

English: Well, I should hurry and get dinner going. Would you please fetch Nerco for me? I'm sure if I saw him right now, I'd kick his little butt from here to Darkon!
Indonesian: Ah ok, aku harus bergegas menyiapkan makan malam. Bisakah tolong panggilkan Nerco?? Jika aku melihatnya sekarang, rasanya aku tak akan bisa menahan diri untuk menendangnya sampai terlempar ke Darkon!

English: Thank you so much! I'm sure that crafty little liar is still where you last saw him!
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak! Aku sangat yakin bajingan kecil itu masih ada ditempat terakhir kau melihatnya!

English: Well, looks like someone is going to bed on an empty stomach then!
Indonesian: Rasanya akan ada seseorang yang pergi tidur dengan perut kosong nanti!

English: You again? I said I would be home soon enough! Don't tell me my mother sent you!?
Indonesian: Kau lagi? Aku bilang aku akan segera pulang! Jangan bilang ibuku mengirimmu!?

English: Please go tell Nerco to come home for dinner!
Indonesian: Tolong beritahu Nerco untuk pulang makan malam!

English: Tell Lusina's words to Nerco.
Indonesian: Sampaikan pesan Lusina pada Nerco.

English: The Rusty Shackle
Indonesian: The Rusty Shackle

English: What? My mother told me to come and eat? Awww but I’m just getting started!
Indonesian: Apa? Ibu menyuruhku pulang dan makan? Awww, padahal aku baru saja mulai!

English: What? She's mad at me? If you show Mia's Shackles to her, I know she will be proud! Please take this to my mother.
Indonesian: Apa? Dia marah padaku? Kalau kau tunjukkan Mia's Shackles ini padanya, aku yakin dia akan bangga! Tolong bawa dan berikan ini ke ibuku.

English: Awesome! Now I can get back to killing more monsters!
Indonesian: Bagus! Sekarang aku bisa kembali menghabisi lebih banyak monster!

English: It's ok, I understand that you are just jealous! Mwahaha!
Indonesian: Tak apa, aku mengerti kalau kamu cemburu! Mwahaha!

English: What's this? Some old shackle? What? Nerco told you that he isn't coming back?
Indonesian: Apa ini? belenggu tua? Apa? Nerco bilang kalau dia tak mau pulang???

English: Hurry up and take Mia's Shackles to my mother, so she can see how great I am!
Indonesian: Cepat sana dan bawa Mia's Shackles ini ke ibuku, aku yakin dia akan sangat bangga padaku!!

English: Give Mia's Shackles to Lusina.
Indonesian: Berikan Mia's Shackles ke Lusina.

English: No Rest for the Wicked
Indonesian: Tak ada waktu untuk beristirahat meski kita lelah

English: Oh that little brat! He is out of his mind! That’s it, when I find him he is getting a spanking more terrifying than Shade's fury!!!
Indonesian: Dasar bocah tengik! Dia sudah gila ya! Saat saya menemukannya, dia akan mendapatkan pukulan yang lebih menakutkan daripada kemarahan Shade!!!

English: Oh, by the way! The Mayor of Saint City is looking for you in hurry. I really should go find my son now. I still owe you a meal sometime so come back and see us!
Indonesian: Ngomong-ngomong, Walikota Saint City sedang mencarimu dengan tergesa-gesa. Saya harus segera mencari anak saya sekarang. Saya masih berhutang makan padamu, jadi kapan-kapan kembalilah dan temui kami!

English: Go see the Mayor of Saint City. I gotta go now. See you!
Indonesian: Segera temui Walikota Saint City. Saya harus pergi sekarang. Sampai jumpa!

English: Well, that’s up to you! Either way, I have to rush off now!
Indonesian: Nah, itu terserah Anda! Bagaimanapun, saya harus segera pergi sekarang!

English: Oh! There you are! I've been waiting for you!. We are in great need of your abilities!
Indonesian: Oh! Akhirnya kamu datang juga! Aku sudah menunggumu!. Kami sangat membutuhkan kemampuanmu!

English: Hmm, what to spank him with? OH! You are still here? The mayor is looking for you. Please go see him!
Indonesian: Hmm, harus kupukul dengan apa ya dia? OH! Kamu masih di sini??? Walikota sedang mencarimu. Segeralah pergi menemuinya!

English: Meet the Mayor of Saint City.
Indonesian: Temui Walikota Saint City.

English: Power in Numbers
Indonesian: Power in Numbers

English: Do you know about the Bucrow? They are protectors of the natural order that have existed long before man. They have since grown malicious, and attack our citizens.
Indonesian: Apakah kamu tahu tentang Bucrow? Mereka adalah pelindung tatanan alam yang telah ada jauh sebelum manusia. Sejak saat itu mereka menjadi jahat, dan menyerang warga kita.

English: I believe the sudden increase in the amount of monsters is to blame. Bucrow are very in tune with the balance of nature, and have become enraged with its disintegration
Indonesian: Saya percaya peningkatan jumlah monster yang tiba-tiba adalah penyebabnya. Bucrow sangat selaras dengan keseimbangan alam, dan menjadi marah jika ada disintegrasi.

English: I must warn you though. Bucrow are very strong, which is why I've asked you to unite with other champions in this task. Please, will you help us to defeat them?
Indonesian: Saya harus memperingatkanmu. Bucrow sangatlah kuat, itulah sebabnya saya memintamu untuk bersatu dengan yang lain dalam tugas ini. Maukah kamu membantu kami untuk mengalahkan mereka?

English: You and your band of allies must travel to Saint Morning's southernmost region known as the Fantasy Desert. This is where the Bucrow primarily reside.
Indonesian: Kamu dan sekutumu harus melakukan perjalanan ke wilayah paling selatan di Saint Morning yang dikenal sebagai Fantasy Desert. Di sinilah Bucrow sering tinggal.

English: I might not know with any certainty how the Bucrow first began to become so vicious, but what I do know is that we must do something about them soon!
Indonesian: Saya mungkin tidak tahu dengan pasti bagaimana Bucrow pertama kali menjadi begitu kejam, tetapi yang saya tahu adalah bahwa kita harus segera melakukan sesuatu terhadap mereka!

English: Done already!? My thanks go out to you and your allies. Sometimes companionship is the key to victory! As soon as you reach level 30, please return to me as I have another request.
Indonesian: Sudah selesai!? Terima kasih untukmu dan sekutumu. Terkadang persahabatan adalah kunci kemenangan! Segera setelah kamu mencapai level 30, silakan kembali kepada saya karena saya memiliki permintaan lain.

English: Please you must all hurry! We cannot sit idly by in such a dire situation.
Indonesian: Tolong kalian semua harus cepat! Kita tidak bisa duduk diam dalam situasi yang begitu mengerikan.

English: Kill 8 Small Bucrow & 4 Bucrow while in a party and return to the Mayor of Saint City.
Indonesian: Bunuh 8 Small Bucrow dan 4 Bucrow saat bergabung di party dan kembali ke Walikota Saint City.

English: Hero of Saint City
Indonesian: Hero of Saint City

English: Hah, you have become quite the celebrity around here! Yes, there is still evil afoot in Saint Morning, but nothing that we can't now contain thanks to your aid!
Indonesian: Hah, kamu telah menjadi selebriti di sekitar sini! Ya, memang masih ada kejahatan yang terjadi di Saint Morning, tetapi tak ada yang tidak dapat kami lakukan sekarang berkat bantuanmu!

English: I do wish to ask you one last favor. Will you hear me out in my final request?
Indonesian: Saya ingin meminta satu bantuan terakhir kepadamu. Maukah kamu mendengar permintaan terakhir saya?

English: You have my thanks. Word has it, a group of dangerous escaped convicts from Saint City Prison are planning their revenge. Please defeat the Hobo and take his sword as proof!
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Kabarnya, sekelompok narapidana berbahaya yang melarikan diri dari Penjara Saint City sedang merencanakan balas dendam mereka. Tolong kalahkan Hobo dan ambil pedangnya sebagai bukti!

English: Hmm…just unfortunate considering how far you have come!
Indonesian: Hmm... sangat disayangkan mengingat seberapa jauh kamu telah berusaha!

English: I knew it all along. Reonan was right. There is truly greatness within you. I, and the people of Saint City, wish to bestow you with this gift of elemental cards. Use them wisely!
Indonesian: Saya tahu itu selama ini. Reonan benar. Benar-benar ada kebaikan dalam dirimu. Saya, dan orang-orang di Saint City, ingin memberimu hadiah kartu elemen ini. Gunakan dengan bijak!

English: The Hobo should be in the Western Fantasy Desert. Please eliminate this threat!
Indonesian: Hobo seharusnya berada di Western Fantasy Desert. Tolong hilangkan ancaman ini!

English: Kill Hobo and get the Hobo Sword.
Indonesian: Bunuh Hobo dan dapatkan Hobo Sword.

English: Huh? You want me to show you the most powerful skill of mine? Hmm... If you want to see it, I can show you. Here! Put those pieces into my mouth. ah~~
Indonesian: Huh? Kamu ingin saya menunjukkan keterampilan saya yang paling kuat kepadamu? Hmm.. Jika kamu ingin melihatnya, saya dapat menunjukkannya kepadamu. Sini! Masukkan potongan-potongan itu ke dalam mulutku. ah~~

English: Mysterious Bounty Hunter
Indonesian: Mysterious Bounty Hunter

English: Level 40 eh? You've really grown since our last meeting! Hmm, have you heard of a man named "Ghost" Hael? He is one of Madrigal's best known bounty hunters.
Indonesian: Level 40 ya? Kamu telah banyak berkembang sejak terakhir kali kita bertemu! Hmm, pernahkah kamu mendengar tentang seorang pria bernama "Ghost" Hael? Dia adalah salah satu pemburu hadiah Madrigal yang paling terkenal.

English: His cold and mysterious demeanor have earned him the title "Ghost". I've heard from sources that he might be traveling through Flaris today.
Indonesian: Sikapnya yang dingin dan misterius telah membuatnya mendapatkan gelar "Hantu". Saya telah mendengar dari berbagai sumber bahwa dia mungkin bepergian melalui Flaris hari ini.

English: Would you perhaps seek him out for me? If you tell him my name, perhaps it will jog his memory…
Indonesian: Apakah kamu mau mencarinya untuk saya? Jika kamu memberi tahu dia nama saya, mungkin itu akan memicu ingatannya.

English: Appreciate it! He will be appearing at Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern part of Flaris. Please find him.
Indonesian: Hargai itu! Dia akan muncul di Fountain of Dead Person di bagian utara Flaris. Tolong temukan dia.

English: What are you scared? I mean, he's not REALLY a ghost.
Indonesian: Apa yang kau takutkan? Maksudku, dia bukan BENAR-BENAR hantu.

English: Sure is awfully hard to concentrate with you standing right there. What do you want?
Indonesian: Tentu sangat sulit untuk berkonsentrasi saat kamu berdiri di sana. Apa yang kamu inginkan?

English: You haven't met Hael yet? He should be at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Indonesian: Kamu belum bertemu Hael? Dia seharusnya berada di Fountain of Dead Person.

English: Meet Hael and mention Reonan's name.
Indonesian: Temui Hael dan sebutkan nama Reonan.

English: Time is Money
Indonesian: Time is Money

English: Wha? Someone named Reonan is looking for me? Sounds familiar but… UGH! I've got way too bad of a headache to be thinking about things right now.
Indonesian: Apa? Seseorang bernama Reonan sedang mencariku? Kedengarannya tidak asing tapi ... UGH! Saya terlalu sakit kepala untuk memikirkan banyak hal saat ini.

English: Reonan... It's the first time hearing that name, but it is familiar... He said its time? Time for what, I wonder…
Indonesian: Reonan... Ini pertama kalinya saya mendengar nama itu, tapi nama itu terdengar tidak asing ... Dia mengatakan ini sudah saatnya? Saatnya untuk apa, saya penasaran ...

English: Regardless! I have my own goals and limited time so move along! There is a foul demon lurking in the Mars Mine with a bounty on its head JUST waiting to be claimed *sneer*
Indonesian: Terlepas dari apapun itu! Saya memiliki tujuan saya sendiri dan waktu yang terbatas, jadi lanjutkan! Ada iblis busuk yang bersembunyi di Mars Mine dengan hadiah di kepalanya DAN menunggu untuk diklaim *mencibir*

English: UGH! Headache…getting…worse! OK look, here's the deal. You take out that Vice Veduque, give me the reward and I will meet your Reonan. Deal?
