Indonesian: UGH! Sakit kepala... Makin... Parah! Ok dengar, ini kesepakatannya. Kamu bawa Vice Veduque itu, beri saya hadiahnya dan saya akan menemui Reonan. Setuju?

English: Well, never expected you to accept THAT offer? Well anyway, go kill 10 Vice Veduque in Mars Mine then return to me!
Indonesian: Sejujurnya, saya tidak pernah menyangka bahwa kamu akan menerima tawaran ITU? Yah bagaimanapun, bunuh 10 Vice Veduque di Mars Mine lalu kembali padaku!

English: No skin off my back! Planned to do it myself anyway. Just gotta, ya know, rest a minute or two…or three…
Indonesian: Itu bukan urusanku! Toh saya berencana untuk melakukannya sendiri. Saya hanya perlu, tahu lah, istirahat sekitar satu atau dua menit ... atau tiga ...

English: Hmpf killed them huh? Well aren't we proud of ourselves. Anyway, while you were in Mars Mine, I thought again about this here… Reonan, or whatever his name is.
Indonesian: Hmpf membunuh mereka? Bukankah kita bangga pada diri kita sendiri. Ngomong-ngomong, ketika kamu di Mars Mine, saya memikirkan lagi tentang ini di sini ... Reonan, atau apalah namanya itu.

English: *snores* huh!? What!? I was awake, just resting my eyes!
Indonesian: *mendengkur* huh!? Apa!? Saya sudah bangun, hanya mengistirahatkan mata saya!

English: Kill 10 Vice Veduque and meet Hael.
Indonesian: Bunuh 10 Vice Veduque dan temui Hael.

English: Seeing Through to the Past
Indonesian: Seeing Through to the Past

English: Still not ringing any bells. Though, the name is familiar… Maybe Master Radeon can tell you something about the name. He took me in over 20 years ago and has been my mentor since.
Indonesian: Masih tidak mengingatkan apapun. Padahal, namanya sudah tidak asing lagi... Mungkin Master Radeon dapat memberi tahumu sesuatu tentang nama itu. Dia membawa saya sejak lebih dari 20 tahun yang lalu dan telah menjadi mentor saya sejak saat itu.

English: I can hardly remember what I had for breakfast. Go talk with Master Radeon alright? I'm sure he might know something…
Indonesian: Saya hampir tidak dapat mengingat apa yang saya makan saat sarapan tado. Bicaralah dengan Master Radeon, oke? Saya yakin dia mungkin tahu sesuatu ...

English: Wow, seems like my headache is already lifting knowing I got you out of my hair. Master Radeon is on the other side of the Fountain of the Dead. Go see him!
Indonesian: Wow, sepertinya sakit kepalaku sudah sembuh setelah mengetahui aku mengeluarkanmu dari rambutku. Master Radeon berada di sisi lain dari Fountain of the Dead. Pergi temui dia!

English: You don’t want to do it? Alright...
Indonesian: Kau tidak ingin melakukannya? Baiklah..

English: Hmm? So Reonan is inquiring of Hael? It appears that it is time…
Indonesian: Hmm? Jadi Reonan bertanya tentang Hael? Tampaknya sekarang sudah waktunya ...

English: Find Master Radeon and ask about the Hael's past.
Indonesian: Temukan Master Radeon dan tanyakan tentang masa lalu Hael.

English: Shards of Memory
Indonesian: Shards of Memory

English: I have known Hael many years. When I first discovered him, he was laying there unconscious. I was able to nurse him back to health, but still he had no recollection of his memory. There is a way to recover it though…
Indonesian: Saya telah mengenal Hael bertahun-tahun. Ketika saya pertama kali menemukannya, dia terbaring di sana tidak sadarkan diri. Saya dapat merawatnya kembali hingga dia sehat, tetapi tetap saja dia tidak memiliki ingatan tentang ingatannya. Namun, sebenarnya ada cara untuk memulihkannya ...

English: I feel there might be something important lost in his past. The only way to recover it would be by using a Memory Shard. This should allow Hael to uncover his past.
Indonesian: Saya merasa mungkin ada sesuatu yang penting hilang di masa lalunya. Satu-satunya cara untuk memulihkannya adalah dengan menggunakan Memory Shard. Ini seharusnya memungkinkan Hael untuk mengungkap masa lalunya.

English: First, you will need to purify the shard by bringing it to the Magic Box Ancimys. Will you retrieve the purified Memory shard and bring it to Hael?
Indonesian: Pertama, kau perlu memurnikan pecahan ini dengan membawanya ke Magic Box Ancimys. Maukah kamu mengambil pecahan Memori yang telah dimurnikan dan membawanya ke Hael?

English: Please locate the Memory Shard which should be somewhere around the Altar of Violet in Northern Flaris. There are Violet Magician Troupe patrolling the area.
Indonesian: Temukan Memory Shard yang seharusnya berada di suatu tempat di sekitar Altar of Violet di Northern Flaris. Ada Violet Magician Troupe yang berpatroli di daerah tersebut.

English: If you wish Hael's assistance, this might be the only chance you have…
Indonesian: Jika kamu menginginkan bantuan Hael, ini mungkin satu-satunya kesempatan yang kamu miliki ...

English: Hey! You act like you haven't seen a man trapped in a treasure chest before. Oh you come bearing Memory Shards to be purified?
Indonesian: Hei! Reaksimu seolah belum pernah melihat orang yang terjebak dalam peti harta karun sebelumnya. Oh, kau datang membawa Memory Shards untuk dimurnikan?

English: Please acquire the Memory Shard located at the Altar of Violet, and bring it to Ancimys for purification.
Indonesian: Dapatkan Memory Shard yang terletak di Altar of Violet, dan bawa ke Ancimys untuk pemurnian.

English: Locate the Memory shard in Northern Flaris and bring it to Ancimys
Indonesian: Temukan Memory Shard di Northern Flaris dan bawa ke Ancimys

English: A Chest full of Memories
Indonesian: A Chest full of Memories

English: I will purify the Memory Shards sure, but first a joke!
Indonesian: Aku akan memurnikan Memory Shard, tapi bohong!

English: Haha, well since you were so kind to listen here is your crystal. Now go ahead and take it!
Indonesian: Haha, karena kamu bersedia mendengarkan dengan sabar, ini kristalmu. Ambilah!

English: Thanks again for listening. The Pukepukes around here don't have a very good sense of humor! Haha!
Indonesian: Sekali lagi terima kasih karena telah mendengarkan. Para Pukepuke disini tidak memilki selera humor sama sekali, haha!

English: What's the deal with this weird looking stone? Oh, for helping me to recall my lost thoughts you say? Oh well, worth a shot!
Indonesian: Apa sih istimewanya batu aneh ini? Oh, untuk membantu untuk memanggil kembali ingatanku yang lalu? Oke, layak dicoba!

English: Oh back so soon? Don't worry I have plenty more jokes! So what do you get when you cross an Aibatt with... Er wait, I forgot how it goes...
Indonesian: Oh sudah kembali? Jangan khawatir saya punya lebih banyak lelucon! Jadi apa yang kau dapatkan ketika melintasi Aibatt dengan.. Eh tunggu, aku lupa bagaimana kelanjutannya...

English: Bring the purified Memory Shard to Hael.
Indonesian: Bawa Memory Shard yang telah dimurnikan ke Hael.

English: The First Pendant
Indonesian: The First Pendant

English: Woahhhh now, everything is finally clear. Hah...Hah... I finally remember... I can't believe this... I recall Reonan now...
Indonesian: Woahhhh, semuanya menjadi jelas sekarang. Hah...Hah... Akhirnya aku ingat semua... Tak dapat kupercaya.. Aku mengingat Reonan sekarang..

English: We were once good friends who stood together against a great threat… only at that time… we went by different names… I'm sure you will understand in time.
Indonesian: Kita pernah menjadi teman baik yang berdiri bersama melawan ancaman besar... hanya pada saat itu... kita berdiri dengan nama yang berbeda... aku yakin kau akan paham nanti.

English: Here, take this to Reonan. It's a pendant once shared amongst several old comrades… He'll understand when he sees it…
Indonesian: Berikan ini kepada Reonan. Ini adalah pendant yang pernah dibagikan di antara beberapa kawan lama... Dia akan mengerti ketika dia melihatnya...

English: As for now, I have business to attend to. I will catch up with you guys later. Try not to miss me too much and stuff *sneer*
Indonesian: Untuk saat ini, saya memiliki urusan yang harus saya urus. Saya akan menyusul kalian nanti. Cobalah untuk tidak terlalu merindukanku secara berlebihan *mencibir*

English: Well, I'm in no real hurry. Just take the pendant to Reonan whenever you have the chance.
Indonesian: Aku tidak terburu-buru. Bawa saja liontin itu ke Reonan kapan pun kau memiliki kesempatan.

English: This pendant… It was a symbol of the trust that I once shared with Hael. I've been hoping to find him for awhile now to no avail…
Indonesian: Liontin ini... Itu adalah simbol kepercayaan yang pernah saya bagikan dengan Hael. Saya telah berharap untuk menemukannya untuk sementara waktu meski tidak berhasil...

English: Take the pendant to Reonan soon. I didn't give it to you as a keepsake.
Indonesian: Segera bawa liontin itu ke Reonan. Saya tidak memberikannya kepadamu sebagai kenang-kenangan.

English: Bring the pendant from Hael to Reonan.
Indonesian: Bawa liontinnya dari Hael ke Reonan.

English: Quest for Truth
Indonesian: Quest for Truth

English: Lost memory you say? Must have been hard for him wandering around so aimlessly with no true identity. We will give him time to gather his thoughts…
Indonesian: Kehilangan ingatan kau bilang? Pasti sulit baginya untuk berkeliaran tanpa tujuan tanpa identitas asli. Kami akan memberinya waktu untuk mengumpulkan pikirannya...

English: In the meantime, are you aware of the Garden of Rhisis? It is the landmass Northeast of Saint Morning. My friend Handel is currently conducting research there.
Indonesian: Sementara itu, apakah kau tahu Garden of Rhisis? Ini adalah daratan Northeast of Saint Morning. Teman saya Handel saat ini sedang melakukan penelitian di sana.

English: Her work takes much time and the constant threat of masquerpet attacks doesn't help the process. Will you please go and assist her?
Indonesian: Pekerjaannya membutuhkan banyak waktu dan ancaman serangan dari masquerpet yang konstan tidak membantu prosesnya. Maukah kau pergi dan membantunya?

English: You can reach the Garden of Rhisis by flying Northeast from the continent of Saint Morning. Please go there and meet up with Handel
Indonesian: Kau dapat mencapai Garden of Rhisis dengan terbang ke Timur Laut dari benua Saint Morning. Silakan pergi ke sana dan temui Handel

English: Hah, I see! After using all those town blinkwings, you've already forgotten how to fly.
Indonesian: Hah, jadi begitu! Setelah menggunakan semua town blinkwings itu,kau sudah lupa cara terbang.

English: Welcome to the Garden of Rhisis. I have been expecting you. Do you understand the nature of my research?
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Garden of Rhisis. Saya telah mengharapkan kedatanganmu. Apakah kau memahami sifat penelitian saya?

English: Handel is in the Northern part of the Garden of Rhisis. Please go locate her!
Indonesian: Handel berada di bagian Utara Garden of Rhisis. Temukan dia!

English: Go find Handel in the Garden of Rhisis.
Indonesian: Temukan Handel di Garden of Rhisis.

English: Slaves to Shade
Indonesian: Slaves to Shade

English: You know where these monsters come from right? According to the records, they were the creation of Shade. Angered by her inability to destroy all of Roika, she plagued the lands with these foul beasts.
Indonesian: Kau tahu dari mana monster-monster ini berasal, bukan? Menurut catatan, mereka adalah ciptaan Shade. Marah dengan ketidakmampuannya untuk menghancurkan semua Roika, dia berusaha menghancurkan kota dengan binatang buas ini.

English: Shade and her monsters succeeded in taking over all of Madrigal. She was subsequently defeated by 8 brave heroes who all rose to the challenge, restoring peace to the land.
Indonesian: Shade dan monsternya berhasil mengambil alih semua Madrigal. Dia kemudian dikalahkan oleh 8 pahlawan pemberani yang semuanya bangkit menghadapi tantangan, memulihkan perdamaian ke tanah itu.

English: Shade is now dead, but monsters that she created still exist. In fact, they seem to be growing stronger and greater in number. I'm here in the hopes of uncovering some sort of answer.
Indonesian: Shade sekarang sudah mati, tetapi monster yang dia ciptakan masih ada. Bahkan, mereka tampaknya semakin kuat dan lebih besar jumlahnya. Saya di sini dengan harapan untuk mengungkap suatu jawaban.

English: Research is difficult with the constant threat of Tombstone Bearers around. Will you please help buy me some time by defeating them?
Indonesian: Penelitian sulit dilakukan dengan ancaman konstan dari Tombstone Bearers di sekitarku. Maukah kau membantu dengan memberi saya waktu dengan mengalahkan mereka?

English: Thank you for your assistance. Killing 15 Tombstone Bearers should allow me ample time to complete my research.
Indonesian: Terima kasih atas bantuanmu. Membunuh 15 Tombstone Bearers seharusnya memberi saya cukup waktu untuk menyelesaikan penelitian saya.

English: For the sake of truth, please do not pass up my request!
Indonesian: Demi kebenaran, tolong jangan lupakan permintaan saya!

English: I've done it!! Because of your bravery, I've found an important piece of information.
Indonesian: Saya sudah melakukannya!! Karena keberanianmu, saya telah menemukan informasi penting.

English: I'm still in the process of research. Please go and defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers while I complete my work!
Indonesian: Saya masih dalam proses penelitian. Silakan pergi dan kalahkan 15 Small Tombstone Bearers &7 Tombstone Bearers sementara saya menyelesaikan pekerjaan saya!

English: Defeat 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 15 Small Tombstone Bearers & 7 Tombstone Bearers.

English: Endless Loop
Indonesian: Endless Loop

English: While conducting my research, I found something of interest about the pillars carried by the Tombstone Bearers. It looks similar to those of Shade's temple.
Indonesian: Saat melakukan penelitian, saya menemukan sesuatu yang menarik tentang pilar-pilar yang dibawa oleh Tombstone Bearers. Ini terlihat mirip dengan kuil Shade.

English: Upon looking further into the information, I found that Tombstone Bearers were actually slaves of Shade that built her temple. But why would they be here in the Garden of Rhisis?
Indonesian: Setelah melihat indormasi lebih jauh, saya menemukan bahwa Tombstone Bearers sebenarnya adalah budak Shade yang membangun kuilnya. Tapi mengapa mereka ada di sini di Garden of Rhisis??

English: I need to acquire more data! Would you help me further by acquiring an Ancient Inscription? This might provide the insight I'm looking for!
Indonesian: Saya perlu memperoleh lebih banyak data! Maukah kau membantu saya lebih jauh dengan memperoleh Ancient Inscription? Ini mungkin bisa memberikan wawasan yang sedang saya cari!

English: I knew you would have accepted. You too yearn to discover the truth! You can find a Ancient Inscription by defeating any of the Tombstone Bearers
Indonesian: Saya tahu kau akan menerimanya. Kau terlalu rindu untuk menemukan kebenaran! Kau akan dapat menemukan Ancient Inscription dengan mengalahkan salah satu Tombstone Bearers

English: How could you decline? This could potentially reveal so much to us about Shade's masquerpets and their growing strength!
Indonesian: Bagaimana kau bisa menolak?? Ini berpotensi mengungkapkan begitu banyak tentang penyamaran Shade kepada kita dan kekuatan mereka yang semakin besar!

English: You got it!! Please hand it over quickly for me to analyze!
Indonesian: Kau mendapatkannya!! Tolong serahkan dengan cepat untuk saya analisis!

English: Even if you don't initially receive an Ancient Inscription, keep defeating them! I'm sure one of these Tombstone Bearers is bound to have the Ancient Inscription!
Indonesian: Bahkan jika kau awalnya tidak menerima Ancient Inscription, teruslah mengalahkan mereka! Saya yakin salah satu Tombstone Bearers ini pasti memiliki Ancient Inscription!

English: Acquire an Ancient Inscription from one of the Tombstone Bearers.
Indonesian: Dapatkan Ancient Inscription dari salah satu Tombstone Bearers.

English: Essence of the Gods
Indonesian: Essence of the Gods

English: It's of no use… The stamp is just too damaged to gather much significant information. It did allude to the War of the Gods though…
Indonesian: Tidak ada gunanya ... Stempelnya sudah terlalu rusak untuk mengumpulkan banyak informasi penting. Itu akan menyinggung War of the Gods...

English: I know from lore that, during this time, Bubble decided to take action against Shade and her masquerpet army. A battle occurred between the gods at this very location.
Indonesian: Saya tahu dari pengetahuan bahwa, selama waktu ini, Bubble memutuskan untuk mengambil tindakan terhadap Shade dan pasukan penyamarannya. Pertempuran terjadi antara para dewa di lokasi ini.

English: It is rumored that the essence of both gods remains in this garden till this day. Could you please find the Bubble Trace for me?
Indonesian: Dikabarkan bahwa kedua dewa tetap ada di taman ini sampai hari ini. Bisakah kau menemukan Bubble Trace untukku?

English: Please defeat the Basques in the North and acquire the Bubble Trace. Once you have this, take it to Bowler. He knows much more ancient lore than myself.
Indonesian: Tolong kalahkan Basque di Utara dan dapatkan Bubble Trace. Setelah memiliki ini, bawa ke Bowler. Dia tahu lebih banyak pengetahuan kuno daripada diriku.

English: You don't want to help me? Oh well... Then I will go myself...
Indonesian: Kau tidak ingin membantuku? Baiklah.. Aku akan pergi sendiri..

English: Hmm? Yes I am Bowler, last keeper of the lore of this continent. WHAT!? You come bearing the Bubble Trace!?
Indonesian: Hmm? Ya saya Bowler, penjaga terakhir dari pengetahuan benua ini. APA!? Kau datang membawa Bubble Trace!?

English: Please kill 15 Basques, acquire the Bubble Trace and take it to Bowler.
Indonesian: Tolong bunuh 15 orang Basque, dapatkan Bubble Trace dan bawa ke Bowler.

English: Kill 15 Phantom Basques & 7 Basques and find the Bubble Trace and bring it to Bowler.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Phantom Basques & 7 Basques dan temukan Bubble Trace dan bawa ke Bowler.

English: Essence of the Gods (2)
Indonesian: Essence of the Gods (2)

English: According to my ancestors, this region was once a primary location for a massive conflict between Bubble and Shade. Lets put it this way, Madrigal was once all one continent before this war…
Indonesian: Menurut nenek moyang saya, wilayah ini pernah menjadi lokasi utama konflik besar antara Bubble dan Shade. Bisa dibilang begini, Madrigal pernah menjadi satu benua sebelum perang ini terjadi...

English: We must also acquire the Shade trace. It's rumored to be held by the Pranksters, the last remnants of the followers of Shade. As you can see, I'm a tad too short to confront them. Could you get it for me?
Indonesian: Kita juga harus mendapatkan jejak Shade. Kabarnya akan dihelat oleh para Pranksters, sisa-sisa terakhir dari para pengikut Shade. Seperti yang kau lihat, saya agak terlalu pendek untuk menghadapi mereka. Bisakah kau mendapatkannya untukku??

English: I appreciate the assistance. Please go Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters and acquire the Shade trace.
Indonesian: Saya mengapresiasi bantuanmu. Silakan bunuh 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters dan dapatkan jejak Shade.

English: What? Expect a poor little Dwarpet such as myself to take on an army of Pranksters?
Indonesian: Apa? Kau berharap Dwarpet kecil yang malang seperti saya ikut menghadapi pasukan Pranksters??

English: So according to Bowler, this was the site of the battle between Bubble and Shade? The essence of each that you contain is definitive proof of this.
Indonesian: Jadi menurut Bowler, ini adalah tempat pertempuran antara Bubble dan Shade? Inti dari masing - masing kandungan adalah bukti definitif dari hal ini.

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, find the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, temukan Shade Trace dan bawa ke Handel.

English: Kill 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, acquire the Shade Trace and bring it to Handel.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Small Mage Pranksters & 7 Pranksters, dapatkan Shade Trace dan bawa ke Handel.

English: Guardians of the Temple
Indonesian: Guardians of the Temple

English: This essence of Shade is concerning… After the 8 Heroes had defeated Shade, all remnants of her existence were to be purged to prevent her return.
Indonesian: Esensi Shade ini mengkhawatirkan... Setelah 8 Pahlawan mengalahkan Shade, semua sisa-sisa keberadaannya harus dibersihkan untuk mencegahnya kembali.

English: If her essence remains, this is very bad… Stored in the Temple of Iblis is the Parchment of War. Please head there and retrieve it for me.
Indonesian: Jika esensinya tetap ada, ini sangat buruk... Parchment of War disimpan di Temple of Iblis. Silakan pergi ke sana dan ambilkan untuk saya.

English: The Temple of Iblis is in the Southern most region of Saint Morning. The records are guarded by both Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian so please defeat them to obtain it!
Indonesian: Temple of Iblis berada di wilayah paling selatan Saint Morning. Catatan tersebut dijaga oleh Iblis Crashers dan Iblis Guardian jadi tolong kalahkan mereka untuk mendapatkannya!

English: We've come too far to just quit now! Please reconsider!!
Indonesian: Kami telah melangkah terlalu jauh untuk berhenti sekarang! Mohon dipertimbangkan kembali!!

English: You've made it back with the Parchment!
Indonesian: Kau telah berhasil kembali dengan Parchment!

English: Please bring the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
Indonesian: Tolong bawa Parchment of War setelah mengalahkan 10 Iblis Crashers dan Iblis Guardian.

English: Bring Handel the Parchment of War after defeating 10 Iblis Crashers and an Iblis Guardian.
Indonesian: Bawa Parchment of War untuk Handel setelah mengalahkan 10 Iblis Crashers dan Iblis Guardian.

English: Before He's Road kill…
Indonesian: Sebelum dia membunuh...

English: Please you must quickly hurry to Bowler! It seems the Wheelems near him have grown increasingly aggressive and he has grown quite fearful!
Indonesian: Tolong kau harus segera bergegas ke Bowler! Tampaknya Wheelems di dekatnya telah tumbuh semakin agresif dan dia telah tumbuh cukup mengerikan!

English: Will you hurry to his aid? In the meanwhile, I will attempt to decrypt these records. I know they contain something worthwhile!!
Indonesian: Maukah kamu bergegas membantunya?? Sementara itu, saya akan mencoba mendekripsi catatan-catatan ini. Saya tahu mereka mengandung sesuatu yang berharga!!

English: Your assistance is truly appreciated! Hurry and defeat 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems then report to Bowler!
Indonesian: Bantuanmu benar-benar kuhargai! Cepat kalahkan 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems lalu lapor ke Bowler!

English: Oh no!! You must help him! Bowler doesn't stand a chance against those vicious Wheelems!
Indonesian: Oh tidak!! Kau harus membantunya! Bowler tidak memiliki kesempatan melawan Wheelems yang kejam itu!

English: That was too close of a call! The Wheelems generally left me alone. For whatever reason, they suddenly grew violent and attempted to attack me while I was out near their territory.
Indonesian: Itu tadi hampir saja! Wheelems akhirnya meninggalkan saya sendirian. Untuk alasan apa pun, mereka tiba-tiba menjadi kejam dan berusaha menyerang saya saat saya berada di dekat wilayah mereka.

English: Hurry! Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems before they can reach Bowler!
Indonesian: Cepat! Bunuh 20 Rough Wheelems &10 Wheelems sebelum mereka bisa mencapai Bowler!

English: Kill 20 Rough Wheelems & 10 Wheelems and report to Bowler.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Rough Wheelems &10 Wheelems dan laporkan ke Bowler.

English: The Moment of Truth
Indonesian: The Moment of Truth

English: The number of Wheelems has increased so much since I last remember. If it weren't for you, I would have been Dwarpet road kill…
Indonesian: Jumlah Wheelems telah meningkat pesat sejak terakhir kali saya ingat. Jika bukan karenamu, saya pasti telah dibabat habis oleh Dwarpet...

English: Has Handel finished her research? Oh! She is currently decrypting the Parchment of War? Will you hurry back to her and find if she has finished?
Indonesian: Apakah Handel sudah menyelesaikan penelitiannya?? Oh! Dia saat ini sedang mendekripsi Parchment of War?? Maukah kamu bergegas kembali padanya dan mengecek apakah dia sudah selesai??

English: Tell Handel that I said thanks for her concern… If she need my help, feel free to find me at anytime!
Indonesian: Beri tahu Handel bahwa saya mengucapkan terima kasih atas perhatiannya ... Jika dia membutuhkan bantuan saya, jangan ragu untuk menemui saya kapan saja!

English: Look I know I'm great and you would love to spend time with me, but this is sort of important!
Indonesian: Dengar, saya tahu saya hebat dan kamu akan senang menghabiskan waktu bersamaku, tetapi ini cukup penting!

English: I'm glad to see you… I have to finish decrypting the Parchment
Indonesian: Saya senang melihatmu... Saya harus menyelesaikan dekripsi Parchment

English: Go see Handel. She should be done with decrypting the parchment.
Indonesian: Pergi lihat Handel. Dia seharusnya sudah selesai mendekripsi parchment.

English: Return to Handel and see if she has decrypted the Parchment.
Indonesian: Kembali temui Handel dan lihat apakah dia telah mendekripsi Parchment.

English: Revelation
Indonesian: Revelation

English: Why am I looking so distraught after analyzing the text you ask? Well… I guess the results are not what I would have wanted…
Indonesian: Mengapa saya terlihat begitu putus asa setelah menganalisis teks yang kau tanyakan? Kurasa karena hasilnya bukanlah apa yang saya inginkan...

English: The records indicate that despite the efforts made by the 8 heroes to expunge any trace of Shade's existence, her essence still persists throughout this world.
Indonesian: Catatan menunjukkan bahwa terlepas dari upaya yang dilakukan oleh 8 pahlawan untuk menghapus jejak keberadaan Shade, esensinya masih bertahan di seluruh dunia ini.

English: When the time is right, she will regain her physical form and return anew to command her masquerpet army. It is her intention to reclaim the known world as her own…
Indonesian: Ketika waktunya tepat, dia akan mendapatkan kembali bentuk fisiknya dan kembali lagi untuk memimpin pasukan penyamarannya. Ini adalah niatnya untuk merebut kembali dunia sebagai miliknya...

English: You must go and talk to Reonan as soon as possible. We no longer have time to waste. Please find him!
Indonesian: Kau harus pergi dan berbicara dengan Reonan sesegera mungkin. Kita tidak lagi punya waktu untuk disia-siakan. Tolong temukan dia!

English: Reonan still hasn't explained to you the exact nature of the 8 heroes has he? I feel you are ready to know the truth and the role you play in this all…
Indonesian: Reonan masih belum menjelaskan kepadamu sifat dari 8 hero tersebut? Saya merasa kau sudah siap untuk mengetahui kebenaran dan peran yang kau mainkan dalam kasus ini...

English: I'm sorry if you feel uncertain about this all. Take some time to think it over…
Indonesian: Saya minta maaf jika kau merasa tidak yakin tentang ini semua. Luangkan waktu untuk memikirkannya...

English: Greetings again! Ohhh…so this is what Handel has brought to light.
Indonesian: Hai kita bertemu lagi! Ohhh... jadi ini yang dibawa Handel.

English: Please hurry back to Reonan. I'm sure he will explain everything!
Indonesian: Tolong cepat kembali kepada Reonan. Saya yakin dia akan menjelaskan semuanya!

English: Return to Reonan with the results of Handel's research.
Indonesian: Kembali kepada Reonan dengan hasil penelitian Handel.

English: Darkon: The Mysterious Continent
Indonesian: Darkon: The Mysterious Continent

English: This is more urgent that I thought… I was aware of the impending return of Shade, but this soon? I'm sorry I had to hide so much from you. Here is the truth…
Indonesian: Ini lebih mendesak yang saya sangka... Saya menyadari bahwa Shade akan kembali, tapi ini terlalu cepat?? Maaf saya harus menyembunyikan begitu banyak hal darimu. Inilah kebenarannya...

English: Handel, Hael and I share a common past. We are all reincarnations of the 8 original heroes to defeat Shade in the War of the Gods. I was the first Knight Hero...
Indonesian: Handel, Hael dan saya berbagi masa lalu yang sama. Kami semua adalah reinkarnasi dari 8 pahlawan asli yang mengalahkan Shade dalam War of the Gods. Aku adalah Knight Hero yang pertama...

English: We were all appointed by Bubble as champions of our respective classes, and led the armies of mankind against Shade and her masquerpets.
Indonesian: Kami semua ditunjuk oleh Bubble sebagai juara dari kelas kami masing-masing, dan memimpin pasukan umat manusia melawan Shade dan penyamarannya.

English: I feel it is due time for a reunification of the original 8 heroes... I know the other reincarnations are out there. I just hope we will be able to convince the rest of them. We don't have much time…
Indonesian: Saya merasa sudah waktunya untuk penyatuan kembali dari 8 pahlawan asli... Saya tahu reinkarnasi lain ada di luar sana. Saya hanya berharap kita bisa meyakinkan mereka semua. Kami tidak punya banyak waktu...

English: It has come to my attention that several of the other heroes are currently residing in a large continent known as Darkon. For Madrigal's sake, would you be able to track them down?
Indonesian: Telah menjadi perhatian saya bahwa beberapa pahlawan lain saat ini tinggal di benua besar yang dikenal sebagai Darkon. Demi Madrigal, apakah kamu dapat melacaknya?

English: Make haste to meet the Mayor of Darkon. He sees over the main industrial town located in Darkon 2. Maybe he will have further information about the missing heroes.
Indonesian: Segeralah bertemu Mayor of Darkon. Dia ada di atas kota industri utama yang terletak di Darkon 2. Mungkin dia akan memiliki informasi lebih lanjut tentang pahlawan yang hilang.

English: I know it is a lot to take in, but you are going to have to trust me on this one. We don't have any time to waste.
Indonesian: Saya tahu bahwa memang banyak yang harus diterima, tetapi kamu harus mempercayai saya tentang yang satu ini. Kami tidak punya banyak waktu.

English: Oh! Hello young adventurer. You shouldn't sneak up on a man my age, nearly gave me a heart attack. Hahaha!!
Indonesian: Oh! Halo petualang muda. Kamu tidak boleh menyelinap pada pria seusia saya, hampir membuat saya terkena serangan jantung. Hahaha!!

English: You must locate the heroes of the past, so that Madrigal might have a future. Please speak with the Mayor of Darkon. I guarantee he will know something…
Indonesian: Kau harus menemukan pahlawan masa lalu, sehingga Madrigal mungkin bisa memiliki masa depan. Silakan berbicara dengan Mayor of Darkon. Saya jamin dia tahu sesuatu...

English: Go meet the Mayor of Darken located in Darkon 2. Maybe he will have more information on the missing heroes.
Indonesian: Temui Mayor of Darken yang terletak di Darkon 2. Mungkin dia akan memiliki lebih banyak informasi tentang pahlawan yang hilang.

English: The Problem with Leyenas
Indonesian: The Problem with Leyenas

English: What's this you speak of? Heroes? Can't say I've heard anything about that… But, I believe I know a person who may have…
Indonesian: Apa yang kau bicarakan?? Pahlawan?? Saya tidak bisa bilang bahwa saya pernah mendengar apa-apa tentang itu... Tapi, saya yakin saya mengenal seseorang yang mungkin tahu tentang hal ini...

English: Oh you want to know? Of course I will tell you… But first perhaps you could do me a favor?
Indonesian: Oh, kau ingin tahu? Tentu saja aku akan memberitahumu... Tapi pertama-tama bisakah kamu membantu saya?

English: I am frequently in touch with the mayors of both Saint City and Flarine. I have heard of your heroic actions and request your aid. There has been a dramatic increase in Leyena populations.
Indonesian: Saya sering berhubungan dengan walikota Saint City dan Flarine. Saya telah mendengar tentang tindakan heroikmu dan meminta bantuanmu. Ada peningkatan dramatis dalam populasi Leyena.

English: They have made it awfully hard for our workers to collect a rare ore which is a staple export here in Darken. Please defeat the Leyena and I will give you the information.
Indonesian: Mereka telah membuat pekerja kami sangat kesulitan untuk mengumpulkan rare ore yang merupakan ekspor pokok di Darken. Tolong kalahkan Leyena dan saya akan memberimu informasinya.

English: Thank you adventurer! The Leyena can be found in Eastern Darkon. Please decrease their population by killing 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas.
Indonesian: Terima kasih petualang! Leyena dapat ditemukan di Eastern Darkon. Harap kurangi populasi mereka dengan membunuh 20 Small Leyenas dan 10 Leyenas.

English: Hmm, what was it you needed again? My mind seems to be getting fuzzy... Since you are here, why not do some sightseeing?
Indonesian: Hmm, apa yang kamu butuhkan lagi? Pikiranku sepertinya semakin kabur... Karena kamu di sini, mengapa tidak melihat-lihat pemandangan sekitar?

English: Hah! It is just as I have heard. You are truly a problem saver! Now to uphold my end of the bargain!
Indonesian: Hah! Itu seperti yang saya dengar. Kau benar-benar penyelamat! Sekarang saatnya untuk akhir dari tawar-menawar saya!

English: Well? I'm not getting any younger! The Leyena are found in Eastern Darkon. Please get rid of at least 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas!
Indonesian: Saya tidak menjadi lebih muda! Leyena ditemukan di Darkon Timur. Harap singkirkan setidaknya 20 Small Leyenas dan 10 Leyenas!

English: Kill 20 Small Leyenas and 10 Leyenas.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Leyenas dan 10 Leyenas.

English: The Great Teacher Inisis
Indonesian: The Great Teacher Inisis

English: Search out the Great Teacher Inisis. She has a wealth of knowledge on many subjects and has produced many outstanding students. If anyone knows it would be her.
Indonesian: Carilah Great Teacher Inisis. Dia memiliki pengetahuan yang luas tentang banyak mata pelajaran dan telah menghasilkan banyak siswa berprestasi. Jika mencari orang yang tahu tentang sesuatu pastilah dia orangnya.

English: Inisis can be found at the center of Darken. Please go see her! I'm sure she will be of assistance!
Indonesian: Inisis dapat ditemukan di center of Darken. Silakan pergi menemuinya! Saya yakin dia akan membantu!

English: But be patient! Inisis will hardly give you the answers you seek so quickly!
Indonesian: Tapi bersabarlah! Inisis tidak akan memberimu jawaban yang kamu cari dengan segera!

English: Changed your mind already? Guess the task wasn't that important then.
Indonesian: Sudah berubah pikiran? Sepertinya tugas itu tidak begitu penting.

English: Hmm... You are new here aren't you? Have you journeyed all this way to become one of my students?
Indonesian: Hmm.. Kamu murid baru di sini bukan? Apakah kamu melakukan perjalanan sejauh ini untuk menjadi salah satu murid saya?

English: Go see Inisis. She is at the center of Darken.
Indonesian: Temui Inisis. Dia berada di center of Darken.

English: Go meet [Mentor] Inisis.
Indonesian: Menemui [Mentor] Inisis.

English: Corrupted Hunter
Indonesian: Corrupted Hunter

English: 8 legendary heroes? Hmm… Maybe… I have a person in my mind… but, I can't tell you so easily. First you must do something to show you are worthy of such information.
Indonesian: 8 pahlawan legendaris? Hmm... Mungkin... Saya memiliki seseorang dalam pikiran saya... tapi, aku tidak bisa memberitahumu dengan mudah. Pertama, kau harus melakukan sesuatu untuk menunjukkan bahwa engkau layak untuk mendapatkan informasi tersebut.

English: Foul monsters known as Trangfoma have been reported kidnapping civilians outside of the city. They are lead by a powerful lord Trangfoma. It needs to be defeated.
Indonesian: Foul monsters known as Trangfoma have been reported kidnapping civilians outside of the city. They are lead by a powerful lord Trangfoma. It needs to be defeated.

English: Please kill the Lord Trangfoma located in Eastern Darkon. He won't go down so easily so I would recommend enlisting the help of fellow warriors such as yourself.
Indonesian: Please kill the Lord Trangfoma located in Eastern Darkon. He won't go down so easily so I would recommend enlisting the help of fellow warriors such as yourself.

English: If you don't have time for this, I don't have time to give you the information you seek…
Indonesian: Jika kamu tidak punya waktu untuk ini, saya tidak punya waktu untuk memberi informasi yang kau cari ...

English: hmm… Impressive. You are stronger than you look. I will give you everything you need to know now.
Indonesian: Hmm... Mengesankan. Kau lebih kuat dari yang terlihat. Saya akan memberikan semua yang perlu kau ketahui sekarang.

English: Please relieve us of this threat. The Lord Trangfoma should be in Eastern Darkon.
Indonesian: Please relieve us of this threat. The Lord Trangfoma should be in Eastern Darkon.

English: Kill the Lord Trangfoma.
Indonesian: Kill the Lord Trangfoma.

English: Peculiar Creature
Indonesian: Peculiar Creature

English: Normally I'd be skeptical of such a claim, but I do recall coming across quite a peculiar sight…
Indonesian: Biasanya saya akan skeptis terhadap klaim semacam itu, tetapi saya ingat saya sempat menemukan hal yang cukup aneh ...

English: While out traveling, I came across a creature most bizarre not too far East of Darken City.
Indonesian: Saat bepergian, saya menemukan makhluk yang paling aneh tidak terlalu jauh di East of Darken City.

English: It looked like an animal, yet it seemed to be talking. It seems quite peculiar and might warrant an investigation. I'm not sure if this will actually help you or not…
Indonesian: Itu tampak seperti binatang, namun sepertinya bisa berbicara. Tampaknya cukup aneh dan sepertinya memerlukan penyelidikan. Saya tidak yakin apakah ini benar-benar akan membantumu atau tidak...

English: Please go investigate the nature of this matter. Maybe this creature might know something as well?
Indonesian: Silakan selidiki masalah ini. Mungkin makhluk ini tahu sesuatu juga?

English: I saw the creature near the Steel Knights, which reside in the Erons Factories. Go look for it there!
Indonesian: Saya melihat makhluk di dekat Carrier Bombs di sebelah timur Darken City. Cari di sana!

English: What? You don't believe me? Not like your story is any more believable!
Indonesian: Apa? Kamu tidak percaya padaku? Sepertinya ceritamu tidak bisa dipercaya lagi!

English: Hi! My name is Reodos...Oh come on! It's not like you are all that normal looking either!
Indonesian: Hai! Nama saya Reodos... Oh ayolah! Kalian semua tidaklah nampak normal juga!

English: A truly mysterious creature indeed… You can find it in the Erons Factories, near the Steel Knights.
Indonesian: Makhluk yang memang benar-benar misterius... Anda dapat menemukannya di sebelah Timur lokasi ini di dekat Carrier Bombs

English: Find the Mysterious Creature.
Indonesian: Temukan Mysterious Creature.

English: Steel Knight Night!
Indonesian: Malam Steel Knight!

English: What's that!? A reunification of the 8 heroes! You happen to be looking at one of them! I am Reodos, the mighty Ele…
Indonesian: Apa itu!? Reunifikasi dari 8 pahlawan! Anda kebetulan sedang melihat salah satunya! Saya Reodos, Ele yang perkasa ...

English: Well… was a mighty Elementor Hero… Shade cursed me. Trapping me in this cute furry little body was apparently the only way to contain all this power! Bwahaha!
Indonesian: Pahlawan Elementor yang perkasa ... Shade mengutukku. Menjebakku di tubuh kecil berbulu yang lucu ini tampaknya adalah satu-satunya cara untuk menahan semua kekuatan ini! Bwahaha!

English: I will have my vengeance upon Shade, she will scorn the day she ever messed with Reodos! Now I just need to figure a cure for this curse and…
Indonesian: Aku akan membalas dendam pada Shade, dia akan mencemooh hari dia pernah mengacaukan Reodos! Sekarang saya hanya perlu mencari obat untuk kutukan ini dan ...

English: Man! I can hardly hear my own thoughts with these stupid Steel Knights clanking around. Could you please get rid of some of them?
Indonesian: Huft! Aku hampir tidak bisa mendengar pikiranku sendiri dengan Steel Knights bodoh ini yang berdentang di sekitar. Bisakah Anda menyingkirkan beberapa di antaranya???

English: Awesome!! I'm trying to research into removing this curse but UGHHH those stupid Steel Knights! Kill like 20 Small Steel Knights & 10 Steel Knights. and I will be one happy unicorn, dog thing…
Indonesian: Keren!! Saya mencoba meneliti untuk menghilangkan kutukan ini tetapi UGHHH Steel Knights bodoh itu. Bunuh seperti 20 Small Steel Knights &10 Steel Knights. dan saya akan menjadi satu unicorn yang bahagia, hal anjing ...

English: You can't do that for me?
Indonesian: Kamu tidak bisa melakukan itu untukku?

English: Ah! Now I can collect my thoughts. What? You look at me like you've never met an Elementor before. Er… we are all a little eccentric I guess you could say.
Indonesian: Ah! Sekarang saya dapat mengumpulkan pikiran saya. Apa? Anda melihat saya seperti Anda belum pernah bertemu Elementor sebelumnya. Selain itu... kita semua sedikit eksentrik, saya kira Anda bisa mengatakannya.

English: Yes, yes the Steel Knights! Please eradicate 20 Small Steel Knights & 10 Steel Knights!
Indonesian: Ya, ya para Steel Knights! Tolong bersihkan 20 Small Steel Knights &10 Steel Knights!

English: Kill 20 Small Steel Knights and 10 Steel Knights.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Steel Knights dan 10 Steel Knights.

English: Trials and Tribulations
Indonesian: Trials and Tribulations

English: Oh! This pendant belonged to Reodos! So you found him after all? This is indeed great news!
Indonesian: Oh! Liontin ini milik Reodos! Jadi, anda menemukannya ?? Ini memang berita bagus!

English: I'm sure we will be able to break his curse and shall all once again be reunited. It is time we began the search for the other 4 heroes.
Indonesian: Saya yakin kita akan dapat mematahkan kutukannya dan akan sekali lagi dipersatukan kembali. Sudah saatnya kita mulai mencari 4 pahlawan lainnya.

English: Before this though, it is time you continued your own personal training. It seems you are ready to accept your second job class. This will mark an important step in your path so choose wisely!
Indonesian: Namun sebelum ini, inilah saatnya Anda melanjutkan pelatihan pribadi Anda sendiri. Sepertinya Anda siap menerima second job class Anda. Ini akan menandai langkah penting di jalan Anda, jadi pilihlah dengan bijak!

English: Please complete your second job quest. Once you have done this, go and meet Reodos again. Hopefully he has broken out of his curse by now.
Indonesian: Harap selesaikan second job quest Anda. Setelah Anda melakukan ini, pergi dan temui Reodos lagi. Mudah-mudahan dia sudah keluar dari kutukannya sekarang.

English: Please go and meet Reodos as soon as you have finished with your quest!
Indonesian: Silakan pergi dan temui Reodos segera setelah Anda selesai dengan pencarian Anda!

English: It is imperative that you complete your second job quest. This will mark another step in your journey to becoming a true warrior!
Indonesian: Sangat penting bagi Anda untuk menyelesaikan second job quest Anda. Ini akan menandai langkah lain dalam perjalanan Anda untuk menjadi pejuang sejati!

English: Oh! I see you have completed your second job change quests!
Indonesian: Oh! Saya melihat Anda telah menyelesaikan second job change quests!

English: Best of luck in the completion of the trials that lay before you!
Indonesian: Semoga sukses dalam penyelesaian trials yang ada di hadapan Anda!

English: Complete the 2nd job transfer then meet with Reodos.
Indonesian: Selesaikan 2nd job transfer lalu bertemu dengan Reodos.

English: The Insightful Store Owner
Indonesian: The Insightful Store Owner

English: Oh yeah! Hah, about that… for some reason my concoction didn't seem to break the curse. Could just be a delayed effect! Heh, wishful thinking, right?
Indonesian: Oh ya! Hah, tentang itu... untuk beberapa alasan ramuan saya tampaknya tidak mematahkan kutukan. Bisa jadi efek tertunda! Heh, angan-angan, kan??

English: Anyway! You came at just the right time! I've heard that a man named Achaben has reported seeing who I believe to be one of the 8 missing heroes. Will you go talk with him?
Indonesian: Ngomong-ngomong! Anda datang pada waktu yang tepat! Saya pernah mendengar bahwa seorang pria bernama Achaben telah melaporkan melihat siapa yang saya yakini sebagai salah satu dari 8 pahlawan yang hilang. Maukah kamu berbicara dengannya??

English: Achaben is the owner of the General Shop in Darken. Please go meet with him and see what he has to say!
Indonesian: Achaben adalah pemilik Toko Umum di Darken. Silakan pergi menemuinya dan lihat apa yang dia katakan!

English: Still 4 more heroes to find! Lets not just call it quits now!
Indonesian: Masih ada 4 hero lagi yang bisa ditemukan! Jangan sebut berhenti saja sekarang!

English: Greetings there! What is it I can do for you?
Indonesian: Salam! Apa yang bisa saya lakukan untuk Anda?

English: Achaben is the owner of Common General Shop in Darken. Go see him. I will just lay low till then!
Indonesian: Achaben adalah pemilik Common General Shop di Darken. Pergi temui dia. Saya hanya akan berbaring diam sampai saat itu!

English: Meet Achaben.
Indonesian: Temui Achaben.

English: Oh! Interested in the stories of this so called super hero I see? Can't say I know a whole lot about him.
Indonesian: Oh! Tertarik dengan kisah-kisah yang disebut pahlawan super yang saya lihat ini? Tidak bisa saya katakan saya tahu banyak tentang dia.

English: There was someone who had more insight into this mysterious man. Oh, what was his name now! Oh I've just got so much on my mind right now its hard to think about anything!
Indonesian: Ada seseorang yang memiliki lebih banyak wawasan tentang pria misterius ini. Oh, siapa namanya sekarang! Oh, saya baru saja memikirkan banyak hal saat ini, sulit untuk memikirkan apa pun!

English: You want to know what the problem is? I had an important package to deliver but I can't for the life of me remember what I did with it…
Indonesian: Anda ingin tahu apa masalahnya? Saya memiliki paket penting untuk dikirim tetapi saya tidak bisa mengingat apa yang saya lakukan dengannya ...

English: The package contained special drills acquired from the Drillers in Darkon. Some of the sturdiest around!! If you could acquire some of these drills for me it would surely help a lot!
Indonesian: Paket tersebut berisi special drills yang diperoleh dari Drillers di Darkon. Beberapa yang paling kokoh di sekitar!! Jika Anda dapat memperoleh beberapa drills ini untuk saya, itu pasti akan sangat membantu!

English: Oh! You will get the drills for me!! You are really great! Drillers can be found Southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. Acquire 10 drills and bring them to Remine the weapon smith.
Indonesian: Oh! Anda akan mendapatkan drills untuk saya!! Anda benar-benar hebat! Pengebor dapat ditemukan di Southwest of the Gouthan Mountains. Dapatkan 10 drills dan bawa ke Remine the weapon smith.

English: Oh no... I'm in trouble now. Who will ever want the business of such a forgetful store owner!
Indonesian: Oh tidak.. Saya dalam masalah sekarang. Siapa yang akan menginginkan bisnis pemilik toko yang pelupa!

English: Achaben sent you here I see! Are these the Hard Drills I ordered?
Indonesian: Achaben mengirimmu ke sini, oh begitu! Apakah ini Hard Drills yang saya pesan?

English: Thank you again! Please make haste and acquire the 10 Hard Drills and take them to Remine the Darken weapon smith.
Indonesian: Sekali lagi terima kasih! Harap segera dan dapatkan 10 Hard Drills dan bawa ke Remine the Darken weapon smith.

English: Acquire 10 Hard Drill from the Drillers in Darkon and bring them to Remine
Indonesian: Dapatkan 10 Hard Drill dari Drillers di Darkon dan bawa ke Remine

English: Customer Satisfaction
Indonesian: Customer Satisfaction

English: Just in time! Now I can finally finish my work. Will you tell Achaben thanks for me!
Indonesian: Tepat pada waktunya! Sekarang saya akhirnya bisa menyelesaikan pekerjaan saya. Maukah Anda memberi tahu Achaben terima kasih untuk saya!

English: Tell Achaben I will be doing all my ordering from him in the future!
Indonesian: Beri tahu Achaben bahwa saya akan melakukan semua pesanan saya darinya di masa depan!

English: Oh? You think I should go tell him myself?
Indonesian: Oh? Anda pikir saya harus pergi memberitahunya sendiri?

English: Did you deliver the package to Remine? *phew* Oh, Thank you. You saved me.
Indonesian: Apakah Anda mengirimkan paket ke Remine? *fiuh* Oh, Terima kasih. Anda menyelamatkan saya.

English: Did you deliver my greetings to Achaben?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda menyampaikan salam saya kepada Achaben?

English: Meet with Achaben.
Indonesian: Bertemu Achaben.

English: In the Shadow of the Mountains
Indonesian: Dalam Bayang-Bayang Pegunungan

English: While you were delivering the package, I looked further into this hero that you were inquiring about. A friend of mine, Est, seems to have more information on him.
Indonesian: Saat Anda mengirimkan paket, saya melihat lebih jauh ke dalam pahlawan yang Anda tanyakan ini. Seorang teman saya, Est, tampaknya memiliki lebih banyak informasi tentang dia.

English: Est is conducting research in the Gouthan Mountains, but is currently besieged by monsters. If you were to help him, he will tell you what you need.
Indonesian: Est sedang melakukan penelitian di Pegunungan Gouthan, tetapi saat ini dikepung oleh monster. Jika Anda membantunya, dia akan memberi tahu Anda apa yang Anda butuhkan.

English: Please head to the Gouthan Mountains in Northern Darkon and defeat 10 Small Volt and 10 Captain Driller. Then meet with Est.
Indonesian: Silakan pergi ke Gouthan Mountains di Northern Darkon dan kalahkan 10 Small Volt dan 10 Captain Driller. Kemudian bertemu dengan Est.

English: Oh well, understandable. I'm not much of a fighter myself.
Indonesian: Oh yah, bisa dimengerti. Saya sendiri bukan petarung.

English: What!? The Volts and Drillers just suddenly disappeared! Oh, were you responsible for this?
Indonesian: Apa!? Volt dan Driller tiba-tiba menghilang! Oh, apakah kamu bertanggung jawab untuk ini??

English: Please hurry to the Gouthan Mountains! I'm worried that if we don't act soon, something bad might happen to Est!
Indonesian: Cepat ke Gouthan Mountains! Saya khawatir jika kita tidak segera bertindak, sesuatu yang buruk mungkin terjadi pada Est!

English: Kill 10 Small Volt and 15 Captain Driller, then meet with Est
Indonesian: Bunuh 10 Small Volt dan 15 Captain Driller, lalu bertemu dengan Est

English: The Jester Hero!
Indonesian: The Jester Hero!

English: I was trapped by the monsters while researching and hid behind these rocks here. Ahh, so you are searching for the super hero?
Indonesian: Saya terjebak oleh monster saat meneliti dan bersembunyi di balik bebatuan ini di sini. Ahh, jadi kamu sedang mencari pahlawan super??

English: I briefly came across him earlier while high up in the Gouthan Mountains. He was in a hurry to save a young boy trapped in Eastern Darkon. Maybe you could head there?
Indonesian: Saya sempat menemukannya lebih awal saat berada di Gouthan Mountains. Dia sedang terburu-buru untuk menyelamatkan seorang anak laki-laki yang terperangkap di Eastern Darkon. Mungkin Anda bisa menuju ke sana?

English: So you are going there? You are quite brave! This mysterious hero has to be somewhere near where the boy is in Eastern Darkon
Indonesian: Jadi, Anda akan pergi ke sana? Anda cukup berani! Pahlawan misterius ini harus berada di suatu tempat di dekat tempat bocah itu berada di Eastern Darkon

English: Don't blame you. I prefer to stay out of trouble like that myself anyway!
Indonesian: Jangan salahkan Anda. Saya sendiri lebih suka menghindari masalah seperti itu!

English: Hush! Be very quiet! I, Zoro the Magnificent!.....am in the middle of a very important mission!
Indonesian: Hush! Diam! Aku, Zoro yang Luar Biasa!..... Saya berada di tengah-tengah misi yang sangat penting!

English: Look around the prison in which the boy is locked in East Darkon. I'm sure the hero will be there.
Indonesian: Lihatlah sekeliling penjara tempat bocah itu dikurung di East Darkon. Saya yakin pahlawan itu akan ada di sana.

English: Find Zoro.
Indonesian: Temukan Zoro.

English: Key to the Prison
Indonesian: Key to the Prison

English: I apologize but I have no time to talk. I have to figure a way to rescue that boy and I'm afraid the at time is limited.
Indonesian: Saya minta maaf tetapi saya tidak punya waktu untuk berbicara. Saya harus mencari cara untuk menyelamatkan anak laki-laki itu dan saya khawatir waktunya terbatas.

English: At any moment the Steam Walker that put the boy there might return, so I must keep an ever vigilant watch! Maybe you COULD help me?
Indonesian: Setiap saat Steamwalker yang menempatkan bocah itu di sana mungkin akan kembali, jadi saya harus terus waspada! Mungkin kamu BISA membantu saya?

English: How about this? While I secure the perimeter, you acquire a key to open the prison door. Deal?
Indonesian: Bagaimana dengan ini? Sementara saya mengamankan perimeter, Anda mendapatkan kunci untuk membuka pintu penjara. Setuju?

English: Great! While I secure the area, quickly retrieve a key from one of the Steam Walkers!
Indonesian: Hebat! Saat saya mengamankan area tersebut, ambil kunci dengan cepat dari salah satu Steamwalker!

English: If you won't help me then I have no time to deal with you!
Indonesian: Jika Anda tidak mau membantu saya maka saya tidak punya waktu untuk berurusan dengan Anda!

English: Huzzah! Mission accomplished. Good thing I was here. Who knows what might have happened. Anyway! Time for phase 2!
Indonesian: Huzzah! Misi tercapai. Untung saya ada di sini. Siapa yang tahu apa yang mungkin terjadi. Anyway! Saatnya fase 2!

English: Quickly! Quickly! Retrieve the prison key from one of the Steam Walkers! We may not have much time!
Indonesian: Cepat! Cepat! Ambil kunci penjara dari salah satu Steamwalker! Kita tidak punya banyak waktu!

English: Find a Prison Key by killing Steam Walkers.
Indonesian: Temukan Prison Key dengan membunuh Steamwalker.

English: A Test of Trust
Indonesian: A Test of Trust

English: Now we just need to wait for the right moment to open the door! What is your business with me anyway?
Indonesian: Sekarang kita hanya perlu menunggu saat yang tepat untuk membuka pintu! Apa urusanmu denganku sih??

English: Gathering the 8 original heroes? Hmph. Been so long I can hardly recall. Only member I've kept in touch with is Elaine… err, forget I said anything. Hah.
Indonesian: Mengumpulkan 8 pahlawan asli? Hmph. Sudah begitu lama saya hampir tidak bisa mengingatnya. Anggota yang terus saya hubungi hanyalah Elaine... err, lupakan aku mengatakan sesuatu. Hah.

English: I can prove quickly if it was truly Reonan who sent you. Reonan is perceptive when it comes to people and he doesn't choose just any pushover! How about a test of your skill?
Indonesian: Aku bisa membuktikan dengan cepat jika benar-benar Reonan yang mengirimmu. Reonan tanggap dalam hal yang berkaitan dengan orang dan dia tidak memilih sembarangan! Bagaimana dengan ujian keahlian Anda?

English: First, I need to test your skill. Go kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts and come back, Then I will trust you and participate to Reonan's decision.
Indonesian: Pertama, saya perlu menguji keahlian Anda. Bunuh 15 Volt &15 Captain Volts dan kembalilah, Maka saya akan mempercayai Anda dan berpartisipasi dalam keputusan Reonan.

English: How about you… mmm… Kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts! BAM! There we go. A true test of skill. Then I will know for sure! You can find them East of this location.
Indonesian: Bagaimana denganmu... Mmm... Bunuh 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts!! BAM! Di sana kita pergi. Ujian keterampilan yang sebenarnya. Maka saya akan tahu pasti! Anda dapat menemukannya di sebelah Timur lokasi ini.

English: This is the only way to earn my trust.
Indonesian: Ini adalah satu-satunya cara untuk mendapatkan kepercayaan saya.

English: Guess I will give credit where it's due. You aren't THAT much of a weakling! Alright, guess I will trust you!
Indonesian: Kiranya saya akan menyebutkan namamu saat jatuh temponya. Anda tidak terlalu lemah! Baiklah, kurasa aku akan mempercayaimu!

English: Zoning out the entire time I was giving instructions? Head east of this location and kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts!
Indonesian: Zonasi sepanjang waktu saya memberikan instruksi?? Pergilah ke timur lokasi ini dan bunuh 15 Volt & 15 Captain Volts!

English: Kill 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Volts & 15 Captain Volts.

English: The Retired Hero
Indonesian: The Retired Hero

English: Since you have my trust, I will give you another piece of information. There is another hero hiding out here in Darkon. His name is Elaine, Hero Ranger.
Indonesian: Karena Anda memiliki kepercayaan saya, saya akan memberi Anda informasi lain. Ada pahlawan lain yang bersembunyi di sini di Darkon. Namanya Elaine, Hero Ranger.

English: After the war, and our reincarnation, both Elaine and I fled up here to the mountains.
Indonesian: Setelah perang, dan reinkarnasi kami, baik Elaine dan saya melarikan diri ke sini ke pegunungan.

English: If Reonan is trying so hard to reach out to us, then I guess it might be time again. You should go to find Elaine.
Indonesian: Jika Reonan berusaha keras untuk menjangkau kami, maka saya kira ini mungkin sudah waktunya. Kamu harus pergi mencari Elaine.

English: He lives west of this current location. Be warned. Since the war, he has retired his weapons and become a self proclaimed pacifist. I'm not sure how willing he will be to join with the rest…
Indonesian: Dia tinggal di sebelah barat lokasi saat ini. Berhati-hatilah. Semenjak perang, ia telah mempensiunkan senjatanya dan menjadi pasifis yang memproklamirkan diri. Saya tidak yakin seberapa bersedia dia untuk bergabung dengan yang lain...

English: Well, you know where he is. Whenever you have the time, seek him out.
Indonesian: Kau tahu di mana dia berada. Kapan pun kau punya waktu, carilah dia.

English: Greetings stranger! My name is Elaine. What brings you all the way up here?
Indonesian: Salam, orang asing! Nama saya Elaine. Apa yang membawamu sampai ke sini?

English: Elaine lives just West of this location. Please go and find him!
Indonesian: Elaine tinggal tepat di sebelah barat lokasi ini. Pergi dan temukan dia!

English: Find Elaine.
Indonesian: Temukan Elaine.

English: Forest Destroyers
Indonesian: Forest Destroyers

English: Ahh, Reonan is looking to reunite the original 8 heroes you say? He was a dear friend, but I don't think I will be able to fulfill his request. You see… things have changed since that time…
Indonesian: Ahh, Reonan ingin menyatukan kembali 8 pahlawan asli kamu bilang? Dia adalah teman baik, tetapi saya tidak yakin saya akan dapat memenuhi permintaannya. Kau tahu... banyak hal yang telah berubah sejak saat itu...

English: I know it is for the sake of Madrigal! But, I've resigned from a life of heroics. All I desire now is to live in peace…
Indonesian: Saya tahu itu demi Madrigal! Tapi, saya telah mengundurkan diri dari kehidupan heroik. Yang saya inginkan sekarang adalah hidup dalam damai ...

English: You sure are persistent eh? I'll hear you out if you do something for me. Recently, the ecosystem has been suffering due to deforestation caused by the Elderguards. Defeat them, and I will listen.
Indonesian: Anda sangat gigih ya? Aku akan mendengarmu jika kamu melakukan sesuatu untukku. Baru-baru ini, ekosistem telah menderita karena deforestasi yang disebabkan oleh Elderguards. Kalahkan mereka, dan aku akan mendengarkan.

English: Kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards, responsible for the devastation to this environment, and you have my undivided attention!
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Elderguards &15 Elderguards, yang bertanggung jawab atas kehancuran lingkungan ini, dan kamu akan memiliki semua perhatian saya!

English: The forest needs our aid!
Indonesian: The forest membutuhkan bantuan kita!

English: Wow, you really accomplished the task! Because of you, I no longer need to concern myself over further deforestation!
Indonesian: Wow, kau benar-benar menyelesaikan tugas! Karenmu, saya tidak perlu lagi mengkhawatirkan diri saya sendiri atas deforestasi lebih lanjut!

English: Please go kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards before they destroy anymore of this environment!
Indonesian: Tolong bunuh 20 Small Elderguards &15 Elderguards sebelum mereka menghancurkan lingkungan ini lagi!

English: Kill 20 Small Elderguards & 15 Elderguards located in the Northwestern region of Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Elderguards &15 Elderguards yang terletak di wilayah Northwestern Darkon 1.

English: Construction Gone Awry
Indonesian: Construction Gone Awry

English: Alright, I guess I should uphold my end of the promise!
Indonesian: Baiklah, kurasa aku harus menjunjung tinggi akhir dari janjiku!

English: You say Zoro is going to reunite with Reonan? Well... He did always like playing the Hero. What's this? A letter from Zoro?
Indonesian: Kamu bilang Zoro akan bersatu kembali dengan Reonan? Dia selalu suka berperan menjadi Pahlawan. Apa ini?? Surat dari Zoro??

English: Alright. I will read his letter. While I do that, would it be possible for another favor? Monsters, known as Garbagespiders, have been ravaging the land. Could you please defeat them?
Indonesian: Baiklah. Saya akan membaca suratnya. Sementara saya melakukan itu, apakah memungkinkan untuk minta bantuan lain?? Monster, yang dikenal sebagai Garbagespiders, telah menghancurkan tanah ini. Bisakah kamu mengalahkan mereka?

English: Garbagespiders were once used to assist workers in construction. They have since become cursed and are soley bent on destruction. Please defeat 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders.
Indonesian: Garbagespiders pernah digunakan untuk membantu pekerja di bidang konstruksi. Sejak itu mereka menjadi terkutuk dan bertekad untuk menghancurkan. Tolong kalahkan 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders.

English: Hmm… I would prefer to read the letter without anyone around…
Indonesian: Hmm... Saya lebih suka membaca surat itu tanpa ada orang di sekitarku...

English: Just in time! I have finished reading the letter.
Indonesian: Tepat pada waktunya! Saya telah selesai membaca surat itu.

English: Please go defeat 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders in Darkon 1 while I finish reading this letter.
Indonesian: Silakan kalahkan 20 Small Garbagespiders &15 Garbagespiders di Darkon 1 sementara saya menyelesaikan membaca surat ini.

English: Kill 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders located near the entrance to Dekane Dungeon.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Garbagespiders & 15 Garbagespiders yang terletak di dekat pintu masuk ke Dekane Dungeon.

English: Elaine's Reply
Indonesian: Elaine's Reply

English: Zoro wrote this letter to convince me… but no!! I thought about it and nothing can change my mind. After the war, I promised myself I would never kill again… I intend to uphold that vow…
Indonesian: Zoro menulis surat ini untuk meyakinkanku... tapi tidak!! Saya sudah memikirkannya dan tidak ada yang bisa merubah pikiranku. Setelah perang, saya berjanji pada diri sendiri bahwa saya tidak akan pernah membunuh lagi ... Saya bertekad untuk menjunjung tinggi sumpah itu ...

English: Can you bring this to Zoro? This letter is for him.
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu membawa ini ke Zoro? Surat ini untuknya.

English: Thank you. When Zoro reads this letter, he will fully understand my rationale…
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Ketika Zoro membaca surat ini, dia akan sepenuhnya memahami alasanku...

English: I hope you will reconsider. I want Zoro to understand my reasons for declining the offer.
Indonesian: Saya harap Anda akan mempertimbangkan kembali. Saya ingin Zoro memahami alasan saya menolak tawaran itu.

English: Have you met with Elaine yet? Hmm? He sent a letter?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda sudah bertemu dengan Elaine? Hmm? Dia mengirim surat?

English: Did you give my letter to Zoro yet?
Indonesian: Apakah kamu sudah memberikan suratku kepada Zoro?

English: Meet Zoro and give him Elaine's letter.
Indonesian: Temui Zoro dan beri dia surat Elaine.

English: Repressing the Past
Indonesian: Repressing the Past

English: *Reading letter* Hmm... I see. There is a reason he refuses to fight. Elaine had a sister, Hannah, for whom he cared very dearly…
Indonesian: *Membaca surat* Hmm.. Saya mengerti. Ada alasan dia menolak untuk bertarung. Elaine memiliki seorang saudara perempuan, Hannah, yang sangat dia sayangi...

English: She was killed during the war… Only, Elaine didn't learn of any of this until after everything was over. He blamed himself for it all…
Indonesian: Dia terbunuh selama perang... Hanya saja, Elaine tidak mengetahui semua ini sampai setelah semuanya selesai. Dia menyalahkan dirinya sendiri atas itu semua...

English: In a fit of rage, he threw her ring, the last memento he had of her, into the air somewhere in Western Darkon 1. If you could retrieve it maybe he would reconsider?
Indonesian: Dalam kemarahan, dia melemparkan cincinnya, kenang-kenangan terakhir yang dia miliki darinya, ke udara di suatu tempat di Western Darkon 1. Jika Anda bisa mengambilnya mungkin dia akan mempertimbangkannya kembali?

English: I guarantee you a Garbagespider ate the ring. They eat anything and everything! Please head to Western Darkon and defeat Garbagespiders until you can recover the ring!
Indonesian: Saya yakin Garbagespider memakan cincin itu. Mereka makan apa saja dan segalanya! Pergilah ke Western Darkon dan kalahkan Garbagespiders sampai Anda bisa mendapatkan kembali cincin itu!

English: Oh… I figured you would do this for him…
Indonesian: Oh... Saya pikir Anda akan melakukan ini untuknya ...

English: Yes! Yes! This is it!
Indonesian: Ya! Ya! Ini dia!

English: I'm sure a Garbagespider has the ring! Please go and reclaim it for Elaine's sake!
Indonesian: Saya yakin Garbagespider memiliki cincin itu! Pergilah dan ambil kembali demi Elaine!

English: Kill Garbagespiders and reclaim the Promise Ring
Indonesian: Bunuh Garbagespiders dan ambil kembali Promise Ring

English: The Promise Ring
Indonesian: The Promise Ring

English: Alright, bring that ring to Elaine. It will be painful for him, but… I feel it's important that it is returned to him. Maybe he will feel something that was lost a long time ago.
Indonesian: Baiklah, bawa cincin itu ke Elaine. Itu akan menyakitkan baginya, tapi ... Saya rasa penting jika cincin itu dikembalikan kepadanya. Mungkin dia akan merasakan ada sesuatu yang hilang sejak lama.

English: I know he would rather repress all these painful memories, but the time has come to stop hiding and face our individual destinies. Please take this ring to him
Indonesian: Saya tahu dia lebih suka untuk menyembunyikan semua kenangan menyakitkan ini, tetapi waktunya telah tiba untuk berhenti bersembunyi dan menghadapi nasib pribadi kita. Tolong bawa cincin ini padanya.

English: I'm sure the result will be good. Go! Give that ring to Elaine.
Indonesian: Saya yakin hasilnya akan bagus. Pergilah! Berikan cincin itu kepada Elaine.

English: If you don't want to do it, then I'll do it myself alright?
Indonesian: Jika Anda tidak ingin melakukannya, maka saya akan melakukannya sendiri,oke?

English: Why are you here again? I hope I was clear before about…
Indonesian: Mengapa Anda ada di sini lagi? Saya rasa penjelasan saya cukup jelas sebelumnya tentang...

English: Did you return the Promise Ring to Elaine yet? What are you waiting for?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda sudah mengembalikan Promise Ring ke Elaine? Tunggu apalagi?

English: Meet Elaine and give him the Promise Ring
Indonesian: Temui Elaine dan berikan Promise Ring

English: Time to Resign
Indonesian: Time to Resign

English: This ring is... Where did you find this!? Yes... You are right. This ring belong to my sister. This is my only reminder of a past I've since tried to forget…
Indonesian: Cincin ini adalah ..!! Di mana Anda menemukan ini !? Ya.. Kamu benar. Cincin ini milik saudara perempuanku. Ini adalah satu-satunya pengingat tentang masa lalu yang sejak saat itu saya coba lupakan ...

English: I gave this ring to her as promise to always be there for her, but I couldn't fulfill that promise… I will forever blame myself for the events that befell her…
Indonesian: Saya memberikan cincin ini kepadanya sebagai janji untuk selalu ada untuknya, tetapi saya tidak dapat memenuhi janji itu ... Saya akan selamanya menyalahkan diri sendiri atas peristiwa yang telah menimpanya...

English: You are right… I can't keep hiding forever. I need to take a stand. I need to prevent a situation like this from ever occurring again.
Indonesian: Kamu benar... Saya tidak bisa terus bersembunyi selamanya. Saya harus mengambil sikap. Saya perlu mencegah situasi seperti ini terjadi lagi.

English: I will join alongside Zoro and Reonan. Before this, I need to wrap up some work. Could you please assist me this one last time?
Indonesian: Aku akan bergabung bersama Zoro dan Reonan. Sebelum ini, saya perlu menyelesaikan beberapa pekerjaan. Bisakah Anda membantu saya kali ini untuk terakhir kalinya?

English: I oversaw the Darkon Environmental Association. Unfortunately, if I am to prepare for battle, I will no longer be able to fulfill my duties. Could you inform the Mayor of my departure?
Indonesian: Saya mengawasi Darkon Environmental Association. Sayangnya, jika saya ingin bersiap untuk pertempuran, saya tidak akan lagi dapat memenuhi tugas saya. Bisakah Anda memberi tahu Mayor tentang kepergian saya?

English: I would do it myself, but it will take up even more of my time…
Indonesian: Saya akan melakukannya sendiri, tetapi itu akan memakan lebih banyak waktu saya...

English: Oh, you are that adventurer. What are you doing back this way?
Indonesian: Oh, kamu adalah petualang itu. Apa yang kamu lakukan dengan kembali ke sini?

English: It will be great if the Mayor of Darken understands my decision...
Indonesian: Akan sangat bagus jika Mayor of Darken memahami keputusan saya..

English: Go meet the Mayor of Darken and inform him of Elaine's departure.
Indonesian: Temui Mayor of Darken dan beri tahu dia tentang kepergian Elaine.

English: Darkon's Environmental Management
Indonesian: Darkon's Environmental Management

English: Ahh! So you are here for Elaine? Of course I know who he is, Elaine is the president of our Environmental Group...
Indonesian: Ahh! Jadi, kamu di sini untuk Elaine? Tentu saja saya tahu siapa dia, Elaine adalah pimpinan Environmental Group kami..

English: What? He is resigning as president? Hmm… this is a bad news... He kept things stable around here. What will happen if he is not here!
Indonesian: Apa? Dia mengundurkan diri? Hmm... ini adalah berita buruk.. Dia menjaga semuanya tetap stabil di sini. Apa yang akan terjadi jika dia tidak ada di sini!

English: Hmm... You are right. The preservation of nature doesn't rest in the hands of one man, but with all of us… Could you please bring me some wastebaskets?
Indonesian: Hmm.. Kamu benar. Pelestarian alam tidak hanya bergantung di tangan satu orang, tetapi kita semua ... Bisakah kamu membawakan saya beberapa wastebaskets?

English: Please go and collect 10 Wastebaskets from Garbagespiders. It is the time for a brighter, cleaner Darken City!
Indonesian: Silakan pergi dan kumpulkan 10 Wastebaskets dari Garbagespiders. Ini adalah waktu untuk Darken City menjadi lebih cerah dan lebih bersih!

English: You don't even care about it do you?. If we keep this way, there won't be any hope left.
Indonesian: Anda bahkan tidak peduli tentang itu bukan?. Jika kita tetap seperti ini, tidak akan ada harapan yang tersisa.

English: Thank you! Now we will do our best to keep the environment clean!
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Sekarang kami akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk menjaga lingkungan tetap bersih!

English: Wastebaskets can be found from Garbagespiders, located in the Western regions of Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Wastebaskets bisa didapat dari Garbagespiders, yang terletak di wilayah Barat Darkon 1.

English: You can acquire Wastebaskets from Garbagespiders.
Indonesian: Anda dapat memperoleh Wastebaskets dari Garbagespiders.

English: A Brighter, Cleaner Darkon!
Indonesian: A Brighter, Cleaner Darkon!

English: We have went ahead and processed Elaine's resignation. Go and tell him about it.
Indonesian: Kami telah melanjutkan dan memproses pengunduran diri Elaine. Pergi dan ceritakan padanya tentang hal itu.

English: Let him know not to worry about us. We understand that whatever it is he is up to must be of the utmost importance.
Indonesian: Beri tahu dia untuk tidak mengkhawatirkan kita. Kami memahami bahwa apa pun yang dia lakukan adalah yang paling penting.

English: Please let him know at some point at least!
Indonesian: Tolong setidaknya biarkan dia mengetahui beberapa hal!

English: What happened?
Indonesian: Apa yang terjadi?

English: We have processed Elaine's resignation. Please go see him now.
Indonesian: Kami telah memproses pengunduran diri Elaine. Silahkan temui dia sekarang.

English: Go meet Elaine and let him know of the result of his resignation.
Indonesian: Temui Elaine dan beri tahu dia tentang hasil pengunduran dirinya.

English: The Squirrels Took It!
Indonesian: The Squirrels Took It!

English: Breaking the Curse (1)
Indonesian: Breaking the Curse (1)

English: As I was going to say! I would love to reunite with my fellow heroes, but I can't do much in my, uh… current form hehe. Never fear! I think I have a possible solution!
Indonesian: Seperti yang akan saya katakan! Saya ingin sekali bersatu kembali dengan sesama pahlawan, tetapi saya tidak bisa berbuat banyak dalam, uh ... bentuk saya saat ini hehe. Jangan pernah takut! Saya pikir saya punya solusi yang bisa dilakukan!

English: I have a list of items I need to create a powerful concoction that might possibly alleviate this curse… OR destroy us all. Want in on it? Don't worry, I'm sure everything will be fine! Bwahaha.
Indonesian: Saya memiliki daftar item yang saya butuhkan untuk membuat ramuan yang kuat yang mungkin dapat meringankan kutukan ini ... ATAU menghancurkan kita semua. Mau coba?? Jangan khawatir, saya yakin semuanya akan baik-baik saja! Bwahaha.

English: Excellent! The first material I will need is a Forsaken Soul. You can collect one from the Zombiger directly West of Darken City.
Indonesian: Kerja yang bagus! Bahan pertama yang akan saya butuhkan adalah Forsaken Soul. Anda bisa mendapatkannya dari Zombiger di West of Darken City.

English: I would collect the items myself, but, I don't have opposable thumbs!! Hahaha! Jerk…
Indonesian: Saya akan mengumpulkan barang-barang itu sendiri, tetapi, saya tidak memiliki ibu jari!! Hahaha! Brengsek...

English: Oh! Nice work! The first component has been acquired!!
Indonesian: Oh! Kerja bagus! Komponen pertama telah diperoleh!!

English: Yes, yes Zombiger, Forsaken Soul, blah blah blah, you know what to do, now snap to it!
Indonesian: Ya, ya Zombiger, Forsaken Soul, bla bla bla, kau tahulah apa yang harus dilakukan, sekarang buruan ke sana!

English: Kill the Zombiger West of Darken City and acquire the Forsaken Soul.
Indonesian: Bunuh Zombiger West of Darken City dan dapatkan Forsaken Soul.

English: Breaking the Curse (2)
Indonesian: Breaking the Curse (2)

English: Yes you heard me correctly, FIRST component. What!? Did you think breaking this curse would be THAT easy? Hah!
Indonesian: Ya, Anda mendengar saya dengan benar, komponen PERTAMA. Apa!? Apakah menurut Anda mematahkan kutukan ini akan semudah ITU? Hah!

English: Next I will be needing Hard Steel Powder. Unfortunately, as with most things in life, this is easier said than done!
Indonesian: Selanjutnya saya akan membutuhkan Hard Steel Powder. Sayangnya, seperti kebanyakan hal dalam hidup, ini lebih mudah diucapkan daripada dilakukan!

English: First you will need to get Steel pieces, then take them to Amadolka. He is knowledgeable in metallurgy and can convert the pieces to powder. Up to the challenge?
Indonesian: Pertama, Anda perlu mendapatkan Steel Pieces, lalu membawanya ke Amadolka. Dia berpengetahuan luas dalam metalurgi dan dapat mengubah potongan-potongan menjadi bubuk. Siap untuk ikut tantangan ini?

English: Good!! Kill Steel Knights near the Erons Factory to get the Steel Pieces, then bring them to Amadolka!
Indonesian: Bagus!! Bunuh Steelknights di dekat Erons Factory untuk mendapatkan Steel Pieces, lalu bawa ke Amadolka!

English: What? Complicated? What's complicated is being a man, trapped in a fuzzy little body! Try that on for size!
Indonesian: Apa? Rumit? Yang rumit adalah menjadi seorang manusia, terjebak dalam tubuh kecil yang tidak jelas! Coba saja dengan ukuran segini!

English: Woah! Don't get many visitors out this way. What are you looking for here anyway?
Indonesian: Woah! Jangan sampai banyak pengunjung yang keluar dengan cara ini. Apa yang kamu cari di sini?

English: You heard me correctly! Kill Steel Knights to get Steel Pieces and go to Amadolka. You got this champ!
Indonesian: Kamu mendengar saya dengan benar! Bunuh Steelknights untuk mendapatkan Steel Pieces dan pergi ke Amadolka. Kamu pasti bisa melakukannya!

English: Kill Steel Knights to collect Steel Pieces and bring them to Amadolka.
Indonesian: Bunuh Steelknights untuk mengumpulkan Steel Pieces dan membawanya ke Amadolka.

English: Breaking the Curse (3)
Indonesian: Breaking the Curse (3)

English: Ahh~ turning Steel Pieces into Hard Steel Powder? Actually, I will unfortunately be unable to complete such a request, for my machinery currently is not operational.
Indonesian: Ahh ~ mengubah Steel Pieces menjadi Hard Steel Powder? Sebenarnya, sayangnya saya tidak akan dapat menyelesaikan permintaan seperti itu, karena mesin saya saat ini tidak berfungsi.

English: The only other person I can think of with machinery powerful enough to grind the Steel Pieces to Powder would be cell at the Erons Factory. Seek him out and ask for his help!
Indonesian: Satu-satunya orang lain yang dapat saya pikirkan dengan mesin yang cukup kuat untuk menggiling Steel Pieces menjadi Powder adalah Cell di Erons Factory. Carilah dia dan minta bantuannya!

English: I have little to no clue what you intend to do with the Hard Steel Powder, but I wish you luck!
Indonesian: Saya tidak tahu apa yang ingin Anda lakukan dengan Hard Steel Powder, tetapi saya berharap Anda beruntung!

English: Well! Back to work for me!
Indonesian: Kembalilah bekerja untuk saya!

English: Har har har what do we have here? A new employee? You seem a little puny for a factory worker? Oh, nevermind!
Indonesian: Har har har apa yang kita miliki di sini?? Karyawan baru? Kamu tampak sedikit lemah untuk seorang pekerja pabrik?? Oh, lupakan saja!

English: Yes, Cell is his name. You should be able to find him North of this location. Ask him to grind the Steel Pieces for you.
Indonesian: Ya, Cell adalah namanya. Anda harus dapat menemukannya di utara lokasi ini. Minta dia untuk menggiling Steel Pieces untukmu.

English: Seek out Cell and ask him to grind the Steel Pieces.
Indonesian: Carilah Cell dan minta dia untuk menggiling Steel Pieces.

English: Breaking the Curse (4)
Indonesian: Breaking the Curse (4)

English: Ahh so you need me to grind these Steel Pieces you say? Piece of cake, just give me a moment.
Indonesian: Ahh jadi maksudnya kamu membutuhkanku untuk menggiling Steel Pieces ini?? Gampang, beri aku waktu sebentar.

English: All finished! Here you go. The machinery in Darkon is the best in all of Madrigal! Tell your friends about our services!
