Indonesian: Selesai! Ini dia. Mesin di Darkon adalah yang terbaik di seluruh Madrigal! Beri tahu teman Anda tentang layanan kami!

English: Well hurry on now! You obviously have something important that you require the Steel Powder for!
Indonesian: Baiklah cepatlah pergi sekarang! Anda jelas memiliki sesuatu hal yang penting yang harus menggunakan Steel Powder

English: Well, that is a little ungrateful! And to think I did this all free of charge!
Indonesian: Bisa dibilang, itu sedikit tidak tahu berterima kasih! Mengingat bahwa saya melakukan ini semua secara gratis!

English: Aha! Now this is some finely ground Steel Powder!
Indonesian: Aha! Ini baru namanya Steel Powder yang digiling halus!

English: I must get back to work now! Hurry along!
Indonesian: Saya harus kembali bekerja sekarang! Cepatlah!

English: Bring the Steel Powder Cell has given you back to Reodos.
Indonesian: Bawa Steel Powder yang telah diberikan oleh Cell kepadamu ke Reodos.

English: The Flower that Time Forgot
Indonesian: The Flower that Time Forgot

English: I almost have all the ingredients! The piece de resistance is a mysterious ingredient known as the Time Lapse Flower.
Indonesian: Saya hampir memiliki semua bahan yang dibutuhkan! Piece de resistance adalah bahan misterius yang dikenal sebagai Time Lapse Flower.

English: Time Lapse Flowers can be found only around Mars Mine dungeon entrance. The entrance is located at the most Northern part of the Flaris continent.
Indonesian: Time Lapse Flowers hanya dapat ditemukan di sekitar pintu masuk penjara bawah tanah Mars Mine. Pintu masuknya terletak di bagian paling utara benua Flaris.

English: Awesome! No worries! You don't have to enter the dungeon per se. The flower should simply be near it!
Indonesian: Keren! Jangan khawatir! Anda tidak harus memasuki ruang bawah tanah itu sendiri. The flower itu seharusnya berada di dekatnya!

English: Haha, nice joke. You are quite the kidder you know that!
Indonesian: Haha, lelucon yang bagus. Kau cukup menghibur!

English: Finally! Finally! Finally! Please hand it over quickly so I can make the potion!
Indonesian: Akhirnya! Akhirnya! Akhirnya! Tolong serahkan dengan cepat sehingga saya bisa membuat ramuannya!

English: The Time Lapse Flower should be found near the entrance to Mars Mine. Please go collect it!
Indonesian: Time Lapse Flower seharusnya bisa ditemukan di dekat pintu masuk ke Mars Mine. Tolong kumpulkan!

English: Collect a Time Lapse Flower which only blooms near the entrance to Mars Mine.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Time Lapse Flower yang hanya tumbuh di dekat pintu masuk Mars Mine.

English: The Pendant of Reodos
Indonesian: The Pendant of Reodos

English: Ahh, so I guess I should express my gratitude to you! The potion will take a little time to mix so I guess I will hang out here a little longer.
Indonesian: Ahh, jadi kurasa aku harus mengungkapkan rasa terima kasihku padamu! Ramuan itu akan memakan waktu sedikit untuk dicampur jadi kurasa aku akan nongkrong di sini sedikit lebih lama.

English: While the potion mixes, here, take this. This is a pendant to symbolize my unwavering participation in whatever is to come. Please take it to Reonan and let him know we will meet soon enough!
Indonesian: Sementara ramuan bercampur, sini, ambil ini. Ini adalah liontin untuk melambangkan partisipasi saya yang tak tergoyahkan dalam situasi apa pun yang akan muncul. Tolong bawa ke Reonan dan beri tahu dia bahwa kita akan segera bertemu!

English: Good! Then go to Reonan. I will soon recover my original body and meet up with the rest of the original crew!
Indonesian: Bagus! Pergilah ke Reonan. Saya akan segera memulihkan tubuh asli saya dan bertemu dengan kru asli lainnya!

English: Err… well in that case you must have some more urgent matters to attend to? Please take the pendant to Reonan soon.
Indonesian: Err... dalam hal ini bukankah Anda memiliki beberapa hal yang lebih mendesak untuk diperhatikan? Tolong bawa liontin itu ke Reonan segera.

English: There you are! Unfortunately, I'm glad to see you but unable to talk at the moment. Take this time to reach level 60 then return to me.
Indonesian: Akhinya kamu datang juga! Sayangnya, saya senang melihat Anda tetapi tidak dapat ngobrol untuk saat ini. Luangkan waktu ini untuk mencapai level 60 lalu kembali kepada saya.

English: Hurry quickly back to Reonan with the pendant!
Indonesian: Cepat kembali ke Reonan dengan liontin itu!

English: Deliver the pendant from Reodos to Reonan.
Indonesian: Kirimkan liontin dari Reodos ke Reonan.

English: Returning Home in Glory
Indonesian: Returning Home in Glory

English: Oh, Reonan said to return to Flarine after you had completed your duties here. Do not fret about us any longer. Go see Reonan!
Indonesian: Oh, Reonan berkata untuk kembali ke Flarine setelah kamu menyelesaikan tugasmu di sini. Jangan khawatir tentang kita lagi. Pergi temui Reonan!

English: Thank you for your efforts in Saint City. Your name will be forever praised here. Now, hurry on your way!
Indonesian: Terima kasih atas upaya Anda di Saint City. Namamu akan selamanya dipuji di sini. Sekarang, cepatlah pergi untuk perjalananmu!

English: Eh? You don't want to go back? Then, plese feel free to join the illustrious ranks of our tourist industry!
Indonesian: Eh? Anda tidak ingin kembali? Kemudian, jangan ragu untuk bergabung dengan jajaran industri pariwisata kita yang termasyhur!

English: I heard of your remarkable activities at Saint City from the Mayor! I have another mission for you... but it's too early right now. Reach level 40, then I will give you the next mission.
Indonesian: Saya mendengar tentang aktivitas luar biasa Anda di Saint City dari Walikota! Saya punya misi lain untuk Anda ... tapi ini terlalu dini sekarang. Raihlah level 40, maka saya akan memberi Anda misi berikutnya.

English: Reonan is waiting for you in Flaris.
Indonesian: Reonan sedang menunggumu di Flaris.

English: Go to Reonan after reaching level 40.
Indonesian: Pergi ke Reonan setelah mencapai level 40.

English: Chapter 4 Turbulent World
Indonesian: Chapter 4 Turbulent World

English: In a way this is good for them. The citizens of Darken needed to become more self-efficient. I know they will be fine without me. There is another issue that has come up.
Indonesian: Di satu sisi ini baik untuk mereka. Warga Darken perlu menjadi lebih mandiri. Saya tahu mereka akan baik-baik saja tanpa saya. Namun ada masalah lain yang muncul.

English: When we finished the war, aside from my sister's ring, I also threw my pendant somewhere in Darkon 3. I was so convinced I would never need it again…
Indonesian: Ketika kami menyelesaikan perang, selain cincin saudara perempuan saya, saya juga melemparkan pendant saya ke suatu tempat di Darkon 3. Saya sangat yakin saya tidak akan pernah membutuhkannya lagi ...

English: Could you please find it for me? I know it is asking much of you. It is important that I regain possession of it though and present it to Reonan.
Indonesian: Bisakah Anda menemukannya untuk saya? Saya tahu bahwa saya meminta banyak dari Anda. Namun sangatlah penting bagi saya untuk mendapatkan kembali kepemilikannya dan menyerahkannya kepada Reonan.

English: Thank you. I feel that if anything, a Nautrepy has the pendant. They tend to seek out shiny objects. Please locate them in the Eastern forests of Darkon 3. Please retrieve it.
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Saya merasa, seorang Nautrepy memiliki pendant itu. Mereka cenderung mencari benda-benda mengkilap. Silakan temukan mereka di Eastern forests di Darkon 3. Tolong ambil kembali.

English: It is imperative that you retrieve this pendant and get it to Reonan!
Indonesian: Sangat penting bagi Anda untuk mengambil pendant ini dan membawanya ke Reonan!

English: Oh you found it! Thank you so much!
Indonesian: Oh, Anda menemukannya! Terima kasih banyak!

English: A Nautrepy must have taken the pendant. Please go and check the Eastern forests of Darkon 3!
Indonesian: Seorang Nautrepy pasti telah mengambil liontin itu. Pergi dan periksa Eastern forests di Darkon 3!

English: Recover the Hero's Pendant from Nautrepy and return it to Elaine.
Indonesian: Ambil Hero's Pendant dari Nautrepy dan kembalikan ke Elaine.

English: Zoro's Pendant
Indonesian: Zoro's Pendant

English: Please take this pendant to Reonan. This will serve as a symbol of my unyielding devotion to our cause…
Indonesian: Silakan bawa pendant ini ke Reonan. Ini akan berfungsi sebagai simbol pengabdian saya yang pantang menyerah untuk tujuan kita ...

English: Oh! You have yet to collect Zoro's pendant! Go and retrieve it from him as well! Once you have done this, please take them both to Reonan.
Indonesian: Oh! Kamu belum mengumpulkan Zoro's pendant! Pergi dan ambil darinya juga! Setelah kamu melakukan ini, bawa keduanya ke Reonan.

English: Zoro is waiting! Please go and gather his pendant as well. I'm sure once you show him mine, he will gladly hand it over.
Indonesian: Zoro sedang menunggu! Silakan pergi dan kumpulkan pendant nya juga. Saya yakin begitu Anda menunjukkan milik saya kepadanya, dia akan dengan senang hati menyerahkannya.

English: Please, we must get the pendants to Reonan to let him know we are ready to fight side by side!
Indonesian: Tolong, kita harus membawa pendant itu ke Reonan untuk memberi tahu dia bahwa kita siap bertarung berdampingan!

English: Oh Oh! That is Elaine's pendant! So I see you were able to get him to reconsider?
Indonesian: Oh Oh! Itu adalah Elaine's pendant! Jadi kamu benar-benar bisa membuatnya untuk mempertimbangkan kembali??

English: Hurry! I'm sure Zoro is waiting!
Indonesian: Cepat! Aku yakin Zoro sedang menunggu!

English: Retrieve Zoro's Pendant.
Indonesian: Ambil Zoro's Pendant.

English: United We Stand
Indonesian: United We Stand

English: Hah! I never thought Elaine would change his mind so easily. This pendant here, well, it definitely shows that he means business!
Indonesian: Hah! Saya tidak pernah berpikir Elaine akan berubah pikiran dengan mudah. Pendant ini di sini, yah, itu pasti menunjukkan bahwa dia bersungguh-sungguh!

English: I'm glad to see that the old Elaine has returned! Here, take my pendant as well! Now take them to Reonan and let him know we are ready to stand united!
Indonesian: Saya senang melihat Elaine tua telah kembali! Nih, ambil pendant ku juga! Sekarang bawa mereka ke Reonan dan beri tahu dia bahwa kita siap untuk bersatu!

English: Head back to Reonan with the pendants!
Indonesian: Kembali ke Reonan dengan the pendants!

English: Well, whatever you wish, but I don't think we have much time to mess around!
Indonesian: Yah, apa pun yang Anda inginkan, tetapi saya rasa kita tidak punya banyak waktu untuk bermain-main!

English: Oh! I see you have returned! You come bearing good news I hope?
Indonesian: Oh! Kamu telah kembali! Aku harap kamu datang membawa kabar baik??

English: You have both of the pendants, now go see Reonan!
Indonesian: Anda memiliki kedua pendants itu, sekarang pergi temui Reonan!

English: Take Elaine and Zoro's Pendants to Reonan
Indonesian: Bawa Elaine dan Zoro's Pendants ke Reonan

English: Gathering of Heroes
Indonesian: Gathering of Heroes

English: Two more pendants!? Ah Elaine and Zoro. It's been awhile… Thought I might never see them again… Knowing they stand by my side, I feel a renewed sense of determination!
Indonesian: Dua pendants lagi!? Ah Elaine dan Zoro. Sudah lama ... Kupikir aku mungkin tidak akan pernah melihat mereka lagi ... Mengetahui mereka berdiri di sisi saya, saya merasakan suatu tekad yang diperbarui!

English: Now 6 heroes are gathered! I, Handel, Hael, Reodos, Zoro, Elaine are gathered. We just need to find the last 2! Before this, I feel it is time for you to hone in on your own skills!
Indonesian: Sekarang 6 pahlawan telah berkumpul! Aku, Handel, Hael, Reodos, Zoro, Elaine berkumpul. Kita hanya perlu menemukan 2 yang terakhir! Sebelum ini, saya merasa sudah waktunya bagi Anda untuk mengasah keterampilan Anda sendiri!

English: We will need the assistance of warriors like yourself! But, you still have plenty of room to grow! Are you ready to further ascend your path to glory?
Indonesian: Kami akan membutuhkan bantuan prajurit seperti Anda! Tapi, Anda masih memiliki banyak ruang untuk tumbuh! Apakah Anda siap untuk mendaki jalan Anda lebih jauh menuju kemenangan?

English: Please train to level 70, then talk with Reodos!
Indonesian: Silahkan berlatih ke level 70, lalu bicaralah dengan Reodos!

English: Real champions are born by pushing one's own skill to the limit. I know you have it in you to overcome the odds…
Indonesian: Juara sejati lahir dengan memaksimalkan keterampilannya hingga batas maksimalnya. Saya tahu Anda memilikinya di dalam diri Anda untuk mengatasi keanehan ini...

English: Oh! Impressive! You have grown quite a bit stronger since we last met!
Indonesian: Oh! Mengesankan! Kamu telah tumbuh lebih kuat sejak terakhir kali kita bertemu!

English: After reaching level 70, talk with Reodos
Indonesian: Setelah mencapai level 70, bicaralah dengan Reodos

English: Reach level 70, then meet with Reodos.
Indonesian: Mencapai level 70, lalu bertemu dengan Reodos.

English: Hungry Hungry Dwarpets
Indonesian: Hungry Hungry Dwarpets

English: Oh! Haha, why I haven't changed yet you ask? I'm not entirely sure. I feel that the curse should have let up by now…
Indonesian: Oh! Haha, kenapa aku belum berubah kamu bilang? Saya tidak sepenuhnya yakin. Saya merasa bahwa kutukan itu seharusnya sudah menyerah sekarang ...

English: I do know someone who may be of assistance. His name is Rankashu, a descendent of Shamanistic Dwarpets who have lived in Darkon longer than man.
Indonesian: Saya mengenal seseorang yang mungkin bisa membantu. Namanya Rankashu, keturunan Shamanistic Dwarpets yang telah tinggal di Darkon lebih lama dari manusia.

English: He might have some useful information pertaining to this curse and what else I need to do! Will you seek him out for me?
Indonesian: Dia mungkin memiliki beberapa informasi berguna yang berkaitan dengan kutukan ini dan hal lainnya yang perlu aku lakukan! Maukah kamu mencarinya untukku??

English: OH! OH! Thank you! I know that Rankashu can't resist Syliaca Fillet and Greemong Jelly. I'm sure if you brought some of these, he'd spill whatever information you wanted!
Indonesian: OH! OH! Terima kasih! Saya tahu bahwa Rankashu tidak dapat menahan Syliaca Fillet dan Greemong Jelly. Saya yakin jika Anda membawa beberapa di antaranya, dia akan memberikan informasi apa pun yang Anda inginkan!

English: Hmph! Well, you could be missing out on a chance to not only help me, but possibly learn of the location of the other 2 heroes as well!
Indonesian: Hmph! Anda bisa kehilangan kesempatan tidak hanya untuk membantu saya, tetapi mungkin juga untuk mengetahui lokasi 2 pahlawan lainnya!

English: Well helloooo there! *sniffs* Is that Syliaca fillets and Greemong Jelly I smell? Oh! Well, of course there WOULD be a request first. Free food, HAH!
Indonesian: Helloooo kau yang disana! *mengendus* Apakah itu fillet Syliaca dan Greemong Jelly?? Oh! Tentu saja AKAN ada permintaan terlebih dahulu. Makanan gratis, HAH!

English: Have you gathered the Syliaca fish and Greemong Jelly? You can find them by killing both Syliaca fish and Greemongs
Indonesian: Sudahkah Anda mengumpulkan ikan Syliaca dan Greemong Jelly? Anda dapat menemukannya dengan membunuh ikan Syliaca dan Greemongs

English: Collect 5 Syliaca Fillet and 5 Greemong Jelly, then bring them to Rankashu in the Western region of Darkon 1.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 5 Syliaca Fillet dan 5 Greemong Jelly, lalu bawa mereka ke Rankashu di wilayah Barat Darkon 1.

English: Catalyst to the Curse
Indonesian: Catalyst to the Curse

English: Ahh so the curse was not released yet? The curse WAS in his body a long time… We need a powerful catalyst to speed up the process. 10 Boo Petals should do the trick!
Indonesian: Ahh jadi kutukan itu belum dilepaskan?? Kutukan itu ada di tubuhnya sejak lama ... Kita membutuhkan katalis yang kuat untuk mempercepat prosesnya. 10 Boo Petals sepertinya bisa digunakan sebagai katalis!

English: Another question? 8 Heroes huh? Well, I did see a strange looking woman enter this dungeon alone several days ago. Not sure if that will help or not!
Indonesian: Pertanyaan lain?? 8 Pahlawan ya?? Yah, aku memang melihat seorang wanita yang tampak aneh memasuki penjara bawah tanah ini sendirian beberapa hari yang lalu. Tidak yakin apakah itu akan membantu atau tidak!

English: Anyway! I told you what you need to know. Will you go get the petals now and let me eat in peace?
Indonesian: Ngomong-ngomong! Aku sudah bilang apa yang perlu kamu ketahui. Maukah kamu pergi mengambil kelopaknya sekarang dan membiarkanku makan dengan tenang??

English: Yes Yes, acquire 10 Boo Petals from the Boos in the forests of Darkon 3. This should take care of your problem!
Indonesian: Ya Ya, dapatkan 10 Boo Petals dari Boo di hutan Darkon 3. Ini seharusnya bisa mengatasi masalah Anda!

English: Ahh! Can't you see I'm trying to eat. Please don't disturb me right now!!
Indonesian: Ahh! Tidak bisakah kamu melihat aku mencoba makan. Tolong jangan ganggu saya sekarang!!

English: Aha! I knew Rankashu would spill the information for an easy meal. So these leaves will speed up the process you say?
Indonesian: Aha! Saya tahu Rankashu akan memberikan informasi untuk makanan yang dia dapat. Jadi menurutmu daun-daun ini akan mempercepat prosesnya?

English: I am eating now. I said 10 Boo Petals!
Indonesian: Saya makan sekarang. Saya bilang 10 Boo Petals!

English: Collect 10 Boo Petal, then bring them to Reodos
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Boo Petal, lalu bawa ke Reodos

English: Carrierbomb Commotion
Indonesian: Carrierbomb Commotion

English: Well, here's to hoping! Hmm, Rankashu mentioned something about a strange woman. I wonder who it could be...
Indonesian: Inilah harapannya! Hmm, Rankashu menyebutkan sesuatu tentang wanita aneh. Saya ingin tahu siapa itu...

English: I'm trying to think who this strange woman could be!! In the meantime could you please go kill some Carrierbombs and then return to Rankashu!! I need more time to think!
Indonesian: Saya mencoba menebak siapa wanita aneh ini!! Sementara itu bisakah Anda membunuh beberapa Carrierbombs dan kemudian kembali ke Rankashu!! Saya perlu lebih banyak waktu untuk berpikir!

English: Thank you thank you thank you!! Go kill 20 Small Carrierbombs & 15 Carrierbombs then return to Rankashu!
Indonesian: Terima kasih terima kasih terima kasih!! Bunuh 20 Small Carrierbombs &15 Carrierbombs lalu kembali ke Rankashu!

English: Oh how am I ever supposed to concentrate with these stupid Carrierbombs making a racket!!!
Indonesian: Oh bagaimana saya bisa berkonsentrasi dengan Carrierbombs bodoh ini membuat raket!!!

English: Eh? You're here again? Do you want to know about the woman?
Indonesian: Eh? Anda di sini lagi? Apakah Anda ingin tahu tentang wanita itu?

English: Not yet? Kill the Carrierbombs quickly and go to Rankashu!
Indonesian: Belum selesai juga? Bunuh Carrierbombs dengan cepat dan pergi ke Rankashu!

English: Kill 20 Small Carrierbombs & 15 Carrierbombs and return to Rankashu.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Small Carrierbombs &15 Carrierbombs dan kembali ke Rankashu.

English: The Dungeon Code
Indonesian: The Dungeon Code

English: Well fine fine! Guess I did finish eating now. Anyway! I saw this particular woman entering the Dekane Dungeon by herself. By the look of her outfit, she may have been a Psykeeper or something.
Indonesian: Baiklah baiklah! Kurasa aku sudah selesai makan sekarang. Ngomong-ngomong! Saya melihat wanita ini memasuki Dekane Dungeon sendirian. Dari tampilan pakaiannya, dia mungkin seorang Psykeeper atau semacamnya.

English: Oh! You want to go in after her? Unfortunately, you can't just enter like that. You have to know how exactly!
Indonesian: Oh! Anda ingin mengejarnya? Sayangnya, Anda tidak bisa begitu saja masuk seperti itu. Lebih tepatnya Anda harus tahu bagaimana caranya!

English: If you want to learn how to enter the dungeon, you will need the key code from Cell back at the Erons Factory. He will tell you how to do it!
Indonesian: Jika Anda ingin mempelajari cara memasuki ruang bawah tanah, Anda memerlukan kode kunci dari Cell di Erons Factory. Dia akan memberi tahu Anda bagaimana melakukannya!

English: Cell is at the Erons Factory, go ask him how to enter the dungeon.
Indonesian: Cell ada di Erons Factory, tanyakan padanya bagaimana cara memasuki ruang bawah tanah.

English: Well, there is no other way to get in! Don't look at me! It's not like I know anything!
Indonesian: Tidak ada cara lain untuk masuk! Jangan lihat aku! Aku benar-benar tidak tahu apa-apa!

English: Ah… I remember you from before... Why do you come to see me? Dekanes dungeon? Why would you want to enter that cursed mine?
Indonesian: Ah... Aku ingat kamu dari pertemuan sebelumnya ... Mengapa kamu datang menemuiku? Penjara bawah tanah Dekanes? Mengapa kamu ingin memasuki tambang terkutuk itu??

English: Did you meet Cell at Erons Factory?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda bertemu Cell di Erons Factory?

English: Go to Cell
Indonesian: Pergi ke Cell

English: Onward Brave Fool!
Indonesian: Onward Brave Fool!

English: Ahh I see Cell has given you the code to enter the dungeon!
Indonesian: Ahh jadi Cell telah memberi Anda kode untuk memasuki ruang bawah tanah!

English: Just to be warned, the monsters in the dungeon are quite terrifying! If you feel you aren't prepared for the quest, please go train some more!
Indonesian: Hanya memperingatkan, monster di ruang bawah tanah cukup menakutkan! Jika Anda merasa tidak siap untuk quest, silakan berlatih lagi!

English: Are you going to enter then and look for that woman?
Indonesian: Apakah Anda akan masuk dan mencari wanita itu?

English: Well, you are the bravest fool I've ever met. Let's hope this woman is worth all the effort! Hah!
Indonesian: Anda adalah orang bodoh paling berani yang pernah saya temui. Mari kita berharap wanita ini sepadan dengan semua usaha yang telah kita lakukan! Hah!

English: Changed your mind? Well if you aren't busy, maybe you could go bring me some more Greemong Jelly and Syliaca Fillets! I kid I kid! Haha!
Indonesian: Berubah pikiran? Jika Anda tidak sibuk, mungkin Anda bisa membawakan saya beberapa Greemong Jelly dan Syliaca Fillets lagi! Saya suka saya suka! Haha!

English: Woah! Surprised me! Shouldn't sneak up on a lady like that! Hehe.
Indonesian: Woah! Kau mengejutkanku! Kau tak seharusnya tidak menyelinap seperti itu pada seorang wanita! Hehe.

English: Well, are you going to head into the mine or are you reconsidering already?
Indonesian: Apakah kamu akan menuju ke tambang atau apakah kamu sudah mempertimbangkan kembali??

English: Enter the Dekane Dungeon and search for the Mysterious Woman.
Indonesian: Masuk ke Dekane Dungeon dan cari Mysterious Woman.

English: The Alluring Enchantress
Indonesian: The Alluring Enchantress

English: Ah! So you braved all the perils of the dungeon just to meet me eh? Oh my name? Well, I don't just give that out to anyone! Hehe.
Indonesian: Ah! Jadi kamu berani menghadapi semua bahaya penjara bawah tanah hanya untuk bertemu denganku ya? Oh namaku? Yah, saya tidak semudah itu memberitahu kepada siapa pun! Hehe.

English: Before I bestow upon you the most graceful name ever, you have to show me you are worthy to receive it! How? Oh its quite simple! Hehe. Just kill 20 Keakoon Guards!
Indonesian: Sebelum saya menganugerahkan Anda nama paling anggun yang pernah ada, Anda harus menunjukkan kepada saya bahwa Anda layak untuk menerimanya! Bagaimana? Oh itu cukup sederhana! Hehe. Bunuh saja 20 Keakoon Guards!

English: There should be more than enough Keakoon Guards in this very dungeon. Just kill 20 of them and you will have the privilege of knowing my name!
Indonesian: Seharusnya ada lebih dari cukup Keakoon Guards di penjara bawah tanah ini. Bunuh saja 20 dari mereka dan Anda akan memiliki hak istimewa untuk mengetahui nama saya!

English: Oh well, I guess that is your loss then. Hehe.
Indonesian: Oh yah, kurasa itu adalah kerugianmu kalau begitu. Hehe.

English: Wow, that was quick! Apparently someone really wants to know my name? Hehe.
Indonesian: Wow, cepat sekali! Rupanya seseorang benar-benar ingin tahu nama saya? Hehe.

English: Well, you could stand there and stare at me all day, but that won't kill those Keakoon Guards any faster now will it? Hehe.
Indonesian: Yah, kamu bisa berdiri di sana dan menatapku sepanjang hari, tapi itu tidak akan membunuh Keakoon Guards itu lebih cepat kan? Hehe.

English: Kill 20 Keakoon Guards.
Indonesian: Bunuh 20 Keakoon Guards.

English: Ainher's Request
Indonesian: Ainher's Request

English: The name is Ainher. Yes, try not to let the pure beauty of it make you go completely deaf. I'm sure you didn't just come all this way to learn my name though, so what DID you come here for?
Indonesian: Namaku Ainher. Ya, cobalah untuk tidak membiarkan keindahan murni itu membuat kamu benar-benar tuli. Aku yakin kamu tidak hanya datang jauh-jauh untuk mempelajari namaku, jadi untuk apa datang ke sini??

English: Hehe, how did you know about the original 8 heroes? Ah it's ok, I've had creepier stalkers! I am the reincarnation of the original Psykeeper Hero Offerep…
Indonesian: Hehe, bagaimana kamu tahu tentang 8 hero aslinya?? Ah tidak apa-apa, aku punya penguntit yang lebih menyeramkan! Aku adalah reinkarnasi dari Psykeeper Hero Offerep yang asli ...

English: I see. So Reonan looks to reunite the original heroes. If t his is the case, then something important must be going on! Unfortunately, I am rather tied down at the moment with research…
Indonesian: Saya mengerti. Jadi Reonan mencari untuk menyatukan kembali pahlawan aslinya. Jika dia masalahnya, maka sesuatu yang penting pasti sedang terjadi! Sayangnya, saya agak terikat saat ini dengan penelitian...

English: I guess if you maybe helped me to finish my research I would consider joining up. If you want to be of assistance to me, then please go talk to Drico and collect the Agony Ore.
Indonesian: Saya rasa jika Anda membantu saya menyelesaikan penelitian saya, maka saya akan mempertimbangkan untuk bergabung. Jika Anda ingin membantu saya, silakan bicara dengan Drico dan kumpulkan Agony Ore.

English: Agony Ore is quite rare, so I'm sure Drico won't be willing to hand it over right away… But, I guess that is now your problem! Hehe.
Indonesian: Agony Ore cukup langka, jadi saya yakin Drico tidak akan mau segera menyerahkannya... Tapi, kurasa itu sekarang masalahmu! Hehe.

English: Change your mind so quickly I see? Guess you weren't in that much of a hurry to get my help then! Hehe.
Indonesian: Berubah pikiran begitu cepat ya sepertinya? Nampaknya Anda tidak terburu-buru untuk mendapatkan bantuan saya saat itu! Hehe.

English: *Sniff* *Snort* Drico smell a stranger here? What stranger want? *sniff*
Indonesian: *Endus* *Mendengus* Drico mencium bau orang asing di sini? Apa yang orang asing inginkan??? *mengendus*

English: Hurry along now! Go find Drico and retrieve the Agony Ore!
Indonesian: Cepatlah sekarang! Cari Drico dan ambil Agony Ore!

English: Find Drico in Dekanes dungeon.
Indonesian: Temui Drico di Dekanes dungeon.

English: Sweet Medication
Indonesian: Sweet Medication

English: Agony Ore? Khahahahaha! You say want Agony Ore? *snort* *sniff* Agony Ore very rare! I no trade!
Indonesian: Agony Ore??? Khahahahaha! Kamu bilang ingin Agony Ore??? *mendengus* *mengendus* Agony Ore sangatlah langka! Aku tidak berdagang!

English: *sniff*. Hmm...Maybe I change mind If do something for Drico! Tribe need sap of Roach Queen for medicine! *snort* You can collect for Drico?
Indonesian: *mengendus*. Hmm.. Mungkin aku berubah pikiran jika melakukan sesuatu untuk Drico! Tribe membutuhkan getah Roach Queen untuk pengobatan! *mendengus* kamu dapat mengumpulkan untuk Drico??

English: Collect sap from Pink Roach Queen and Blue Roach Queen, then bring to Drico.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan getah dari Pink Roach Queen dan Blue Roach Queen, lalu bawa ke Drico.

English: You reject such a good chance now? *Sniff* *Sniff*. As you wish~
Indonesian: Anda menolak kesempatan yang begitu bagus sekarang? *Mengendus* *Mengendus*. Terserah kau saja~

English: *sniff* *sniff* Drico smell sweet sap!
Indonesian: *endus* *endus* Drico mencium bau getah manis!

English: Collect Pink Roach Queen Sap and Blue Roach Queen Sap! Sniff!
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Pink Roach Queen Sap dan Blue Roach Queen Sap! Endus!

English: Pink and Blue Roach Queen deep in dungeon. Please go gather their sap!
Indonesian: Pink dan Blue Roach Queen berada jauh di dalam dungeon. Silakan kumpulkan getahnya!

English: Collective Bargaining
Indonesian: Collective Bargaining

English: Give Drico Sap! Then Drico hand Ore to stranger! *snort*
Indonesian: Berikan Drico Sap! Maka Drico akan menyerahkan Ore kepada orang asing! *mendengus*

English: Here take ore!
Indonesian: Ambilah ore ini!

English: You no want take now? *sniff* Drico need sap please!
Indonesian: Kamu tidak ingin mengambilnya sekarang??? *sniff* Drico butuh getah!

English: hehe, impressive! I knew you would find a way to obtain the ore!
Indonesian: hehe, mengesankan! Saya tahu Anda akan menemukan cara untuk mendapatkan ore itu!

English: Go take ore. Drico is busy now!
Indonesian: Pergi ambil ore. Drico sedang sibuk sekarang!

English: Take the Agony Ore to Ainher.
Indonesian: Bawa Agony Ore ke Ainher.

English: Psykeeper Hero's Pendant
Indonesian: Psykeeper Hero's Pendant

English: Just give me the ore and you have my word that I will reunite with Reonan and the rest of the gang. First I need a little time to examine the ore.
Indonesian: Beri aku ore nya dan kamu bisa pegang janjiku bahwa aku akan bersatu kembali dengan Reonan dan anggota geng lainnya. Pertama saya perlu sedikit waktu untuk memeriksa ore.

English: I can't leave this very moment, but here, take my pendant to Reonan. It will seal the deal! I will meet up with you again soon enough! Hehe.
Indonesian: Saya tidak bisa meninggalkan momen ini, tetapi ambil ini, bawa pendant saya ke Reonan. Ini akan menyegel kesepakatan! Aku akan segera bertemu denganmu lagi! Hehe.

English: Please tell Reonan I am busy with important research but will come directly to him afterwards!
Indonesian: Tolong beri tahu Reonan bahwa saya sibuk dengan penelitian penting tetapi akan datang langsung kepadanya setelah itu!

English: Eh? You don't want to leave here because of my radiant beauty? Guess I don't blame you!
Indonesian: Eh? Anda tidak ingin pergi dari sini karena kecantikan saya yang bercahaya? Kurasa aku tidak akan menyalahkanmu!

English: You're back! How is Ainher doing? What? This is another of the pendants!
Indonesian: Kamu kembali! Bagaimana kabar Ainher? Apa?? Ini adalah pendants lainnya!

English: Well what are you waiting for! Take the pendant to Reonan!
Indonesian: Nah tunggu apalagi! Bawa pendant itu ke Reonan!

English: Give Ainher's Pendant to Reonan.
Indonesian: Berikan Ainher's Pendant kepada Reonan

English: The Last Hero
Indonesian: The Last Hero

English: You know? You've grown a lot during the course of this all. We've almost reached the end of the initial phase though! We just need to find the last hero!
Indonesian: Kau tahu? Kau telah tumbuh banyak setelah ini semua. Kami hampir mencapai akhir dari fase awal! Kita hanya perlu menemukan pahlawan terakhir!

English: Shade's power grows progressively stronger… I can feel it…. We must hurry and find the last hero as soon as possible.
Indonesian: Kekuatan Shade tumbuh semakin kuat ... Aku bisa merasakannya .... Kita harus bergegas dan menemukan pahlawan terakhir sesegera mungkin.

English: I believe Achaben has more details on where we might find the last hero. Please go to him right away!
Indonesian: Saya yakin Achaben memiliki detail lebih lanjut tentang di mana kita mungkin menemukan pahlawan terakhir. Pergilah kepadanya segera!

English: You can hear more details on where to find the last hero from Achaben! Please go and speak with him!
Indonesian: Anda dapat mendengar detail lebih lanjut tentang di mana menemukan pahlawan terakhir dari Achaben! Silahkan pergi dan berbicara dengannya!

English: You cannot give up yet after everything we've worked for!
Indonesian: Anda tidak boleh menyerah dulu setelah semua yang telah kita lakukan!

English: Yes~ Oh! You're here again, my lord.
Indonesian: Iya~ Oh! Anda di sini lagi, Tuanku.

English: Why haven't you left yet? Achaben is running the general store of Darken. Please go meet with him!
Indonesian: Mengapa Anda belum pergi? Achaben menjalankan general store di Darken. Silahkan bertemu dengannya!

English: Return to Darken and meet with Achaben.
Indonesian: Kembali ke Darken dan bertemu dengan Achaben.

English: The High Magician, Laola
Indonesian: The High Magician, Laola

English: I've heard you are still in search of the legendary heroes, no? I've heard of a powerful warrior undergoing extensive training in Darkon 3. This might be one of the warriors for which you are searching.
Indonesian: Saya pernah mendengar Anda masih mencari pahlawan legendaris, bukan? Saya pernah mendengar tentang seorang pejuang yang kuat menjalani pelatihan ekstensif di Darkon 3. Ini mungkin salah satu pejuang yang Anda cari.

English: I was informed of this warrior by my friend Laola, who works in Darkon 3. Please go meet with her for further details!
Indonesian: Saya diberitahu tentang prajurit ini oleh teman saya Laola, yang bekerja di Darkon 3. Silakan temui dia untuk detail lebih lanjut!

English: Laola should be at her house in the forests of Darkon 3, where she works as a gardener. Just be aware, the area is overrun with many monsters!
Indonesian: Laola seharusnya berada di rumahnya di hutan Darkon 3, tempat dia bekerja sebagai tukang kebun. Perlu diketahui, area ini dibanjiri dengan banyak monster!

English: Too bad! Well if you are free, wanna help me complete some more deliveries?
Indonesian: Sayang sekali! Jika kamu ada waktu luang, apakah ingin membantuku menyelesaikan beberapa pengiriman lagi???

English: Hey now! Who are you? Why are you coming to my flower garden without any permission?
Indonesian: Hei! Siapa kamu?? Mengapa datang ke taman bungaku tanpa izin??

English: Laola will be in Darkon 3. Please go find her!
Indonesian: Laola akan berada di Darkon 3. Silakan cari dia!

English: Go to Darkon 3 to find Laola
Indonesian: Pergi ke Darkon 3 untuk menemukan Laola

English: The Perils of Gardening
Indonesian: The Perils of Gardening

English: Ohh! Achaben sent you! Sorry for the less than friendly greeting! I heard you are looking for the warrior about whom I spoke of to Achaben?
Indonesian: oh! Achaben mengirimmu! Maaf untuk sapaan yang kurang ramah! Saya mendengar Anda mencari prajurit tentang siapa yang saya bicarakan dengan Achaben?

English: I have briefly seen her before, but I’m not entirely sure of her exact whereabouts. I do have a friend who claims to have seen this warrior recently…
Indonesian: Saya telah melihatnya sebentar sebelumnya, tetapi saya tidak sepenuhnya yakin dengan keberadaannya yang tepat. Saya punya teman yang mengaku telah melihat prajurit ini baru-baru ini ...

English: I will introduce you to them, but first I need a little help! I do extensive gardening here in Darkon 3 but the Watangka tribes have been making my work difficult. Could you please eliminate some of them?
Indonesian: Aku akan memperkenalkanmu kepada mereka, tetapi pertama-tama aku butuh sedikit bantuan! Aku melakukan berkebun ekstensif di sini di Darkon 3 tetapi suku Watangka telah membuat pekerjaan saya sulit. Bisakah kamu menghilangkan beberapa di antaranya??

English: Please hunt 20 Small Watangkas & 15 Watangkas and return to me. It is terribly difficult to garden in these conditions!
Indonesian: Silakan berburu 20 Small Watangkas & 15 Watangkas dan kembali kepada saya. Sangat sulit untuk berkebun dalam kondisi ini!

English: Please help eliminate the Watangka! It's hard enough to make a living already without them around!
Indonesian: Tolong bantu hilangkan Watangka! Cukup sulit untuk mencari nafkah tanpa mereka di sekitar!

English: Thank you so much!! Now I can work to get my next export of flowers out!
Indonesian: Terima kasih banyak!! Sekarang saya dapat bekerja untuk mengeluarkan ekspor bunga saya berikutnya!

English: Please go and defeat the Watangka before they destroy any more of my flowers!
Indonesian: Silakan pergi dan kalahkan Watangka sebelum mereka menghancurkan bunga saya lagi!

English: Hunt 20 Small Watangkas & 15 Watangkas and return to Laola.
Indonesian: Berburu 20 Small Watangkas & 15 Watangkas dan kembali ke Laola.

English: The Nomadic Chef
Indonesian: The Nomadic Chef

English: I've heard that the warrior in question is supposedly a powerful Billposter…
Indonesian: Saya pernah mendengar bahwa prajurit yang dimaksud seharusnya adalah Billposter yang kuat ...

English: If you are looking for further information on them then please go to my friend Jinitte. He has traveled the continent of Darkon extensively and knows much of its happenings.
Indonesian: Jika Anda mencari informasi lebih lanjut tentang mereka maka silakan pergi ke teman saya Jinitte. Dia telah melakukan perjalanan ke benua Darkon secara ekstensif dan mengetahui banyak kejadiannya.

English: Jinitte might just know where this hero is hiding out.
Indonesian: Jinitte mungkin hanya tahu di mana pahlawan ini bersembunyi.

English: Rather hang around and help me garden? Haha I'm joking! I know you probably have much more important work to attend to!
Indonesian: Alih-alih berkeliaran dan membantu saya berkebun? Haha aku bercanda! Saya tahu Anda mungkin memiliki pekerjaan yang jauh lebih penting untuk diperhatikan

English: Greetings Sir! You lookin to try my world famous cuisine!
Indonesian: Salam Pak! Anda melihat untuk mencoba masakan terkenal dunia saya!

English: Jinitte is a famous world travelling cook. He is currently selling food at the Nomads village.
Indonesian: Jinitte adalah juru masak perjalanan dunia yang terkenal. Dia saat ini menjual makanan di desa Nomads.

English: Go find Jinitte at Nomads village in Central Darkon 3
Indonesian: Cari Jinitte di desa Nomads di Central Darkon 3

English: Roots of Flavor
Indonesian: Roots of Flavor

English: Ah~! You're the one lookin for that hero! Figured you were here to try some of my world famous cuisine!
Indonesian: Ah~! Andalah yang mencari pahlawan itu! Anda pikir Anda ada di sini untuk mencoba beberapa masakan saya yang terkenal di dunia!

English: Haven't heard of me!? Well you my friend, must have been living under a pretty big rock for some time.
Indonesian: Belum pernah mendengar tentang saya!? Nah, temanku, pasti sudah hidup di bawah batu yang cukup besar selama beberapa waktu.

English: Maybe while you adjust to the light, you could do me a little favor? Afterwards I promise to tell you where to find that hero you are looking for!
Indonesian: Mungkin saat Anda menyesuaikan diri dengan cahaya, Anda bisa membantu saya sedikit? Setelah itu saya berjanji untuk memberi tahu Anda di mana menemukan pahlawan yang Anda cari!

English: Thanks!! Well, I'm working on my latest masterpiece dish, but first I need 10 Anti Roots. Please go obtain some from Antiquery!
Indonesian: Terima kasih!! Yah, saya sedang mengerjakan hidangan mahakarya terbaru saya, tetapi pertama-tama saya membutuhkan 10 Anti Roots. Silakan dapatkan beberapa dari Antiquery!

English: Ahh nevermind then! Figured you might do me this one favor!
Indonesian: Ahh lupakan! Pikir Anda mungkin membantu saya yang satu ini!

English: Oh!! I was waiting for you. You came back earlier than I expected.
Indonesian: Oh!! Aku sedang menunggumu. Anda kembali lebih awal dari yang saya harapkan.

English: Please hunt Antiquery and bring me 10 Anti Roots.
Indonesian: Tolong berburu Antiquery dan bawakan aku 10 Anti Roots.

English: Hunt Antiquery and get 10 Anti Roots.
Indonesian: Berburu Antiquery dan dapatkan 10 Anti Roots.

English: Solace in the Mountains
Indonesian: Solace in the Mountains

English: The warrior you are looking for is currently training up at the Stone Mountain. I believe her to be the original hero Billposter.
Indonesian: Prajurit yang Anda cari saat ini sedang berlatih di Gunung Batu. Saya percaya dia adalah pahlawan asli Billposter.

English: She shouldn't be too hard to find. Seems like she's been training in the same spot for quite some time now. Plan to find her?
Indonesian: Dia seharusnya tidak terlalu sulit ditemukan. Sepertinya dia telah berlatih di tempat yang sama selama beberapa waktu sekarang. Berencana untuk menemukannya?

English: She typically can be found meditating high up in the mountains Southeast of this location. Good luck!
Indonesian: Dia biasanya dapat ditemukan bermeditasi tinggi di pegunungan Tenggara lokasi ini. Semoga sukses!

English: Well, you can hang around, but don't think you will be eating for free here!
Indonesian: Yah, Anda bisa berkeliaran, tetapi jangan berpikir Anda akan makan gratis di sini!

English: Hmm, I sense an unknown aura interfering with my meditation…
Indonesian: Hmm, saya merasakan aura yang tidak diketahui mengganggu meditasi saya ...

English: Yes yes, my food smells delicious. Time for you to go accomplish your mission!
Indonesian: Ya ya, makanan saya berbau lezat. Saatnya bagi Anda untuk pergi menyelesaikan misi Anda!

English: Find the Billposter hero high in the mountains Southeast of Nomads Village.
Indonesian: Temukan pahlawan Billposter tinggi di pegunungan Southeast of Nomads Village.

English: Billposter Hero - Sury
Indonesian: Billposter Hero - Sury

English: I'm very close to reaching a perpetual state of enlightenment. It is crucial that you don't…
Indonesian: Saya sangat dekat untuk mencapai tataran pencerahan yang abadi. Sangat penting bahwa Anda tidak...

English: Reonan!? He sent you? You seem rather weak for someone Reonan has supposedly entrusted so much knowledge to…
Indonesian: Reonan!? Dia mengirimmu? Anda tampak agak lemah untuk seseorang yang reonan seharusnya mempercayakan begitu banyak pengetahuan kepada ...

English: We will prove just what you are capable of. If you are successful in carrying out 3 tests, then our conversation will resume…
Indonesian: Kami akan membuktikan apa yang Anda mampu. Jika Anda berhasil melakukan 3 tes, maka percakapan kami akan dilanjutkan...

English: First, please go and defeat 50 Small Luias & 35 Luias. This should be sufficient to prove to me that you are a worthy disciple of Reonan.
Indonesian: Pertama, silakan pergi dan kalahkan 50 Small Luias & 35 Luias. Ini seharusnya cukup untuk membuktikan kepada saya bahwa Anda adalah murid Reonan yang layak.

English: Well, you talk a big game. But remember, actions do speak louder than words. Lets see if you can complete the quest.
Indonesian: Nah, Anda berbicara tentang pertandingan besar. Tapi ingat, tindakan memang berbicara lebih keras daripada kata-kata. Mari kita lihat apakah Anda dapat menyelesaikan pencarian.

English: If you do not wish to undergo the quest, then move along. I need absolute concentration.
Indonesian: Jika Anda tidak ingin menjalani pencarian, maka lanjutkan. Saya membutuhkan konsentrasi mutlak.

English: Hmm... You are definitely stronger than I previously imagined you would be…
Indonesian: Hmm.. Kamu pasti lebih kuat dari yang kubayangkan sebelumnya kamu akan ...

English: Please do not talk to me until you have defeated 20 Small Luias & 15 Luias.
Indonesian: Tolong jangan bicara dengan saya sampai Anda telah mengalahkan 20 Small Luias & 15 Luias.

English: Hunt 50 Small Luias & 35 Luias and then speak with Sury
Indonesian: Berburu 50 Small Luias & 35 Luias dan kemudian berbicara dengan Sury

English: Sury's Test (1)
Indonesian: Sury's Test (1)

English: Do not fool yourself into believing that was the only test. Next, please defeat the Shuhamma for me.
Indonesian: Jangan membodohi diri sendiri untuk percaya bahwa itu adalah satu-satunya ujian. Selanjutnya, tolong kalahkan Shuhamma untukku.

English: Are you still determined to prove your worth? You can back out at anytime.
Indonesian: Apakah Anda masih bertekad untuk membuktikan nilai Anda? Anda dapat mundur kapan saja.

English: Well then, hunt 50 Small Shuhammas & 35 Shuhammas for me.
Indonesian: Kalau begitu, berburu 50 Small Shuhammas & 35 Shuhammas untukku.

English: Heh, a true warrior would never turn down a challenge.
Indonesian: Heh, seorang pejuang sejati tidak akan pernah menolak tantangan.

English: Impressive. Guess I should increase the difficulty of the next test if I wish to truly test you!
Indonesian: Mengesankan. Kiranya saya harus meningkatkan kesulitan tes berikutnya jika saya ingin benar-benar menguji Anda!

English: The Shuhammas should be right at the bottom of this mountain. Please make haste and defeat 20 Small Shuhammas & 15 Shuhammas.
Indonesian: Shuhammas seharusnya berada tepat di dasar gunung ini. Tolong buat tergesa-gesa dan kalahkan 20 Small Shuhammas & 15 Shuhammas.

English: Hunt 50 Small Shuhammas & 35 Shuhammas and then speak with Sury
Indonesian: Berburu 50 Small Shuhammas & 35 Shuhammas dan kemudian berbicara dengan Sury

English: Sury's Test (2)
Indonesian: Sury's Test (2)

English: This will be my final task. Complete this and you will have proven yourself worthy enough to speak with me regarding Reonan's request.
Indonesian: Ini akan menjadi tugas terakhir saya. Lengkapi ini dan Anda akan membuktikan diri Anda cukup layak untuk berbicara dengan saya mengenai permintaan Reonan.

English: The Shuhamma were hardly a challenge for you. Now I really wanna test your skill!. Please go hunt the Lord Shuhamma which servers as their leader!
Indonesian: The Shuhamma were hardly a challenge for you. Now I really wanna test your skill!. Please go hunt the Lord Shuhamma which servers as their leader!

English: Hunting the Lord Shuhamma by yourself will be a daunting task. You might wish to enlist the aid of other warriors. But, if you DO defeat him solo, you will have truly earned my respect!
Indonesian: Hunting the Lord Shuhamma by yourself will be a daunting task. You might wish to enlist the aid of other warriors. But, if you DO defeat him solo, you will have truly earned my respect!

English: You are a quite a brave adventurer. Go hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma and let's see what you are truly made of!
Indonesian: You are a quite a brave adventurer. Go hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma and let's see what you are truly made of!

English: And here I was thinking you could do it! Maybe I was wrong about you...
Indonesian: Dan di sini aku berpikir kamu bisa melakukannya! Mungkin aku salah tentangmu..

English: That was surely no easy feat. You have earned my respect stranger! My name is Sury, the original Billposter Hero
Indonesian: Itu tentu bukan hal yang mudah. Anda telah mendapatkan rasa hormat saya orang asing! Nama saya Sury, Billposter Hero asli

English: You still have yet to hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma? Return to me once you are finished!
Indonesian: You still have yet to hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma? Return to me once you are finished!

English: Hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma and go back to Sury.
Indonesian: Hunt 40 Captain Shuhammas & the Lord Shuhamma and go back to Sury.

English: Sury's Dilemma
Indonesian: Sury's Dilemma

English: I've been training up here so long. I feel that I'm so close to achieving a heightened level of power, but there is something missing…
Indonesian: Saya sudah berlatih di sini begitu lama. Saya merasa bahwa saya sangat dekat untuk mencapai tingkat kekuatan yang tinggi, tetapi ada sesuatu yang hilang ...

English: I don't know why… I just feel like there is something missing… and this "thing" is keeping me from realizing my true inner potential.
Indonesian: Saya tidak tahu mengapa ... Saya hanya merasa ada sesuatu yang hilang ... dan "hal" ini membuat saya tidak menyadari potensi batin saya yang sebenarnya.

English: Could you please seek my mentor (Billposter Guardian) Capafe and explain my dilemma. He will surely understand…
Indonesian: Bisakah Anda mencari mentor saya (Billposter Guardian) Capafe dan menjelaskan dilema saya. Dia pasti akan mengerti ...

English: Thank you! Please get advice from (Billposter Guardian) Capafe.
Indonesian: Terima kasih! Silakan dapatkan saran dari (Billposter Guardian) Capafe.

English: You can't possibly stop now. You play an important role in things to come!
Indonesian: Anda tidak mungkin berhenti sekarang. Anda memainkan peran penting dalam hal-hal yang akan datang!

English: Welcome, I have been expecting you.
Indonesian: Selamat datang, saya telah mengharapkan Anda.

English: (Billposter Guardian) Capafe is located in Southern Darkon 3 along with the other Guardians.
Indonesian: (Billposter Guardian) Capafe terletak di Southern Darkon 3 bersama dengan Guardians lainnya.

English: Find (Billposter Guardian) Capafe.
Indonesian: Temukan (Billposter Guardian) Capafe.

English: Enlightenment Shard
Indonesian: Enlightenment Shard

English: Sury is currently in a perpetual state of self doubt. Despite her unyielding dedication to her training, there is a self-realization she alone will have to make…
Indonesian: Sury saat ini dalam keadaan ragu-ragu diri yang terus-menerus. Terlepas dari dedikasinya yang pantang menyerah pada pelatihannya, ada kesadaran diri yang harus dia buat sendiri ...

English: Go to Fera to get the Enlightenment Shard. She will tell you.
Indonesian: Pergi ke Fera untuk mendapatkan Enlightenment Shard. Dia akan memberitahumu.

English: We may be able to assist her in making this realization though… Find Fera, the Billposter Priest, at the Altar of Billposter North of here. She might know of a way…
Indonesian: Kami mungkin dapat membantunya dalam membuat kesadaran ini ... Temukan Fera, Billposter Priest, di Altar Billposter Utara di sini. Dia mungkin tahu caranya ...

English: Don't refuse your destiny!
Indonesian: Jangan menolak takdirmu!

English: The Guardian has sent you, right? I was waiting for you…
Indonesian: The Guardian telah mengirimmu, kan? Aku sedang menunggumu ...

English: Fera is Bill Poster Priest at the Bill Poster Altar. You shall find her there. I'm sure she is already expecting you.
Indonesian: Fera adalah Bill Poster Priest di Bill Poster Altar. Anda akan menemukannya di sana. Aku yakin dia sudah mengharapkanmu.

English: Find Fera in Billposter Alter
Indonesian: Temui Fera di Billposter Alter

English: Fera's Test
Indonesian: Fera's Test

English: Sury's mind is currently clouded with doubt, as the Guardian had mentioned. In her current state, she will never reach enlightenment regardless of how hard she trains…
Indonesian: Pikiran Sury saat ini diselimuti keraguan, seperti yang disebutkan Guardian. Dalam kondisinya saat ini, dia tidak akan pernah mencapai pencerahan terlepas dari seberapa keras dia berlatih ...

English: To help grant her thoughts a renewed sense of clarity, we must bring her a Shard of Enlightenment. First I must test your own personal strength. Do you accept?
Indonesian: Untuk membantu memberikan pikirannya rasa kejelasan yang diperbarui, kita harus membawakannya pecahan Shard of Enlightenment saya harus menguji kekuatan pribadi Anda sendiri. Apakah Anda menerima?

English: I knew you wouldn't back away from this challenge. Please hunt 60 Small Kern and 40 Kern located in Southern Darkon 3.
Indonesian: Saya tahu Anda tidak akan mundur dari tantangan ini. Silakan berburu 60 Small Kern dan 40 Kern yang terletak di Southern Darkon 3.

English: We must not falter in the face of adversity!
Indonesian: Kita tidak boleh goyah dalam menghadapi kesulitan!

English: I never doubted your skill for a second!
Indonesian: Saya tidak pernah meragukan keahlian Anda sedetik pun!

English: Please go and hunt down the Kern as a test of your own strength.
Indonesian: Silakan pergi dan memburu Kern sebagai ujian kekuatan Anda sendiri.

English: Hunt 60 Small Kern and 40 Kern located in Southern Darkon 3, then talk with Fera.
Indonesian: Berburu 60 Small Kern dan 40 Kern yang terletak di Southern Darkon 3, lalu berbicara dengan Fera.

English: Out of the Oven and into the Fire
Indonesian: Keluar dari Oven dan masuk ke dalam Fire

English: In order to complete the process required to create a Shard of Enlightenment, we must first acquire an Infernal Stone
Indonesian: Untuk menyelesaikan proses yang diperlukan untuk membuat Shard of Enlightenment, pertama-tama kita harus memperoleh Infernal Stone

English: Please defeat 30 Captain Kerns and acquire the Infernal Stone which should be located somewhere around them.
Indonesian: Tolong kalahkan 30 Captain Kerns dan dapatkan Infernal Stone yang seharusnya terletak di suatu tempat di sekitar mereka.

English: Great! Once you have acquired the Infernal Stone, take it to Capafe and ask about the next step of the process.
Indonesian: Hebat! Setelah Anda mendapatkan Infernal Stone, bawa ke Capafe dan tanyakan tentang langkah selanjutnya dari proses tersebut.

English: If you wish Sury to return to her original state, this is the only way.
Indonesian: Jika Anda ingin Sury kembali ke keadaan semula, ini adalah satu-satunya cara.

English: I have been waiting for you. I see that you have acquired an Infernal Stone.
Indonesian: Aku telah menunggumu. Saya melihat bahwa Anda telah memperoleh Infernal Stone.

English: Please hurry, I'm sure Capafe is waiting for us!
Indonesian: Tolong cepat, saya yakin Capafe sedang menunggu kita!

English: Hunt 30 Captain Kern, acquire the Infernal Stone, then talk with Capafe.
Indonesian: Berburu 30 Captain Kern, dapatkan Infernal Stone, lalu bicara dengan Capafe.

English: Stone of Enlightenment
Indonesian: Stone of Enlightenment

English: In order to create a Shard of Enlightenment, we will need to fuse together an Infernal Stone and an Angelic Stone.
Indonesian: Untuk menciptakan Shard of Enlightenment, kita perlu menggabungkan Infernal Stone dan Angelic Stone.

English: Please return to Fera and explain to her what it is you need.
Indonesian: Silakan kembali ke Fera dan jelaskan kepadanya apa yang Anda butuhkan.

English: She will be able to explain in greater detail about how to acquire an Angelic Stone.
Indonesian: Dia akan dapat menjelaskan secara lebih rinci tentang cara mendapatkan Angelic Stone.

English: We could all use your assistance right now…
Indonesian: Kami semua dapat menggunakan bantuan Anda sekarang ...

English: Ah! You've returned! What did Capafe have to say of the issue?
Indonesian: Ah! Anda telah kembali! Apa yang Capafe katakan tentang masalah ini?

English: Ask Fera about the Angelic Stone.
Indonesian: Tanyakan kepada Fera tentang Angelic Stone.

English: Look for Angelic Stone
Indonesian: Mencari Angelic Stone

English: Oh! Of course! It was an Angelic Stone that we require to complete the transmutation!
Indonesian: Oh! Tentu saja! Itu adalah Angelic Stone yang kita butuhkan untuk menyelesaikan transmutasi!

English: You can find Angelic Stones in Southern Darkon 3 near the Captain Glaphans. Will you please defeat them and acquire the stone?
Indonesian: Anda dapat menemukan Angelic Stones di Southern Darkon 3 dekat Captain Glaphans. Maukah Anda mengalahkan mereka dan mendapatkan batu itu?

English: Good! Please defeat 60 Captain Glaphan and acquire the Angelic Stone. Once the stone is in your possession, return to Capafe!
Indonesian: Bagus! Tolong kalahkan 60 Captain Glaphan dan dapatkan Angelic Stone. Setelah batu itu anda miliki, kembalilah ke Capafe!

English: Are you giving up?
Indonesian: Apakah Kamu menyerah?????

English: You have found the Angelic Stone! Now I can create a Shard of Enlightenment by combining both of the stones.
Indonesian: Anda telah menemukan Angelic Stone! Sekarang saya dapat membuat Shard of Enlightenment dengan menggabungkan kedua batu itu.

English: We have no time for idle conversation. Please retrieve the stone!
Indonesian: Kami tidak punya waktu untuk percakapan kosong. Silakan ambil batunya!

English: Hunt 60 Captain Glaphans, acquire the Angelic Stone, then take it to Capafe for transmutation.
Indonesian: Berburu 60 Captain Glaphans, dapatkan Angelic Stone, lalu bawa ke Capafe untuk transmutasi.

English: Sury's Realization
Indonesian: Sury's Realization

English: The process of transmutation required to create the Shard of Enlightenment will take just a moment…
Indonesian: Proses transmutasi yang diperlukan untuk membuat Shard of Enlightenmentakan memakan waktu sejenak ...

English: It is finished. Please bring the Shard of Enlightenment to Sury as soon as you can.
Indonesian: Sudah selesai. Tolong bawa Shard of Enlightenmentke Sury sesegera mungkin.

English: Thank you. This should help bring the clarity to her thoughts that Sury requires.
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Ini akan membantu membawa kejelasan pada pikirannya yang dibutuhkan Sury.

English: It would be most unwise to deny this request…
Indonesian: Akan sangat tidak bijaksana untuk menolak permintaan ini ...

English: I see you have returned. What has transpired?
Indonesian: Saya melihat Anda telah kembali. Apa yang telah terjadi?

English: Please hurry. Sury needs our aid.
Indonesian: Tolong cepat. Sury membutuhkan bantuan kita.

English: Hand the Shard of Enlightenment to Sury.
Indonesian: Serahkan Shard of Enlightenment kepada Sury.

English: In Safe Hands
Indonesian: In Safe Hands

English: This Shard, it has made everything so much clearer! I have recovered the part of myself that I lost along the way. I was once Roentel, Hero Billposter…
Indonesian: Shardini, itu telah membuat segalanya jauh lebih jelas! Saya telah memulihkan bagian dari diri saya yang hilang di sepanjang jalan. Saya pernah menjadi Roentel, Hero Billposter…

English: I now see the gravity of this situation…the peril that Madrigal is truly in. I understand why Reonan is seeking us out!
Indonesian: Saya sekarang melihat gravitasi situasi ini ... bahaya yang benar-benar dialami Madrigal. Saya mengerti mengapa Reonan mencari kita!

English: First, could you perhaps complete one favor for me? I left my pendant to Capafe before I decided to isolate myself up here on this mountain to train.
Indonesian: Pertama, bisakah Anda menyelesaikan satu bantuan untuk saya? Saya meninggalkan liontin saya ke Capafe sebelum saya memutuskan untuk mengisolasi diri di sini di gunung ini untuk berlatih.

English: Thank you yet again! Capafe should have the pendant. Go and ask her if she could return it.
Indonesian: Terima kasih sekali lagi! Capafe harus memiliki liontin itu. Pergi dan tanyakan padanya apakah dia bisa mengembalikannya.

English: This pendant is an important symbol of trust, you must acquire it!
Indonesian: Liontin ini adalah simbol kepercayaan yang penting, Anda harus mendapatkannya!

English: I'm glad to hear that Sury has reached this realization.
Indonesian: Saya senang mendengar bahwa Sury telah mencapai kesadaran ini.

English: Capafe should have the pendant. Go and inquire about it.
Indonesian: Capafe harus memiliki liontin itu. Pergi dan tanyakan tentang itu.

English: Ask Capafe for Sury's Pendant.
Indonesian: Minta Capafe untuk Sury's Pendant

English: Reclaiming the Pendant
Indonesian: Reclaiming the Pendant

English: Ahh the Pendant. When Sury left it to me a long time ago, I kept it in a barren desert, untraversed by man.
Indonesian: Ahh liontin itu. Ketika Sury menyerahkannya kepada saya sejak lama, saya menyimpannya di gurun tandus, tidak terlacak oleh manusia.

English: Unfortunately at some point, Chimeradons came to discover it and took it for their own. Since then, I have been unable to locate it…
Indonesian: Sayangnya pada titik tertentu, Chimeradons datang untuk menemukannya dan mengambilnya sendiri. Sejak itu, saya tidak dapat menemukannya ...

English: Could you please find the pendant for me?
Indonesian: Bisakah Anda menemukan liontin itu untuk saya?

English: Thank you for your assistance. I feel that the pendant is currently being held by a Chimeradon. Please reclaim it from him then show me so I may rest assured it is returned.
Indonesian: Terima kasih atas bantuan Anda. Saya merasa liontin itu saat ini dipegang oleh Chimeradon. Tolong reklamasi darinya kemudian tunjukkan kepada saya sehingga saya dapat yakin itu dikembalikan.

English: Please find the pendant. I feel it is partly my responsibility for the pendants disappearance…
Indonesian: Silakan temukan liontinnya. Saya merasa itu sebagian tanggung jawab saya atas hilangnya liontin ...

English: You have returned. I hope you have succeeded in acquiring the pendant.
Indonesian: Anda telah kembali. Saya harap Anda telah berhasil mendapatkan liontin itu.

English: Defeat the Chimeradon and show Capafe the pendant.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Chimeradon dan tunjukkan liontin itu kepada Capafe.

English: The pendant is currently held by a Chimeradon. Go and retrieve it from his undeserving hands!
Indonesian: Liontin itu saat ini dipegang oleh chimeradon. Pergi dan ambil dari tangannya yang tidak pantas!

English: To the Real Owner
Indonesian: To the Real Owner

English: Thank you. I can now rest assured knowing that the pendant will be returned to its rightful owner.
Indonesian: Terima kasih. Saya sekarang dapat yakin mengetahui bahwa liontin itu akan dikembalikan kepada pemiliknya yang sah.

English: Will you please take the pendant to Sury, I'm sure she is anxious to receive it.
Indonesian: Maukah Anda membawa liontin itu ke Sury, saya yakin dia sangat ingin menerimanya.

English: Hurry over to Sury, I'm sure she is anxious to receive the pendant.
Indonesian: Cepat ke Sury, aku yakin dia sangat ingin menerima liontin itu.

English: Please rethink your decision. This pendant is quite important to Sury.
Indonesian: Silakan pikirkan kembali keputusan Anda. Liontin ini cukup penting bagi Sury.

English: You have recovered the pendant!
Indonesian: Anda telah memulihkan liontin itu!

English: Take the pendant back to Sury.
Indonesian: Bawa liontin itu kembali ke Sury.

English: Deliver the Hero's Pendant to Sury.
Indonesian: Berikan Hero's Pendant kepada Sury.

English: Billposter Hero's Pendant
Indonesian: Billposter Hero's Pendant

English: We have very little time. Even as we speak, I can sense the growing darkness around us…
Indonesian: Kami memiliki sedikit waktu. Bahkan sewaktu kita berbicara, saya dapat merasakan kegelapan yang tumbuh di sekitar kita...

English: Will you bring my pendant to Reonan? Please let him know that the time is now for us to unite.
Indonesian: Maukah Anda membawa liontin saya ke Reonan? Tolong beri tahu dia bahwa saatnya sekarang bagi kita untuk bersatu.

English: Now that you have the pendant, hurry and give it to Reonan!
Indonesian: Sekarang setelah Anda memiliki liontin itu, cepat dan berikan kepada Reonan!

English: Ahh this is Sury's pendant! The time has once again come that we rise to the challenge before us! With allies like you by our side, we will be prepared for challenges Shade presents us with!
Indonesian: Ahh ini liontin Sury! Waktunya sekali lagi telah tiba bahwa kita bangkit menghadapi tantangan di hadapan kita! Dengan sekutu seperti Anda di sisi kami, kami akan siap menghadapi tantangan yang diberikan Shade kepada kami!

English: Please take this pendant to Reonan!
Indonesian: Silakan bawa liontin ini ke Reonan!

English: Bring the Heroes Pendant to Reonan
Indonesian: Bawa Heroes Pendant ke Reonan

English: Rumble in the Mountains
Indonesian: Rumble in the Mountains

English: Strange sounds have been coming from the Leren Mountains. I recall Martinyc once speaking of a myth about creatures that roam deep within the mountain caves.
Indonesian: Suara-suara aneh datang dari Leren Mountain. Aku ingat Martinyc pernah berbicara seputar mitos tentang makhluk yang berkeliaran jauh di dalam gua gunung.

English: Could you go check with her to see if she has any information about what could be causing this disturbance?
Indonesian: Bisakah kamu memeriksanya untuk mengetahui apakah dia memiliki informasi tentang apa yang dapat menyebabkan gangguan ini?

English: Martinyc is likely reading her books as always. Go speak with her to find out more information.
Indonesian: Martinyc sepertinya sedang membaca bukunya seperti biasa. Bicaralah dengannya untuk mengetahui informasi lebih lanjut.

English: Leren Mountains is a dangerous place. I do not blame you for wanting to stay within the safety of Flarine.
Indonesian: Leren Mountain adalah tempat yang berbahaya. Saya tidak menyalahkan Anda karena ingin tetap berada dalam keamanan Flarine.

English: Oh... the Mayor sent you! And he says that there has been a disturbance in the Leren Mountains...
Indonesian: Oh.. Mayor mengirimmu! Dan dia mengatakan bahwa telah terjadi gangguan di Leren Mountain..

English: Seek out Martinyc for information on the rumblings of Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Carilah Martinyc terkait informasi tentang gemuruh Leren Mountain.

English: Meet with Martinyc.
Indonesian: Bertemu dengan Martinyc.

English: Demian Deviants
Indonesian: Demian Deviants

English: I once had a book that contains legends of the beasts that live within the caves of the Leren Mountains... but it was stolen by a pack of Demians during my research.
Indonesian: Aku pernah punya buku yang berisi legenda binatang buas yang hidup di gua-gua Leren Mountain.. tapi buku itu dicuri oleh sekelompok kaum Demian selama penelitianku.

English: If you return my book to me I may be able to help.
Indonesian: Jika Anda mengembalikan bukuku kepadaku, aku mungkin dapat membantu.

English: I have a feeling that the Demians still have my book of legends. Search for my book in Madren Town. You may have to get your hands a bit dirty...
Indonesian: Aku merasa para Demian masih menyimpan buku legendaku. Cari bukuku di Kota Madren. Kamu mungkin harus mengotori tanganmu..

English: Madren Town is no place for commoners to travel. I could never expect you to risk your life for my book. Thank you for listening to me anyway.
Indonesian: Kota Madren bukanlah tempat bagi orang biasa untuk bepergian. Aku tidak pernah bisa mengharapkanmu mempertaruhkan hidupmu untuk bukuku. Terima kasih sudah mendengarkanku.

English: You found my book, thank you so much! Now to find the legend of the Leren Chasm...
Indonesian: Kamu menemukan bukuku, terima kasih banyak! Sekarang untuk menemukan legenda Leren Chasm..

English: Please find my book! I'm positive it is still in Madren Town.
Indonesian: Tolong temukan bukuku! Aku yakin buku itu masih ada di Kota Madren.

English: Kill 15 Demian and find the Legend of Leren Mountains, then return to Martinyc.
Indonesian: Bunuh 15 Demian dan temukan Legend of Leren Mountains, lalu kembali ke Martinyc.

English: Magic Mushrooms
Indonesian: Magic Mushrooms

English: Within this book lies the secrets to the distubances in the Leren Mountains...
Indonesian: Di dalam buku ini terdapat rahasia gangguan di Leren Mountain..

English: The legend states that long ago packs of trolls ruled the creatures that made the Leren Mountains their home.
Indonesian: Legenda menyatakan bahwa dahulu kala sekelompok troll menguasai makhluk yang menjadikan Leren Mountain sebagai rumah mereka.

English: Through disease, famine, and bickering betweeen Masquerpets, the trolls retreated from the Leren Mountains into the caves.
Indonesian: Melalui penyakit, kelaparan, dan pertengkaran antara Masquerpets, para troll mundur dari Leren Mountain ke dalam gua.

English: The caves were said to contain magical mushrooms that could prolong the life of those who ate them, and it is said that the trolls who once lived in the cave may still live there, in the darkness.
Indonesian: Gua-gua tersebut dikatakan mengandung jamur ajaib yang dapat memperpanjang umur orang yang memakannya, dan konon troll yang pernah tinggal di gua tersebut mungkin masih tinggal di sana, dalam kegelapan.

English: Perhaps a sample of the local fungi could hold some clues...
Indonesian: Mungkin sampel jamur lokal dapat menyimpan beberapa petunjuk..

English: A Lord Mushpang roams just north of Eastern Flarine... Bring a sample of the giant mushroom to the cook Sotta, who can tell you more about the magical properties of Flaris fungi.
Indonesian: A Lord Mushpang roams just north of Eastern Flarine... Bring a sample of the giant mushroom to the cook Sotta, who can tell you more about the magical properties of Flaris fungi.

English: Oh... are you allergic to mushrooms!? Nevermind... perhaps we can find another person for the job.
Indonesian: Oh.. apakah kamu alergi terhadap jamur!? Sudahlah.. mungkin kita bisa mencari orang lain untuk pekerjaan itu.

English: Ah, Flaris fungi! The mushrooms of Flaris have always been said to have magical properties...
Indonesian: Ah, jamur Flaris! Jamur Flaris selalu dikatakan memiliki sifat magis..

English: Collect a sample of the Lord Mushpang and deliver it to Sotta.
Indonesian: Collect a sample of the Lord Mushpang and deliver it to Sotta.

English: Collect a sample of Flaris Fungi from a Lord Mushpang.
Indonesian: Collect a sample of Flaris Fungi from a Lord Mushpang.

English: Fun with Fungi
Indonesian: Fun with Fungi

English: Cooking with Flaris fungi brings out the properties of vitality in a dish...
Indonesian: Memasak dengan jamur Flaris memunculkan sifat vitalitas dalam hidangan..

English: It is not hard to believe that a Masquerpet may be able to extend its life by eating the magical fungi.
Indonesian: Tidak sulit untuk percaya bahwa Masquerpet dapat memperpanjang hidupnya dengan memakan jamur ajaib.

English: I am a seasoned cook, but Marche knows more about the magic of Madrigal.
Indonesian: Aku memang seorang juru masak berpengalaman, tetapi Marche tahu lebih banyak tentang keajaiban Madrigal.

English: Marche has always been an expert on the magical properties of the plant life in the region... Go speak with Marche to learn more about the magic within the Flaris fungi.
Indonesian: Marche selalu menjadi ahli dalam hal magis kehidupan tumbuhan di wilayah tersebut.. Bicaralah dengan Marche untuk mempelajari lebih lanjut tentang keajaiban dalam jamur Flaris.

English: Magic is powerful, and sometimes scary. I understand if you do not want to speak to Marche.
Indonesian: Sihir itu kuat, dan terkadang menakutkan. Aku mengerti jika kamu tidak ingin berbicara dengan Marche.

English: Oh, hello! So Sotta sent you to me. I wonder if you are prepared to seek out the magic behind these mushrooms...
Indonesian: Halo! Jadi Sotta mengirimmu kepadaku. Aku ingin tahu apakah kamu siap untuk mencari keajaiban di balik jamur ini..

English: Speak to Marche to learn more about the magic of Flaris fungi.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Marche untuk mempelajari lebih lanjut tentang keajaiban jamur Flaris.

English: Meet with Marche.
Indonesian: Bertemu dengan Marche.

English: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 2
Indonesian: Misteri Leren Chasm Bagian 2

English: Magic in the Air
Indonesian: Sihir di Udara

English: Hmm... well, I believe the magical properties of these mushrooms originally came from spores that fall from the wings of Mothbees.
Indonesian: Hmm.. yah, aku yakin khasiat jamur ini awalnya berasal dari spora yang jatuh dari sayap Mothbees.

English: With a sample of Mothbee Spores I may be able to recreate the potent vitality mushrooms that may have allowed a troll to live much longer than normal...
Indonesian: Dengan sampel Spora Mothbee, aku mungkin dapat membuat ulang jamur vitalitas kuat yang memungkinkan troll hidup lebih lama dari biasanya..

English: The wings of Mothbees shed spores constantly. Please, go defeat the Mothbees flying above Flaris, and bring me a sample of the spores!
Indonesian: Sayap Mothbees melepaskan spora terus-menerus. Tolong, kalahkan Mothbees yang terbang di atas Flaris, dan bawakan aku sampel spora!

English: Mothbees can be vicious creatures. If you don't want to get knocked off your broom, it is best if you leave them alone.
Indonesian: Mothbees bisa menjadi makhluk ganas. Jika Anda tidak ingin terlempar dari sapu Anda, sebaiknya Anda membiarkannya saja.

English: Ah, you found the spores! I should be able to concoct something from these...
Indonesian: Ah, kamu menemukan sporanya! Aku harus bisa meramu sesuatu

English: Collect a sampling of Mothbee Spore, and bring them back to me.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan sampel Mothbee Spore, dan bawa kembali padaku.

English: Collect 10 Mothbee Spore and bring them to Marche.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 10 Mothbee Spore dan bawa ke Marche.

English: Sage Advice
Indonesian: Sage Advice

English: I feel we are getting close to solving the mystery behind the magic mushrooms in Flaris...
Indonesian: Aku merasa kita semakin dekat untuk memecahkan misteri di balik jamur ajaib di Flaris..

English: The wise sage Radion in the North of Leren Mountains has lived in Flaris longer than most residents have been alive.
Indonesian: Wise Sage Radion di Utara Pegunungan Leren telah tinggal di Flaris lebih lama dari kebanyakan penduduk yang hidup.

English: Go speak with the sage Radion and see if he knows anything about the power within the Elixir of Vitality!
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Sage Radion dan lihat apakah dia tahu sesuatu tentang kekuatan dalam Elixir of Vitality!

English: Radion is a bit of a hermit, but he means no harm. I cannot force you to speak to him if you do not want to, though.
Indonesian: Radion agak pertapa, tapi dia tidak bermaksud jahat. Saya tidak bisa memaksa Anda untuk berbicara dengannya jika Anda tidak mau.

English: Hello adventurer... I see Marche has sent you to me with something interesting in hand.
Indonesian: Halo petualang .. Aku melihat Marche telah mengirimmu kepadaku dengan sesuatu yang menarik di tangan.

English: Speak with Radion to find out information about the magic within the Elixir of Vitality.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Radion untuk mengetahui informasi tentang keajaiban dalam Elixir of Vitality.

English: Meet with Radion.
Indonesian: Bertemu dengan Radion.

English: Seeking Leren Chasm
Indonesian: Mencari Leren Chasm

English: Interesting... even with my vast knowledge of Flaris I know very little about the troll migration to the Leren Chasm.
Indonesian: Menarik .. bahkan dengan pengetahuan aku yang luas tentang Flaris, aku hanya tahu sedikit tentang migrasi troll ke Leren Chasm.

English: Perhaps it is time to go explore the Leren Chasm to find out more about the powers behind the Elixir of Vitality.
Indonesian: Mungkin sudah waktunya untuk menjelajahi Leren Chasm untuk mengetahui lebih banyak tentang kekuatan di balik Elixir of Vitality.

English: The secret behind the longevity of the Leren Chasm trolls begins with finding the entrance to their cave. Search for the entrance to the Leren Chasm and return to me at once!
Indonesian: Rahasia di balik umur panjang troll Leren Chasm dimulai dengan menemukan pintu masuk ke gua mereka. Cari pintu masuk ke Leren Chasm dan segera kembali padaku!

English: The trolls of the Leren Mountains were believed to be part of a fierce army. If you are not comfortable seeking out the trolls, I will understand.
Indonesian: Para troll dari Pegunungan Leren diyakini sebagai bagian dari pasukan yang ganas. Jika Anda merasa tidak nyaman mencari para troll, saya akan mengerti.

English: I see, so that's where the Leren Chasm is hidden...
Indonesian: Begitu ya, jadi disitulah Leren Chasm disembunyikan..

English: Search for the entrance to the Leren Chasm, then return to me.
Indonesian: Cari pintu masuk ke Leren Chasm, lalu kembali padaku.

English: Locate the entrance to the Leren Chasm in the Leren Mountains, and report back to Radion.
Indonesian: Temukan pintu masuk ke Leren Chasm di Leren Mountains, dan laporkan kembali ke Radion.

English: Prepare to Dive!
Indonesian: Bersiap untuk Menyelam!

English: Now that we know where the Leren Chasm is, I have stationed a guard outside the cave to prevent anyone from accidently going inside.
Indonesian: Sekarang kita tahu di mana Leren Chasm berada, saya telah menempatkan penjaga di luar gua untuk mencegah siapa pun masuk ke dalam.

English: From here on adventurer, you must delve into the Leren Chasm if we are ever to know the truth. Please speak to the Leren Chasm guard when you are ready to explore the caves.
Indonesian: Dari sini petualang, Anda harus menyelidiki Leren Chasm jika kita ingin mengetahui kebenarannya. Silakan berbicara dengan penjaga Leren Chasm ketika Anda siap untuk menjelajahi gua.

English: What you find in the caves of Leren Chasm may be terrifying, but I sense a special kind of bravery within you adventurer... When you are ready go speak to the guard outside the Leren Chasm.
Indonesian: Apa yang kamu temukan di gua Leren Chasm mungkin menakutkan, tapi aku merasakan keberanian khusus dalam diri kamu petualang.. Saat kamu siap, bicaralah dengan penjaga di luar Jurang Leren.

English: Without you, the mystery of the Leren Chasm trolls may never be resolved. No matter though...
Indonesian: Tanpamu, misteri troll Leren Chasm mungkin tidak akan pernah terpecahkan. Tidak peduli meskipun..

English: Welcome to the Leren Chasm. I am here to prevent those who are ill-prepared from entering and befalling an early death... I see Radion sent you though, you seem prepared.
Indonesian: Selamat datang di Leren Chasm. Aku di sini untuk mencegah mereka yang tidak siap memasuki dan menimpa kematian dini .. Aku melihat Radion mengirimmu, kamu tampaknya siap.

English: Seek out the guard in front of the Leren Chasm.
Indonesian: Cari penjaga di depan Leren Chasm.

English: Meet with the guard outside the Leren Chasm.
Indonesian: Temui penjaga di luar Leren Chasm.

English: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 3
Indonesian: The Mystery of Leren Chasm Part 3

English: Cave Diving
Indonesian: Cave Diving

English: After unblocking the entrance to Leren Chasm, strange creatures have started coming out, causing havoc in the Leren Mountains.
Indonesian: Setelah membuka blokir pintu masuk ke Leren Chasm, makhluk aneh mulai keluar, menyebabkan kekacauan di Leren Mountains.

English: Go inside the Leren Chasm and clear out the creatures that have been causing us problems.
Indonesian: Masuklah ke dalam Leren Chasm dan singkirkan makhluk-makhluk yang telah menyebabkan masalah bagi kita.

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm. Inside you will find the Masquerpets I speak of.
Indonesian: Silakan berbicara dengan saya ketika Anda siap untuk memasuki Leren Chasm. Di dalam Anda akan menemukan Masquerpets yang saya bicarakan.

English: These unknown creatures are terribly dangerous. Do not approach them if you feel unprepared.
Indonesian: Makhluk-makhluk tak dikenal ini sangat berbahaya. Jangan mendekati mereka jika Anda merasa belum siap.

English: Hopefully we will have less disturbences in the Leren Mountains now, thanks to you.
Indonesian: Semoga gangguan di Leren Mountains sekarang berkurang, terima kasih.

English: Eliminate 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and Cavern Larva.
Indonesian: Basmi 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and Cavern Larva.

English: Enter the Leren Chasm, then kill 20 Deep Cave Gorilla and 20 Cavern Larva.
Indonesian: Masuki Leren Chasm, lalu habisi 20 Deep Cave Gorilla dan 20 Cavern Larva.

English: Creepy Crawlers
Indonesian: Creepy Crawlers

English: While inside the Leren Chasm there were no sign of the trolls? Go back inside and push deeper within the caves to look for more evidence.
Indonesian: Sementara di dalam Leren Chasm tidak ada tanda-tanda troll? Kembali ke dalam dan dorong lebih dalam ke dalam gua untuk mencari lebih banyak bukti.

English: Please speak to me when you are ready to enter the Leren Chasm once again. You will need to go past where you faced the Cavern Larva this time to find more information.
