English: Not only did the crystals help defend Azria Village from the monsters outside these walls, but they were once used to give life to a mechanical beast that the Dwarpets used to fight against Shade's army.
Indonesian: Kristal tidak hanya membantu mempertahankan Azria Village dari monster di luar tembok ini, tetapi juga pernah digunakan untuk memberikan kehidupan kepada binatang mekanik yang digunakan Dwarpet untuk berperang melawan pasukan Shade.

English: Rankashu probably wonders what is left of the mine's powerful crystals, and what may have been left behind by his people...
Indonesian: Rankashu mungkin bertanya-tanya apa yang tersisa dari kristal kuat tambang, dan apa yang mungkin ditinggalkan oleh rakyatnya..

English: There is a guard outside the entrance to the Storm Peak where the Azria Mine is located, let him know that Mawrang has sent you and he may allow you to step inside the mine to search for clues.
Indonesian: Ada penjaga di luar pintu masuk ke Storm Peak di mana Azria Mine berada, beri tahu dia bahwa Mawrang telah mengirimmu dan dia mengizinkanmu masuk ke dalam tambang untuk mencari petunjuk.

English: Those are do not seek knowledge may never know true wisdom...
Indonesian: Mereka yang tidak mencari ilmu mungkin tidak pernah tahu kebijaksanaan sejati..

English: Oh hello, it's rare to see visitors way up here. I see, so Mawrang sent you to investigate the mine.
Indonesian: Oh halo, sangat jarang melihat pengunjung jauh di sini. Begitu ya, jadi Mawrang mengirimmu untuk menyelidiki tambang itu.

English: Find the Storm Peak Guard.
Indonesian: Temukan Penjaga Puncak Badai.

English: Speak to the Storm Peak Guard.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Storm Peak Guard.

English: Winter is Coming
Indonesian: Musim dingin tiba

English: Storm Peak mountain has been closed off for many years... I am stationed here to prevent anyone from going inside. Terrifying masquerpets have overrun the place, and as far as I know no one has been able to safely step inside for a long time.
Indonesian: Gunung Storm Peak telah ditutup selama bertahun-tahun.. Aku ditempatkan di sini untuk mencegah siapa pun masuk ke dalam. Masquerpet yang menakutkan telah menyerbu tempat itu, dan sejauh yang aku tahu tidak ada yang bisa masuk dengan aman untuk waktu yang lama.

English: If you really want to go inside, you'll need to prove that you can handle the strongest masquerpets in Azria. Those found within the Storm Peak are even more dangerous...
Indonesian: Jika kamu benar-benar ingin masuk ke dalam, kamu harus membuktikan bahwa dapat menangani penyamaran terkuat di Azria. Yang ditemukan di dalam Storm Peak bahkan lebih berbahaya..

English: Eliminate 200 Mammoth to prove that you can handle the dangers within the Storm Peak.
Indonesian: Hilangkan 200 Mammoth untuk membuktikan bahwa Anda dapat menangani bahaya di dalam Storm Peak.

English: The Storm Peak mine is too dangerous anyway...
Indonesian: Lagipula tambang Storm Peak terlalu berbahaya..

English: You actually managed to kill that many Mammoths!? Well if that is the case... I think it's time to let you test your fate inside the Storm Peak mountain.
Indonesian: Kamu benar-benar berhasil membunuh Mammoth sebanyak itu!? Nah jika itu terjadi.. Aku pikir sudah waktunya untuk membiarkanmu menguji nasib di dalam gunung Storm Peak.

English: Eliminate 200 Mammoths as proof of your strength.
Indonesian: Habisi 200 Mammoth sebagai bukti kekuatanmu.

English: Kill 200 Mammoths.
Indonesian: Bunuh 200 Mammoth.

English: Lost Kin
Indonesian: Keluarga yang hilang

English: I wish you the best on your journey, however just know that the Storm Peak is terrifying. Only step foot within if you are truly prepared.
Indonesian: Saya berharap yang terbaik dalam perjalanan Anda, namun ketahuilah bahwa Storm Peak menakutkan. Hanya melangkah masuk jika Anda benar-benar siap.

English: Many dangers lie ahead... but I trust you to take them head on and emerge victorious, warrior. Enter the Storm Peak and find out what lies ahead.
Indonesian: Banyak bahaya terbentang di depan.. tetapi aku percaya kamu untuk menghadapinya dan muncul sebagai pemenang, pejuang. Masuki Storm Peak dan cari tahu apa yang ada di depan.

English: It is not too late to turn back, entering the Storm Peak is almost certain death.
Indonesian: Belum terlambat untuk kembali, memasuki Storm Peak hampir pasti kematian.

English: Heh!? What is one of your kind doing here? I haven't seen any living creatures other than these puppets of Shade for years now...
Indonesian: Heh!? Apa yang salah satu dari jenis kamu lakukan di sini? Aku belum pernah melihat makhluk hidup selain boneka Shade ini selama bertahun-tahun sekarang..

English: Head inside the Storm Peak when you are ready.
Indonesian: Pergilah ke dalam Storm Peak saat Anda siap.

English: Speak with Rankashin.
Indonesian: Bicaralah dengan Rankashin.

English: A New Weapon Part 2
Indonesian: A New Weapon Part 2

English: A Harey Situation
Indonesian: A Harey Situation

English: So a Dwarpet named Rankashu sent you to look for scraps that could be used to build another weapon... interesting. I have lived my life reflecting on the effects of the last time the Dwarpets made a weapon... the Clockworks.
Indonesian: Jadi Dwarpet bernama Rankashu menyuruhmu untuk mencari sisa-sisa yang bisa digunakan untuk membuat senjata lain.. menarik. Aku telah menjalani hidup dengan merenungkan efek terakhir kali para Dwarpet membuat senjata .. Clockworks.

English: Creating the Clockworks weapon brought Madrigal salvation... until Shade turned our weapon against us. The Clockworks rampaged throughout the lands, destroying villages and the people who lived in them. Clockworks was eventually contained... but is no longer a threat to Shade.
Indonesian: Membuat senjata Clockworks membawa keselamatan Madrigal.. sampai Shade mengarahkan senjata kami ke arah kami. Clockworks mengamuk di seluruh negeri, menghancurkan desa dan orang-orang yang tinggal di dalamnya. Clockworks akhirnya tertahan.. tetapi tidak lagi menjadi ancaman bagi Shade.

English: All the other Dwarpets have long died or left the Storm Peak... but perhaps with your help, we can gather materials to build a new weapon to stop Shade once and for all.
Indonesian: Semua Dwarpet lainnya telah lama mati atau meninggalkan Storm Peak.. tapi mungkin dengan bantuanmu, kami dapat mengumpulkan bahan untuk membuat senjata baru guna menghentikan Shade untuk selamanya.

English: Frozen Hare Guards have completely blocked off the path leading deeper within the mountains. If you can take down their leader we can make a foothold further ahead.
Indonesian: Frozen Hare Guards telah sepenuhnya memblokir jalan yang mengarah lebih dalam ke pegunungan. Jika Anda bisa menjatuhkan pemimpin mereka, kita bisa membuat pijakan lebih jauh ke depan.

English: You were my one hope of continuing work on a new weapon... please reconsider.
Indonesian: Kamu adalah satu-satunya harapan untuk terus mengerjakan senjata baru .. tolong pertimbangkan kembali.

English: Well done! With the Frozen Hare Assassin out of the way we can continue to explore.
Indonesian: Bagus sekali! Dengan tersingkirnya Frozen Hare Assassin, kita dapat terus menjelajah.

English: Eliminate 30 Frozen Hare Guards and their leader, the Frozen Hare Assassin.
Indonesian: Hilangkan 30 Frozen Hare Guards dan pemimpin mereka, Frozen Hare Assassin.

English: Kill 30 Frozen Hare Guard and 1 Frozen Hare Assassin.
Indonesian: Bunuh 30 Frozen Hare Guard dan 1 Frozen Hare Assassin.

English: Building a Weapon
Indonesian: Membangun Senjata

English: With the guards out of our hair we can start collecting supplies to start building a brand new weapon!
Indonesian: Dengan penjaga dari rambut kita, kita dapat mulai mengumpulkan persediaan untuk mulai membuat senjata baru!

English: The Enraged Yetti and Saphyryan Hounds that live in the valley below have weapons and armor we can use to forge the basis of a mechanical beast like Clockworks.
Indonesian: AEnraged Yetti dan Saphyryan Hounds yang hidup di lembah di bawah memiliki senjata dan baju zirah yang bisa kita gunakan untuk menempa basis monster mekanis seperti Clockworks.

English: Head down to the valley and collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses, they'll come in handy for crafting...
Indonesian: Turun ke lembah dan kumpulkan Yetti Hammers dan Hound Harnesses, mereka akan berguna untuk crafting..

English: The hounds only bite a little bit...
Indonesian: Anjing hanya menggigit sedikit..

English: Yes, this will do nicely! I can start forging a new Clockworks with these materials. But there's one thing we're missing...
Indonesian: Ya, ini akan berhasil dengan baik! Aku bisa mulai menempa Clockworks baru dengan bahan-bahan ini. Tapi ada satu hal yang kita lewatkan..

English: Collect Yetti Hammers and Hound Harnesses from the masquerpets in the valley below.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Yetti Hammer dan Hound Harness dari masquerpet di lembah di bawah.

English: Collect 30 Yetti Hammers from the Enraged Yetti, and 15 Hound Harness from the Saphyryan Hounds.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan 30 Yetti Hammer dari Enraged Yetti, dan 15 Hound Harness dari Saphyryan Hound.

English: Army of the Dead
Indonesian: Tentara Orang Mati

English: These armaments are a good foundation to work off of for now... but to bring a new Clockworks to life, we need a powerful core of energy.
Indonesian: Persenjataan ini adalah fondasi yang baik untuk dikerjakan saat ini.. tetapi untuk menghidupkan Clockworks baru, kita membutuhkan inti energi yang kuat.

English: When the masquerpets invaded Storm Peak, the Crystal Demon Lord led an army of undead deep within the mountains and sealed away the last known energy core produced by my people...
Indonesian: Ketika para penyamar menginvasi Storm Peak, Crystal Demon Lord memimpin pasukan undead jauh di dalam pegunungan dan menyegel inti energi terakhir yang diketahui diproduksi oleh orang-orangku..

English: The Demon Lord hides behind its skeletal minions, so to even have a chance at retriving the energy core we will need to eliminate the Skeletal Militants along with the Skeleton General.
Indonesian: Raja Iblis bersembunyi di balik antek-antek kerangkanya, jadi bahkan untuk memiliki kesempatan untuk mendapatkan kembali inti energi kita perlu melenyapkan Skeletal Militants bersama dengan Skeleton General.

English: The Skeletal Militants are formidable foes. The Skeleton General is said to use sharp blades affixed to its back to rip through anything that gets in its way.
Indonesian: Skeletal Militants adalah musuh yang tangguh. Jenderal Kerangka dikatakan menggunakan bilah tajam yang ditempelkan di punggungnya untuk merobek apa pun yang menghalangi jalannya.

English: There's no way we can get to the Demon Lord without first killing its minions...
Indonesian: Tidak mungkin kita bisa sampai ke Demon Lord tanpa terlebih dahulu membunuh antek-anteknya..

English: Your power is tremendous! With your help I have made more progress in creating a new Clockworks than I have in my years out here on my own.
Indonesian: Kekuatanmu luar biasa! Dengan bantuan Anda, saya telah membuat lebih banyak kemajuan dalam menciptakan Clockworks baru daripada yang saya miliki selama bertahun-tahun di sini sendirian.

English: You couldn't find the Skeletal Militants and their general? Head to the valley far below.
Indonesian: Anda tidak dapat menemukan Skeletal Militants dan jendral mereka? Pergilah ke lembah jauh di bawah.

English: Kill 80 Skeletal Militants and the Skeleton General.
Indonesian: Bunuh 80 Skeletal Militants dan Skeleton General.

English: Weapon of the Future
Indonesian: Senjata Masa Depan

English: The dream of building a new weapon to defend Madgrial is starting to feel real. The only thing standing in our way is the Crystal Demon Lord.
Indonesian: Impian membangun senjata baru untuk membela Madgrial mulai terasa nyata. Satu-satunya hal yang menghalangi kita adalah Crystal Demon Lord.

English: Go collect the Clockworks Core that the Crystal Demon Lord has been guarding all these years. Once you've collected the Clockworks Core, I'm sure that Rankashu would appreciate an update on your progress...
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Clockworks Core yang telah dijaga oleh Crystal Demon Lord selama ini. Setelah kamu mengumpulkan Clockworks Core, aku yakin bahwa Rankashu akan menghargai pembaruan kemajuanmu..

English: Without the Clockworks Core there is no hope to build a new weapon.
Indonesian: Tanpa Clockworks Core tidak ada harapan untuk membuat senjata baru.

English: This is incredible!!! My kin was in Storm Peak all along... and a Clockworks Core was being guarded there, too!? Perhaps the future of Madrigal is brighter than I thought...
Indonesian: Ini luar biasa!!! Kerabatku ada di Storm Peak selama ini.. dan Clockworks Core juga dijaga di sana!? Mungkin masa depan Madrigal lebih cerah dari yang aku kira..

English: I will spend my days trying to understand this Clockworks Core, perhaps one day Rankashin and I will successfully create the strongest Clockworks of all time!
Indonesian: Saya akan menghabiskan hari-hari saya untuk mencoba memahami Clockworks Core ini, mungkin suatu hari nanti saya dan Rankashin akan berhasil membuat Clockworks terkuat sepanjang masa!

English: Destroy the Crystal Demon Lord so I may finally bring a new Clockworks into the world!
Indonesian: Hancurkan Crystal Demon Lord jadi aku akhirnya bisa membawa Clockworks baru ke dunia!

English: Defeat the Crystal Demon Lord to obtain the Clockworks Core, then return to Rankashu in Darkon.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Crystal Demon Lord untuk mendapatkan Clockworks Core, lalu kembali ke Rankashu di Darkon.

English: Hael's Swords
Indonesian: Hael's Swords

English: Altars of a Dark Clown
Indonesian: Altars of a Dark Clown

English: Hidden within the walls of the Mars Mine are altars decorated with the symbol of the evil clown goddess, Shade.
Indonesian: Tersembunyi di balik dinding Mars Mine terdapat altar yang dihiasi dengan simbol evil clown goddess, Shade.

English: Go visit the mine and see what I mean. The altars all have the symbol of Shade's corruption scattered nearby.
Indonesian: Kunjungi tambang itu dan lihat apa maksudku. Semua altar memiliki simbol kerusakan Shade yang tersebar di dekatnya.

English: Your curiosity will not go unpunished... to reveal the nature of Shade's power, you must defeat her elite guards within the Mars Mine.
Indonesian: Keingintahuanmu tidak akan luput dari hukuman... untuk mengungkap hakikat kekuatan Shade, kamu harus mengalahkan pengawal elitnya di dalam Mars Mine.

English: Perhaps this is where your story ends...
Indonesian: Mungkin di sinilah kisahmu berakhir...

English: Ah, I can tell you were successful in slaying Shade's elite guards. You're covered in her corrupted energy.
Indonesian: Ah, aku tahu kau berhasil membunuh pengawal elit Shade. Kau diselimuti energinya yang rusak.

English: Being in contact with this much purple magic has been known to cause memory loss... perhaps someone with knowledge of these magics could help you before you go mad.
Indonesian: Berhubungan dengan banyak purple magic diketahui dapat menyebabkan hilangnya ingatan... mungkin seseorang dengan pengetahuan tentang sihir ini dapat membantumu sebelum menjadi gila.

English: Find and eliminate Shade's elite henchmen within the Mars Mine.
Indonesian: Temukan dan singkirkan antek-antek elit Shade di Mars Mine.

English: Kill the elite masquerpets upon each of their altars within the Mars Mine.
Indonesian: Bunuh para masquerpet elit di setiap altar mereka di Mars Mine.

English: A Reunion to Remember
Indonesian: Reuni yang Tak Terlupakan

English: Oh you've returned... at least I think I remember you.
Indonesian: Oh, kau telah kembali... setidaknya kupikir aku mengingatmu.

English: You brought me something? Oh, it's a drink... I shouldn't trust you, but for some reason I don't sense any animosity in your aura. I'll take a drink in honor of our reunion today.
Indonesian: Kau membawakan sesuatu untukku? Oh, ini minuman... Aku seharusnya tidak mempercayaimu, tetapi entah mengapa aku tidak merasakan kejahatan dalam auramu. Aku akan minum untuk merayakan reuni kita hari ini.

English: Well it was nice to see you again...
Indonesian: Senang bertemu denganmu lagi...

English: It's all coming back, all the years. A lifetime of adventures are now clear... thanks to you.
Indonesian: Semuanya kembali, selama bertahun-tahun. Petualangan seumur hidup kini menjadi jelas... berkatmu.

English: Though I can never repay you for restoring my memories, I hope this gift will show my appreciation. Here, take my blades...
Indonesian: Meskipun aku tidak akan pernah bisa membalas budimu karena telah mengembalikan ingatanku, kuharap hadiah ini akan menunjukkan rasa terima kasihku. Ini, ambillah pedangku...

English: Don't worry about me, hero. With my memories in tact again, I can finally fight back against the one who took my mind...
Indonesian: Jangan khawatirkan aku, pahlawan. Dengan ingatanku yang utuh kembali, akhirnya aku bisa melawan orang yang telah mengambil alih pikiranku...

English: Will you let me sip from the cup again?
Indonesian: Maukah kau biarkan aku menyeruput cangkirnya lagi?

English: Help restore Hael's memories.
Indonesian: Bantu pulihkan ingatan Hael.

English: King of Beasts
Indonesian: King of Beasts

English: Venomous Vendetta
Indonesian: Venomous Vendetta

English: Have you heard of the legendary King of the Beasts? Brace yourself, adventurer, for he is not one to be easily defeated.
Indonesian: Pernahkah kamu mendengar tentang King of the Beasts yang legendaris? Bersiaplah, wahai petualang, karena dia bukanlah sosok yang mudah dikalahkan.

English: Before you can even set foot in the presence of the King, you must navigate through a winding path teeming with a vicious monsters.
Indonesian: Sebelum kamu dapat menginjakkan kaki di hadapan sang Raja, kamu harus melewati jalan berliku yang dipenuhi monster ganas.

English: Venture forth and cleanse The Wilds of the fearsome cobras and their master, the Twinstrike Den Mother. Clearing an opening will grant you the breathing space needed to strategize and prepare for what's to come.
Indonesian: Berpetualanglah dan bersihkan The Wilds dari ular kobra yang menakutkan dan tuannya, Twinstrike Den Mother. Membersihkan celah akan memberimu ruang bernapas yang dibutuhkan untuk menyusun strategi dan mempersiapkan diri menghadapi apa yang akan datang.

English: Should a mere handful of these snakes cast doubt upon your resolve, the prospect of facing Beast King Khan becomes a distant dream!
Indonesian: Jika segelintir ular ini saja meragukan tekadmu, prospek menghadapi Beast King Khan menjadi mimpi yang jauh!

English: With the serpents vanquished, your valor shines brightly, hero. Savor a brief rest, but keep your mind sharp, for another battle awaits when you re-enter the untamed Wilds!
Indonesian: Setelah ular-ular itu dikalahkan, keberanianmu bersinar terang, pahlawan. Nikmatilah istirahat sejenak, tetapi tetaplah waspada, karena pertempuran lain menanti saat kau memasuki kembali Wilds yang tak terkendali!

English: Stay focused, adventurer. Venture back to the Wilds, and press on until the Prismatic Cobras and Twinstrike Den Mother are no more.
Indonesian: Tetaplah fokus, petualang. Berpetualanglah kembali ke Wilds, dan teruslah maju hingga Prismatic Cobras dan Twinstrike Den Mother tidak ada lagi.

English: Defeat 60 Prismatic Cobra, the Twinstrike Den Mother, then 60 Twinstrike Cobra.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 60 Prismatic Cobra, Twinstrike Den Mother, lalu 60 Twinstrike Cobra.

English: Tale of Tanuki
Indonesian: Tale of Tanuki

English: The fight through the Wilds has only just begun. Armed with your newfound experience in the Wilds, you're ready to confront something even more perilous.
Indonesian: Pertarungan di Wilds baru saja dimulai. Berbekal pengalaman baru di Wilds, kamu siap menghadapi sesuatu yang lebih berbahaya.

English: Return to the Wilds and face the army of Tanuki warriors who stand as guardians of the King's lush garden.
Indonesian: Kembalilah ke Wilds dan hadapi pasukan prajurit Tanuki yang bertugas sebagai penjaga taman rindang milik Raja.

English: The last fight certainly tested your mettle. Rest for a while, and let me know when you are ready to proceed.
Indonesian: Pertarungan terakhir tentu menguji keberanianmu. Beristirahatlah sejenak, dan beri tahu aku saat kamu siap untuk melanjutkan.

English: The King's army has begun to dwindle! Only the most powerful of his guardians remain to defend him.
Indonesian: Pasukan Raja sudah mulai menyusut! Hanya pengawalnya yang paling kuat yang tersisa untuk melindunginya.

English: You're so close to victory adventurer, do not give up hope. Defeat the Tanuki, and march ever closer to the King's chambers.
Indonesian: Kamu sudah sangat dekat dengan kemenangan, petualang, jangan menyerah. Kalahkan Tanuki, dan majulah semakin dekat ke kamar Raja.

English: Defeat 60 Tanuki Enforcer and the Tanuki Protector.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 60 Tanuki Enforcer dan Tanuki Protector.

English: Defying the Mystic Monarch
Indonesian: Menantang Mystic Monarch

English: The time has come to face King Beast Khan's most powerful allies!
Indonesian: Waktunya telah tiba untuk menghadapi sekutu terkuat King Beast Khan!

English: Deep within the camp of the Wildwoods dwells a potent species of beast known as the Wildwood Stalkers. They are lead by the mysterious Wildwood Shaman, a being believed to imbue them with corrupted magics.
Indonesian: Jauh di dalam perkemahan Wildwoods, hiduplah spesies binatang buas yang dikenal sebagai Wildwood Stalkers. Mereka dipimpin oleh Wildwood Shaman yang misterius, makhluk yang diyakini memberi mereka sihir jahat.

English: To challenge the Wildwood without being thoroughly prepared would be a grave mistake.
Indonesian: Menantang Wildwood tanpa persiapan yang matang akan menjadi kesalahan besar.

English: The Wildwood have truly fallen!? Well done, hero! Only the King now stands in your path!
Indonesian: Wildwood benar-benar telah jatuh!? Bagus sekali, pahlawan! Hanya Raja yang sekarang berdiri di jalanmu!

English: The Wildwood are a fearsome species. Persevere, and keep pressing forward!
Indonesian: Wildwood adalah spesies yang menakutkan. Bertahanlah dan teruslah maju!

English: Defeat 60 Wildwood Stalker and the Wildwood Shaman.
Indonesian: Kalahkan 60 Wildwood Stalker dan Wildwood Shaman.

English: Conquering the King
Indonesian: Menaklukkan Raja

English: Beast King Khan, the sovereign of the Wilds, holds dominion over all the untamed creatures dwelling within its depths. His fury befalls any who dare venture too close to his inner sanctum.
Indonesian: Beast King Khan, penguasa Wilds, menguasai semua makhluk liar yang tinggal di dalamnya. Amarahnya menimpa siapa pun yang berani mendekati tempat sucinya.

English: Legend speaks of the King's chambers as housing extraordinary treasures, granting those who uncover them unparalleled power. Are you prepared to test the truth of these legends?
Indonesian: Legenda mengatakan bahwa kamar-kamar Raja menyimpan harta karun yang luar biasa, yang memberikan kekuatan tak tertandingi bagi siapa pun yang menemukannya. Apakah kamu siap untuk menguji kebenaran legenda ini?

English: Your time has come to confront the King, hero. Stand against the mighty King Beast Khan, and collect the spoils of your brave endeavors!
Indonesian: Waktumu telah tiba untuk menghadapi sang Raja, sang pahlawan. Lawanlah sang King Beast Khan yang perkasa, dan kumpulkan hasil rampasan dari usahamu yang berani!

English: Take all the time you require to make your preparations. The Beast King will surely remain within.
Indonesian: Luangkan waktu sebanyak yang kau perlukan untuk mempersiapkan diri. Beast King pasti akan tetap di dalam.

English: Astounding, hero! You've vanquished the very King of Beasts himself!
Indonesian: Hebat sekali, pahlawan! Kau telah mengalahkan King of Beasts itu sendiri!

English: Return to me if you emerge victorious against Beast King Khan.
Indonesian: Kembalilah padaku jika kau menang melawan Beast King Khan.

English: Collect the Oversized Heart from Beast King Khan.
Indonesian: Kumpulkan Oversized Heart dari Beast King Khan.

English: Flyff's 20 year anniversary
Indonesian: Flyff's 20 year anniversary

English: The Beginnings
Indonesian: The Beginnings

English: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.
Indonesian: Happy 20 year anniversary! Why don't you let me take you on a leisurely trip through a little history in celebration? As a reward, my mayor friends and I will reward you with a special glow.

English: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.
Indonesian: The rest of the city mayors and I will guide you through some iconic Flyff experiences, and tell you about some milestones.

English: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!
Indonesian: The first and biggest milestone this 20 year old game hit was the grand opening, this month 20 years ago in Japan!

English: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.
Indonesian: As you might expect, the world of Madrigal looked quite different at that time... I was still a newly elected mayor! My only friends were the mayors of Saint City and Darken back then.

English: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.
Indonesian: You know, the only continents that were formed at that time were Flaris, Saint Morning, The Garden of Rhisis, and Darkon 1. If you'd like to see some pictures, check out the article on our website.

English: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?
Indonesian: Now, why don't you go kill some Aibatts for old time's sake and come back to me?

English: I'll be waiting!
Indonesian: I'll be waiting!

English: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!
Indonesian: Well, that's a shame. Happy anniversary anyway!

English: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.
Indonesian: Nice! This is nostalgic... It's been a while since I've seen an Aibatt kill mission.

English: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.
Indonesian: Go ahead and meet with the mayor of Saint City. He's a great storyteller.

English: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.
Indonesian: Kill the Aibatts the mayor of Flarine told you about.

English: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?
Indonesian: Hello there. My friend in Flarine said you'd be coming. Now... where was the story?

English: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.
Indonesian: Right. You just killed some Aibatts, and while that's something everyone is familiar with, there are some experiences that the veterans only know about.

English: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.
Indonesian: Were you around when you had to level your skills by using them?! Yep, different world back then.

English: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...
Indonesian: Have you ever had to repair your weapon? Until the 9th version of Flyff, players like yourself had to repair their weapons over time...

English: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?
Indonesian: As a matter of fact... I happen to have an 18 year old relic of mine which I never got to repair! My friend Bulrox used to love these things. Why don't you give it to him for me, as an Anniversary gift?

English: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.
Indonesian: I hope he still has the equipment to repair it, it's a sentimental piece... After you give it to Bulrox, the mayor of Darken will have some more to tell you.

English: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.
Indonesian: Ah. He probably doesn't have the equipment for it anymore anyway.

English: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.
Indonesian: Wow! I never thought I'd see one of these in this condition again! This is an incredible gift for a weapons' master, I'll be spending all my time off work fixing this.

English: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.
Indonesian: Deliver the broken Wooden Sword to Bulrox, as a gift from the mayor.

English: An Old Gift From an Old Friend
Indonesian: An Old Gift From an Old Friend

English: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.
Indonesian: Happy 20th to us! Now that we've looked back on the last 20 years, we arrive to today. Flyff Universe was launched in May of 2022, and brings Madrigal to many different corners of the world.

English: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?
Indonesian: As we continue to appreciate Flyff and its memories over the next 20 years, why don't you do one final, iconic task for me?

English: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!
Indonesian: I want you to head back to flaris and speak with Mr. Flyff, right after you kill some Mothbees on your flying device!

English: He's waiting for you!
Indonesian: He's waiting for you!

English: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.
Indonesian: He's going to wait for another 20 years, no problem.

English: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.
Indonesian: Welcome back! As promised, here's your token of participation, wear it proudly.

English: To The Skies, For Fun!
Indonesian: To The Skies, For Fun!

English: Kill the Mothbees and return to Mr. Flyff.
Indonesian: Kalahkan Mothbee dan kembali ke Mr. Flyff.
